text2: Bada egun harçaz gueroztic consultatzen çutén elkarrequin hura hil leçatençát .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Iesus bada guehiagoric etzabilan aguerriz Iuduén artean : baina ioan cedin handic desertuaren aldeco comarcarát , Ephraim deitzen den hirira : eta han egoiten cen bere discipuluequin .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Eta cen hurbil Iuduén bazcoa , eta igan cedin anhitz Ierusalemera comarca hartacoric bazco aitzinean , purifica litecençat .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Bada Iesusen bilha çabiltzan , eta elkarren artean erraiten çutén , templean leudela , Cer irudi çaiçue , ecen eztela ethorriren bestara ?

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Eta eman ceçaten Sacrificadore principaléc eta Phariseuéc manamendu , baldin nehorc eçagutzen balu non licén , eracuts leçan , hatzaman leçatençát .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Bada Iesus sey egun bazcoren aitzinetic ethor cedin Bethaniara , non baitzén Lazaro hil içan cena , cein resuscitatu baitzuen hiletaric .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Eguin cieçoten bada hari affaribat han , eta Marthac cerbitzua eguiten çuen : eta Lazaro cen harequin mahainean iarriric ceudenetaric bat .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Orduan Mariac harturic liberabat vnguentu aspic finez precio handitacoric , vncta citzan Iesusen oinac , eta ichuca citzan bere adatsaz : eta etchea bethe cedin vnguentuaren vrrinez .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Orduan erran ceçan haren discipuluetaric batec , Iudas Iscariot Simonen semeac , hura tradituren çuenac .

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: Ceren vnguentu haur ezta saldu içan hirurehun dinerotan , eta eman paubrey ?

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Eta haur erran ceçan , ez paubrez harc ansiaric çuenez : baina ceren ohoin baitzen , eta mulsá baitzuen , eta eçarten ciradenac harc ekarten baitzituen .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Erran ceçan bada Iesusec , Vtzi eçac , ene sepultura eguneco hori beguiratu dic .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ecen paubreac bethiere vkanen dituçue çuequin : baina ni eznauçue bethiere vkanen .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Orduan eçagut ceçan Iuduetaric gendetze handic , ecen han cela : eta ethor citecen ez Iesusgatic solament , baina are Lazaro ikus leçatençat , cein harc hiletaric resuscitatu baitzuen .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Eta consulta ceçaten Sacrificadore principalec Lazaro - ere hil leçatençát .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Ecen Iuduetaric anhitz haren causaz ioaiten ciraden , eta sinhesten çuten Iesus baithan .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Biharamunean bestara ethorri içan cen gendetze handic , ençunic ecen Iesus ethorten cela Ierusalemera ,

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Har citzaten palma adarrac , eta ilki cequizquion aitzinera , eta oihu eguiten çutén , Hosanna , Benedicatu dela Iaunaren icenean ethorten den Israeleco reguea .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Eta eriden ceçan Iesusec asto - vme arbat , eta iar cedin haren gainean , scribatua den beçala ,

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: Ezaicela beldur Siongo alabá : huná , hire Regue ethorten dun iarriric dagoela asto - vme ar - baten gainean .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Eta gauça hauc etzitzaten eçagut haren discipuluéc lehenetic : baina Iesus glorificatu içan cenean , orduan orhoit citecen ecen gauça hauc harçaz scribatuac ciradela , eta hari gauça hauc eguin cerautzatela .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Eta testificatzen çuen harequin cen gendetzeac , ecen Lazaro deithu çuela monumentetic , eta hura resuscitatu çuela hiletaric .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Halacotz atzinera ethorri - ere içan çayón gendetzea , ecen ençun çuten , harc miraculu haur eguin çuela .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Eta Phariseuéc erran ceçaten bere artean , Eztacussaçue ecen etzaretela deus probetchatzen ? horrá , mundua haren ondoan ioan da .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Eta baciraden Grec batzu igaiten ohi ciradenetaric adoratzera bestán :

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Hauc bada ethor citecen Philippegana cein baitzén Bethsaidaco Galilean , eta othoitz eguin cieçoten , cioitela , Iauna , nahi guendiquec Iesus ikussi .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Ethorten da Philippe eta erraiten drauca Andriui , Andriuèc berriz eta Philippec erraiten draucate Iesusi .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Eta Iesusec ihardets ciecén , cioela , Ethorri da ordua guiçonaren Semea glorificaturen baita .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauçuet , baldin ogui bihia lurrera eroriric hil ezpadadi , hura bera dago : baina baldin hil badadi fructu anhitz ekarten du .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Bere viciari on daritzanac galduren du hura : eta bere viciari gaitz daritzanac mundu hunetan , vicitze eternalecotzat beguiraturen du hura .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Baldin ni cembeitec cerbitzatzen banau , niri iarreiqui bequit : eta non ni içanen bainaiz , han ene cerbitzaria - ere içanen da : eta baldin cembeitec ni cerbitza baneça , ohoraturen du hura ene Aitac .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Orain ene arimá trublatua da : eta cer erranen dut ? Aitá , empara neçac oren hunetaric : baina halacotz ethorri nauc oren hunetara .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Aitá , glorifica eçac eure icena . Ethor cedin orduan vozbat cerutic , cioela , Eta glorificatu diat , eta berriz glorificaturen .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Eta gendetze han cenac , eta ençun çuenac , cioen , igorciribat eguin çuela . Bercéc cioiten , Aingueruä minçatu içan çayo .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Ihardets ceçan Iesusec eta erran , Ezta enegatic voz haur eguin içan , baina çuengatic .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Orain da mundu hunen iugemendua : orain mundu hunetaco princea egotziren da campora .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Eta nic , baldin goititua banaiz lurretic , guciac tiraturen ditut neuregana .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: ( Eta haur erraiten çuen , aditzera emaiten çuela cer herioz hil behar çuen )

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Ihardets cieçón gendetzeac , Guc ençun diagu Leguetic , ecen Christ badagoela eternalqui : eta nola hic erraiten duc ecen behar dela goiti dadin guiçonaren Semea ? nor da guiçonaren Seme hori ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Erran ciecén orduan Iesusec , Oraino dembora guti batetacotz Arguia çuequin da : ebil çaitezte Arguia duçueno , ilhumbeac ardiets etzaitzatençát : ecen ilhumbean dabilanac , eztaqui norat ioaiten den .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Arguia duçueno sinhets eçaçue . Arguia baithan , Arguiaren seme çaretençat . Gauça hauc erran citzan Iesusec : guero ioanic gorde cedin hetaric .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Eta hambat miraculu eguin baçuen - ere hayén aitzinean , etzuten sinhesten hura baithan :

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Esaias prophetaren hitza compli ledinçát , cein erran vkan baitu , Iauna , norc sinhetsi vkan du gure hitza , eta Iaunaren bessoa nori reuelatu içan çayo ?

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Halacotz ecin sinhets ceçaqueten , ceren berriz erran baitu Esaiasec ,

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Itsutu vkan ditu hayén beguiac , eta gogortu vkan du hayén bihotza : beguiz ikus ezteçatençat , eta bihotzez adi ezteçaten , eta conuerti eztitecen , eta senda eztitzadan .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Gauça hauc erran citzan Esaiasec , haren gloriá ikussi çuenean , eta minçatu içan da harçaz .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Badaric - ere principaletaric - ere anhitzec hura baithan sinhets ceçaten : baina Phariseuacgatic etzuten aithortzen , synagogatic campora egotz litecen beldurrez .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Ecen maiteago vkan dute guiçonén gloriá , ecen ez Iaincoaren gloriá .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Orduan oihu eguin ceçan Iesusec , eta erran ceçan , Ni baithan sinhesten duenac , eztu sinhesten ni baithan , baina ni igorri nauena baithan .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Eta ni ikusten nauenac , ikusten du ni igorri nauena .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Ni Argui mundura ethorri naiz , ni baithan sinhesten duenic batre , ilhumbean eztagoençát

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Eta baldin nehorc ençun baditza ene hitzac , eta ez sinhets , nic eztut condemnatzen hura : ecen eznaiz ethorri mundua condemna deçadançát , baina mundua salua deçadançat .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Ni iraizten nauenac , eta ez recebitzen ene hitzac , badu norc hura condemna deçan : ni minçatu naicen hitzac condemnaturen du hura azquen egunean ,

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Ecen ni neure burutic eznaiz minçatu : baina ni igorri nauen Aitac berac manamendu eman draut , cer erran deçaquedan eta cer minça naiten .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Eta badaquit ecen haren manamendua vicitze eternal dela : bada nic erraiten ditudan gauçác , nola Aitac eman baitrauzquit , hala erraiten ditut .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Eta bazco besta aitzinean , çaquiala Iesusec ecen ethorri cela haren orena iragan ledinçat mundu hunetaric Aitaganát , nola maite vkan baitzituen bereac , munduan ciradenac , finerano maite vkan ditu hec .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Eta affal ondoan ( deabruac ia eçarri çuenean Iudas Iscarioten , Simonen semearen bihotzean , hura tradi leçan )

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Daquialaric Iesusec gauça gucia eman drauzcala hari Aitác escuetara , eta bera Iaincoaganic ilki dela , eta Iaincoganat ioaiten dela :

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Iaiquiten da affaritetic , eta vtziten du arropá : eta harturic longerabat , guerrica cedin harçaz .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Guero eçar ceçan vr bacin batetara , eta has cedin discipuluen oinén ikutzen , eta guerricatua cen oihalaz ichucatzen .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Ethor cedin bada Simon Pierrisgana : eta harc erran cieçon , Iauna , hic niri oinac ikutzen drauzquidac ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Ihardets ceçan Iesusec eta erran cieçon , Nic eguiten dudana , hic eztaquic orain : baina guero eçaguturen duc .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Diotsa Pierrisec , Eztituc ikuciren ene oinac seculan . Ihardets cieçón Iesusec , Baldin ikuz ezpaheçat , eztuc vkanen parteric enequin .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Diotsa Simon Pierrisec , Iauna , ez ene oinac solament , baina escuac - ere eta buruä .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Diotsa Iesusec , Ikucia denac , eztic mengoaric oinac ikuz ditzan baicen , baina duc chahu gucia : eta çuec chahu çarete , baina ez gucioc .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Ecen baçaquian cein cen hura traditzen çuena : halacotz erran ceçan , Etzarete chahu gucioc .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Bada ikuci cituenean hayén oinac , eta bere arropac harçara hartu cituenean , berriz mahainean , iarriric erran ciecén , Badaquiçue cer eguin drauçuedan ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Çuec deitzen nauçue , Magistrua eta Iauna , eta vngui dioçue : ceren bainaiz .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Baldin beraz nic ikuci baditut çuen oinac Iauna eta Magistrua naicelaric , çuec - ere behar drauzteçue elkerri oinac ikuci .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Ecen exemplu eman vkan drauçuet , nic çuey eguin drauçuedan beçala , çuec - ere daguiçuen .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauçuet , Cerbitzaria ezta bere nabussia baino handiago , ezeta embachadorea hura igorten duena bainoa handiago .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Baldin gauça hauc badaquizquiçue , dohatsu içanen çarete baldin eguin baditzaçue .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Eznaiz çueçaz gucioz minço : nic badaquit cein elegitu ditudan : baina behar da compli dadin Scripturá , Enequin oguia iaten duenac , altchatu du ene contra bere oindogorá .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Oraindanic erraiten drauçuet eguin dadin baino lehen , eguin datenean , sinhets deçaçuençát ecen ni naicela .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauçuet , baldin nic norbeit igor badeçat , norc - ere hura recebitzen baitu , ni recebitzen nau : eta ni recebitzen nauenac , recebitzen du ni igorri nauena .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Gauça hauc erran cituenean Iesus trubla cedin spirituan , eta testifica ceçan , eta erran , Eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauçuet , ecen çuetaric batec tradituren nauela ni .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Orduan discipuluéc batac berceaganat behatzen çutén , ceinez minço cen dudatan içanez .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Eta cen Iesusen discipuluetaric bat mahainean haren bulharrera iarria , cein maite baitzuen Iesusec :

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Eta keinu eguin cieçón huni Simon Pierrisec , galde leguión , cein cen harc erraiten çuena .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Bada harc Iesusen stomaquera beheraturic , diotsa , Iauna , cein da ?

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Ihardets ceçan Iesusec , Hura duc nic ahamen trempatua emanen draucadana . Eta busti çuenean ahamena , eman cieçón Iudas Iscariot Simonenari .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Eta ahamenaren ondoan sar cequión Satan . Eta diotsa Iesusec , Eguiten duana eguic fitetz .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Baina mahainean ciradenetaric batec - ere etzuen aditzen certara hura erran ceraucan .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Ecen batzuc vste çuten , ceren mulsá baitzuen Iudasec , ecen erran ceraucala Iesusec , Eros itzac bestacotzát behar ditugun gauçác : edo paubrey cerbait eman liecén .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Hura bada ahamena harturic , bertan ilki cedin , eta cen gauä .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Eta ilki cenean , erran ceçan Iesusec , Orain glorificatu da guiçonaren Semea , eta Iaincoa glorificatu da hartan .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Baldin Iaincoa glorificatu bada hartan , Iaincoac - ere glorificaturen du hura bere baithan , eta bertan glorificaturen du hura .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Haourtoác , oraino appurbat çuequin naiz : bilhaturen nauçue : baina Iuduey erran drauedan beçala , Norat ni ioaiten bainaiz , çuec ecin ethor çaitezquete : hala çuey - ere erraiten drauçuet orain .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Manamendu berribat emaiten drauçuet , batac berceari on daritzoçuen , nic çuey on eritzi drauçuedan beçala , çuec - ere elkarri on daritzoçuençat .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Hunetan eçaguturen dute guciéc ecen ene discipulu çaretela , baldin charitate baduçue batac berceagana .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Diotsa Simon Pierrisec , Iauna , norat ioaiten aiz ? Ihardets cieçón Iesusec , Norat ni ioaiten bainaiz , ecin orain iarreiqui aquidit : baina iarreiquiren atzait guero .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Diotsa Pierrisec , Iauna , ceren ecin iarreiqui naquidic orain ? neure arima hiregatic eçarriren diát .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Ihardets cieçón Iesusec , Eure arimá enegatic eçarriren baituc ? eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauat , eztic ioren oillarrac vkatu nuqueano hiruretan .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Eztadila trubla çuen bihotza : sinhesten duçue Iaincoa baithan , ni baithan - ere sinhets eçaçue .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Ene Aitaren etchean egoitzác anhitz dirade : baldin bercela baliz erran nerauqueçuen , Banoa çuey leku appaincera .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Eta ioan naiçatenean , eta leku çuey appaindu drauqueçuedanean , berriz ethorriren naiz , eta harturen çaituztet neuregana : non bainaiz ni , çuec - ere çaretençát .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Eta norat ni ioaiten naicen badaquiçue , eta bidea badaquiçue .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Diotsa Thomasec , Iauna , etzeaquiagu norat ioaiten aicen : eta nolatan bidea ahal daquiquegu ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Diotsa Iesusec , Ni naiz bidea eta eguia eta vicitzea : nehor ezta ethorten Aitagana niçaz baicen .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Baldin eçagutzen baninduçue ni , ene Aita - ere eçagut cineçaquete : eta oraindanic eçagutzen duçue hura , eta ikussi duçue hura .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Diotsa Philippec , Iauna , eracuts ieçaguc Aita , eta asco ciaicuc ,

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Diotsa Iesusec , Hambat demboraz çuequin nauc , eta eznauc eçagutu ni ? Philippé , ikussi nauenac ni , ikussi dic Aita : eta nola hic erraiten duc , Eracuts ieçaguc Aita ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Eztuc sinhesten ecen ni Aita baithan , eta Aita ni baithan dela ? Nic çuey erraiten drauzquiçuedan hitzac , neurorganic eztitut erraiten : baina nitan dagoen Aitac eguiten ditu obrác .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Sinhets neçaçue ecen ni Aita baithan , eta Aita ni baithan dela : ezpere obra beracgatic sinhets neçaçue .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauçuet , norc ni baithan sinhesten baitu , nic eguiten ditudan obrác , harc - ere eguinen ditu , eta hauc baino handiagoac eguinen ditu : ecen ni Aitaganat ioaiten naiz .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Eta cer - ere escaturen baitzarete ene icenean , hura dut eguinen : glorifica dadinçat Aita Semean .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Baldin cerbait esca baçaitezte ene icenean , nic dut eguinen .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: Baldin niri on badariztaçue , ene manamenduac beguiraitzaçue .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Eta nic othoitz eguinen draucat Aitari , eta berce Consolaçalebat emanen drauçue , dagoençat çuequin eternalqui :

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Eguiazco Spiritu munduac ecin recebi deçaquena diot : ceren ezpaitu ikusten hura , ez eçagutzen : baina çuec badaçaguçue hura , ceren çuec baithan egoiten baita , eta çuetan içanen da .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Etzaituztet vtziren çurtz : itzuliren naiz çuetara .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Oraino gutibat , eta munduac eznau guehiagoric ikussiren , baina çuec ikussiren nauçue : ceren ni vici bainaiz , çuec - ere vicico çarete .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Egun hartan çuec duçue eçaguturen ecen ni naicela neure Aita baithan , eta çuec ni baithan eta ni çuec baithan .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Ene manamenduey datchetena , eta hec beguiratzen dituena , da niri on dariztana : eta niri on dariztana , ene Aitaz onhetsia içanen da : eta nic hari on eritziren draucat , eta manifestaturen draucat hari neure buruä .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Diotsa Iudasec , ez Iscariotec , Iauna , nondic da ceren guri eure buruä manifestaturen baitraucuc , eta ez munduari ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Ihardets ceçan Iesusec , eta erran cieçón , Baldin norbeitec on badarizt niri , ene hitza beguiraturen du : eta ene Aitac onhetsiren du hura , eta harengana ethorriren gara , eta hura baithan egoitza eguinen dugu .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Niri on eztariztanac , ene hitzac eztitu beguiratzen : eta ençuten duçuen hitza , ezta enea , baina ni igorri nauen Aitarena .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: Gauça hauc erran drauzquiçuet , çuequin nagoela .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Baina Consolaçaleac , Spiritu sainduac , cein igorriren baitu Aitac ene icenean , harc iracatsiren drauzquiçue gauça guciac , eta orhoit eraciren drauzquiçue erran drauzquiçuedan gauça guciac

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Baquea vtziten drauçuet , neure baquea emaiten drauçuet : eztrauçuet munduac emaiten duen beçala , nic emaiten çuey . Eztadila trubla çuen bihotza , eta eztadila icit .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Ençun duçue ecen erran drauçuedala , Banoa , eta itzuliren naiz çuetara . Baldin on bacindarizté , segur aleguera cintezquete ceren erran baitut , banoa Aitaganát : ecen Aita ni baino handiago da .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Eta orain erran drauçuet eguin dadin baino lehen , eguin datenean sinhets deçaçuençát .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Eznaiz guehiagoric çuequin anhitz minçaturen : ecen ethorri da mundu hunetaco princea , eta nitan eztu deus .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Baina haur eguiten da , eçagut deçançát munduac : ecen on daritzadala Aitari : eta nola manatu bainau Aitac , hala eguiten dut . Iaiqui çaitezte , goacen hemandic .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: Ni naiz aihen eguiazcoa , eta ene Aita da mahastiçaina

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Nitan fructu ekarten eztuen chirmendu gucia , kencen du : eta fructu ekarten duen gucia , chahutzen du , fructu guehiago ekar deçançát .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Ia çuec chahu çarete nic erran drauçuedan hitzagatic .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Çaudete nitan eta ni çuetan : chirmenduac berac fructuric bereganic ecin ekar deçaqueen beçala , baldin aihenean ezpadago : ezeta çuec - ere baldin nitan ezpaçaudete .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: Ni naiz aihena , çuec chirmenduac : nor baitago nitan , eta ni hartan , harc ekarten du fructu anhitz : ecen ni gabe deus ecin daidiçue .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Baldin norbeit nitan ezpadago , egotzia da campora chirmendua beçala , eta eihartzen da : guero biltzen , eta sura egoizten , eta erratzen .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Baldin baçaudete nitan , eta ene hitzac çuetan badaude , cer - ere nahi baituçue esca çaitezte , eta eguinen çaiçue .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Hunetan da glorificatu ene Aita , fructu anhitz daccarraçuen : eta içanen çarete ene discipulu .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Ni Aitac maite vkan nauen beçala , nic - ere maite vkan çaituztet çuec : çaudete ene charitatean .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Baldin ene manamenduac beguira baditzaçue , egonen çarete ene charitatean : nic - ere neure Aitaren manamenduac beguiratu ditudan beçala , eta egoiten bainaiz haren amorioan .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Gauça hauc erran drauzquiçuet çuey , ene alegrançá çuetan dagoençat , eta çuen alegrançá bethé dadinçát .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Haur da ene manamendua , batac bercea maite duçuen , nic maite vkan çaituztedan beçala

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Haur baino amorio handiagoric nehorc eztu , norbeitec bere arimá bere adisquideacgatic eman deçan .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Çuec ene adisquide içanen çarete , baldin eguin badeçaçue cer - ere nic manatzen baitrauçuet

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Guehiagoric etzaituztet cerbitzari deithuren , ecen cerbitzariac eztaqui haren nabussiac cer eguiten duen : baina çuec deithu çaituztet adisquide , ceren neure Aitaganic ençun dudan gucia , eçagut eraci baitrauçuet .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Eznauçue çuec ni elegitu , baina nic elegitu çaituztet çuec , eta ordenatu çaituztét , ioan çaiteztençat eta fructu ekar deçaçuen , eta çuen fructua dagoen : cer - ere esca baitzaquizquiote ene Aitari ene icenean , eman dieçaçuençat .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Gauça hauc manatzen drauzquiçuet , elkar maite duçuençát .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: Baldin munduac gaitzesten baçaituzté , badaquiçue ecen ni çuec baino lehen gaitzetsi vkan nauela .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Baldin munduco bacinete , munduac bere luena maite luque : ordea ceren ezpaitzarete munduco , baina nic elegitu baitzaituztet mundutic , halacotz gaitz daritzue munduac .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Orhoit çaitezte nic erran drauçuedan hitzaz Ezta cerbitzaria bere nabussia baino handiago : baldin ni persecutatu banauté , çuec - ere persecutaturen çaituzte : baldin ene hitza beguiratu baduté , çuena - ere beguiraturen duté .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Baina gauça hauc guciac eguinen drauzquiçue ene icenagatic , ceren ezpaituté ni igorri nauena eçagutzen .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Baldin ethorri ezpaninz , eta berey minçatu ezpaninçaye , bekaturic ezluquete : baina orain excusaric eztuté bere bekatuaz .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Niri gaitz dariztanac , ene Aitari - ere gaitz daritza .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Baldin hayén artean nehorc bercec eguin eztituen obrác eguin ezpanitu , bekaturic ezluquete : baina orain ikussi dituzté , eta gaitz eritzi draucute niri eta ene Aitari .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Baina haur da hayén Leguean scribatua dagoen hitza compli dadinçát , dioela , Hoguen gabe gaitz eritzi draudate .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: Baina nic neure Aitaganic igorriren drauçuedan Consolaçalea dathorrenean , Spiritu eguiazcoa diot cein ene Aitaganic proceditzen baita , harc testificaturen du niçaz .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Baina çuec - ere testificaturen duçue , ecen hatseandanic enequin çarete .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: Gauça hauc erran drauzquiçuet scandaliza etzaiteztençát :

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Egotziren çaituzte synagoguetaric : baina ethorriren da demborá non norc - ere hilen baitzaituzte vste vkanen baitu cerbitzu eguiten draucala Iaincoari .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Eta gauça hauc eguinen drauzquiçue , ceren ezpaitute eçagutu Aita , ez ni .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Baina gauça hauc erran drauzquiçuet cuey , ordu hura ethorri datenean , orhoit çaiteztençat heçaz , ecen nic erran drauzquiçuedala : badaric - ere gauça hauc hatseandanic eztrauzquiçuet erran , ceren çuequin bainincén .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Baina orain banoa ni igorri nauenaganát , eta çuetaric nehorc eznau interrogatzan , Norat oha ?

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Baina ceren gauca hauc erran drauzquiçuedan , tristitiác bethe du çuen bihotza ,

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Baina nic eguia erraiten drauçuet , behar duçue ni ioan nadin : ecen baldin ioan ezpanadi , Consolaçalea ezta ethorriren çuetara : baina baldin ioan banadi , igorriren dut hura çuetara .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Eta dathorrenean harc vençuturen du mundua bekatuz eta iustitiaz eta iugemenduz .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Bekatuz diot , ceren ezpaitute ni baithan sinhesten .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Eta iustitiaz , ceren neure Aitaganát ioaiten bainaiz , eta guehiagoric eznauçue ikussiren .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Eta iugemenduz , ceren mundu hunetaco princea condemnatu baita .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: Oraino anhitz gauça dut çuey erraiteco , baina ecin egar ditzaqueçue orain .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Baina dathorrenean hura , Spiritu eguiazcoa diot , harc guidaturen çaituzte eguia gucitara : ecen ezta minçaturen bere buruz , baina cer - ere ençun baituque erranen du : eta ethorteco diraden gauçác declaraturen drauzquiçue .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Harc nau glorificaturen : ecen enetic harturen du , eta declaraturen drauçue .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Aitac dituen gauça guciac , ene dirade : halacotz erran drauçuet ecen enetic harturen duela eta declaraturen drauçuela .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Dembora gutibat , eta eznauçue ikussiren : eta berriz dembora gutibat , eta ikussiren nauçue : ecen ni banoa Aitaganát .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Erran ceçaten bada haren discipuluetaric batzuc elkarren artean , Cer da erraiten draucun haur , Dembora gutibat , eta eznauçue ikussiren : eta berriz dembora gutibat , eta ikussiren nauçue : eta , Ecen ni banoa Aitaganát .

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Erraiten çuten bada , Cer da erraiten duen haur dembora gutibat ? eztaquigu cer erraiten duen

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Eçagut ceçan bada Iesusec ecen interrogatu nahi çutela , eta erran ciecén , Elkarren artean huneçaz galdez çaudete , ceren erran baitut , Dembora gutibat eta eznauçue ikussiren : eta berriz dembora gutibat eta ikussiren nauçue .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauçuet , nigar eta lamentatione eguinen duçue çuec , eta mundua bozturen da : eta çuec triste içanen çarete , baina çuen tristitiá conuertituren da bozcariotara .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Emazteac , ertzen denean dolore du , ceren haren ordua ethorri baita : baina erdi denean haourtcho batez , guehiagoric ezta doloreaz orhoit , bozcarioz ceren guiçombat mundura iayo daten .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Çuec - ere bada orain tristitia duçue : baina harçara ikussiren çaituztet , eta çuen bihotza alegueraturen da , eta çuen alegrançá eztu nehorc edequiren çuetaric .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Eta egun hartan eznauçue deusez interrogaturen . Eguiaz eguiaz erraiten drauçuet ecen cer - ere escaturen baitzaizquiote ene Aitari ene icenean , emanen drauçuela .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Oraindrano etzarete deus escatu ene icenean : esca çaitezte , eta recebituren duçue , çuen alegrançá complitua dençát .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: Gauça hauc comparationez erran drauzquiçuet : baina ethorten da ordua ezpainaitzaiçue guehiagoric comparationez minçaturen , baina claroqui neure Aitaz minçaturen bainaitzaiçue .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Egun hartan ene icenean escaturen çarete , eta eztrauçuet erraiten ecen nic othoitz eguinen draucadala Aitari çuengatic .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Ecen Aitac berac maite çaituzte , ceren çuec ni maite vkan bainauçue , eta sinhetsi baituçue ecen Iaincoaganic ilki naicela .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Ilki naiz Aitaganic , eta ethorri naiz mundura : harçara vtziten dut mundua , eta banoa Aitaganát .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Diotsate bere discipuluéc , Huná , orain claroqui minço aiz , eta comparationeric batre eztuc erraiten .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Orain baceaquiagu ecen badaquizquiala gauça guciac , eta eztuc mengoa nehorc interroga açan : huneçaz diagu sinhesten ecen Iaincoaganic ilki aicela .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Ihardets ciecen Iesusec , Orain sinhesten duçue ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Huná , ethorten da ordua , eta ia ethorri da , barreyaturen baitzarete batbedera cein çuenetarát , eta ni neuror vtziren bainauçue : baina eznaiz neuror : ecen Aita enequin da .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Gauça hauc erran drauzquiçuet , nitan baque duçuençat : munduan afflictione vkanen duçue : baina auçue bihotz on , ni munduari garaithu natzayo .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Gauça hauc erran citzan Iesusec , eta goiti citzan beguiac cerurát , eta erran ceçan , Aitá , ethorri duc orena , glorifica eçac eure Semea , eure Semeac - ere hi glorifica eçançát .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Nola eman baitraucac bothere haragui guciaren gainean , hari eman drauzquioán guciey , vicitze eternala eman diecençát .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Eta haur duc vicitze eternala , hi euror eçagut eçaten Iainco eguiazco , eta Iesus Christ hic igorri duana .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Nic glorificatu aut lurraren gainean : acabatu diat eguiteco eman draután obrá .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Eta orain glorifica neçac hic Aitá , euror baithan , gloria harçaz cein vkan baitut hirequin mundu haur eguin cedin baino lehen .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Manifestatu diraueat hire icena hic niri mundutic eman drauztán guiçoney : hireac cituán , eta niri hec eman drauzquidac , eta hire hitza beguiratu dié .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Orain eçagutu dié , ecen niri eman drauzquidán gauça guciac hireganic diradela .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Ecen niri eman drauzquidán hitzac hæy eman dirauzteat : eta hec recebitu citié , eta eçagutu dié eguiazqui ecen ni hireganic ilki naicela , eta sinhetsi dié ecen hic igorri nauala .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Nic hecgatic othoitz eguiten diat : eztiat munduagatic othoitz eguiten , baina hic niri eman drauzquidanacgatic , ecen hiriac dituc .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Eta ene gauça guciac hire dituc , eta hireác ene , eta glorificatu içan nauc hetan .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Eta guehiagoric eznauc munduan , baina hauc munduan dituc , eta ni hiregana ethorten nauc . Aita sainduá , beguiraitzac eure icenean , niri eman drauzquidanac , bat diradençat , gu beçala .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Hequin munduan nincenean , nic beguiratzen nitián hec hire icenean : niri eman drauzquidanac , nic beguiratu citiat , eta hetaric batre eztuc galdu içan , perditionezco semea baicen : Scripturá compli ledinçát .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Eta orain hiregana ethorten nauc , eta gauça hauc erraiten citiat munduan , dutençát ene alegrança complitua berac baithan .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Nic eman diraueat hæy hire hitza , eta munduac hec gaitzetsi vkan citic , ceren ezpaitirade mundutic , nola ni - ere ezpainaiz mundutic .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Eztiat othoitz eguiten ken ditzán hec mundutic , baina beguira ditzán gaichtotic .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Eztituc mundutic , nola ni - ere ezpainaiz mundutic .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Sanctificaitzac hec eure eguiáz : hire hitza duc eguiá .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Nola ni igorri bainauc mundura , nic - ere igorri citiat hec mundura .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Eta hecgatic sanctificatu diát neure buruä hec - ere sanctificatuac diradençát eguiáz .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: Eta eztiat hecgatic solament othoitz eguiten , baina hayén hitzaz ni baithan sinhetsiren dutenacgatic - ere bay :

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Guciac bat diradençát , nola hi Aita baitaiz nitan , eta ni hitan , hec - ere gutan bat diraden : sinhets deçançat munduac ecen hic ni igorri nauäla .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Hic niri eman drautan gloriá , nic - ere eman diraueat hæy : bat diradençát gu - ere bat garen beçala .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Ni nauc hetan , eta hi nitan , perfecto diradençát bat berean , eta eçagut deçan munduac ecen hic ni igorri nauala , eta maite dituala hec ni maite vkan nauán beçala .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: Aitá , niri eman drauzquidanac , nahi diat non bainaiz ni , hec - ere diraden enequin : contempla deçatençát ene gloria hic niri eman drautána , ecen maite vkan nauc mundua funda cedin baino lehendanic .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Aita iustoá , munduac hi ezau eçagutu , baina nic hi eçagutu aut , eta hauc eçagutu dié ecen hic ni igorri nauäla .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Eta eçagut eraci diraueat hire icena , eta eçagut eraciren : hic niri on eritzi draután onheriztea , hetan dençát , eta ni hetan .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Gauça hauc erran cituenean , ilki cedin Iesus bere discipuluequin Cedrongo torrentaz berce aldera , non baitzén baratzebat , ceinetan sar baitzedin hura eta haren discipuluac

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Eta baçaquian leku hura Iudasec - ere , ceinec traditzen baitzuen hura : ecen anhitzetan Iesus bildu içan cen hara bere discipuluequin .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Iudas bada harturic soldadozco bandabat , eta Sacrificadore principaletaric eta Phariseuetaric officierac , ethor cedin hara lanternequin eta torchoequin eta harmequin .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Iesusec bada çaquizquialaric haren gainera ethorteco ciradenen gauça guciac , aitzinaraturic erran ciecén , Noren bilha çabiltzate ?

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Ihardets cieçoten , Iesus Nazarenoren . Dioste Iesusec , Ni naiz . Eta hequin cegoen Iudas - ere ceinec traditzen baitzuen hura .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Bada erran cerauenean , Ni naiz , guibelerat citecen , eta eror citecen lurrera .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Orduan berriz interroga citzan , Noren bilha çabiltzate ? Eta hec erran ceçaten , Iesus Nazarenoren .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Ihardets ceçan Iesusec , Erran drauçuet ecen ni naicela : bada baldin ene bilha baçabiltzate , vtzitzaçue hauc ioaitera .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Erran çuen hitza compli ledinçát , Niri hic eman drauzquidanetaric , eztiát galdu batre .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Eta Simon Pierrisec nola baitzuen ezpatá , idoqui ceçan hura , eta io ceçan Sacrificadore subiranoaren cerbitzaria , eta ebaqui cieçón escuineco beharria : eta cerbitzariaren icena cen Malchus .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Erran cieçón bada Iesusec Pierrisi , Eçarrac eure ezpatá maguinán : ala eztut edanen Aitac niri eman drautan copa ?

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Orduan bandác eta capitainac eta Iuduen officieréc elkarrequin hatzaman ceçaten Iesus , eta esteca ceçaten .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Eta eraman ceçaten lehenic Annasgana : ( ecen Caiphasen guinharreba cen , cein baitzén vrthe hartaco Sacrificadore subirano ) eta harc igor ceçan hura estecaturic Caiphas Sacrificadore subiranoagana .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Eta Caiphas cen conseillu eman cerauena Iuduey ecen probetchu cela guiçombat hil ledin populuagatic .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Eta iarreiquiten çayón Iesusi Simon Pierris , eta berce discipulubat , eta discipulu hura cen Sacrificadore subiranoaren eçaguna , eta sar cedin Iesusequin batean Sacrificadore subiranoaren salán

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Baina Pierris borthaldean campotic cegoen . Ilki cedin bada berce discipulu Sacrificadore subiranoaren eçaguna , eta minça cequión nescato borthalçainari , eta sar eraci ceçan Pierris .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Eta erran cieçón Pierrisi nescato borthalçainac . Ez othe aiz hi - ere guiçon hunen discipuluetaric ? Dio harc , Ez naun .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Eta ceuden han cerbitzariac eta officierac ikatz kamborra eguinic , ecen hotz ari cen , eta berotzen ciraden : eta cen hequin Pierris - ere eta berotzen cegoen .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Sacrificadore subiranoac bada interroga ceçan Iesus bere discipuluéz eta bere doctrináz .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Ihardets cieçón Iesusec , Ni publicoqui minçatu içan natzayóc munduari , nic bethiere iracatsi vkan diat synagogán eta templean , nora Iuduac alde gucietaric biltzen baitirade , eta secretuan eznauc minçatu deus .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Cergatic interrogatzen nauc ni ? interrogaitzac ni cer minçatu natzayen ençun dutenac : hará , hec ciaquié cer erran dudan nic .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Eta gauça hauc harc erran cituenean , present ciraden officieretaric batec cihor colpebat eman cieçón Iesusi , cioela , Horrela ihardesten draucac Sacrificadore subiranoari ?

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Ihardets cieçón Iesusec , baldin gaizqui minçatu banaiz , testifica eçac gaizquiaz : eta baldin vngui erran badut , cergatic ioiten nauc ?

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Orduan igor ceçan hura Annasec estecaturic Caiphas Sacrificadore subiranoagana .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Eta cegoen han Simon Pierris , eta berotzen cen : erran cieçoten bada hari , Ez othe aiz hi - ere haren discipuluetaric ? vka ceçan harc , eta erran ceçan , Ez naiz .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Diotsa hari Sacrificadore subiranoaren cerbitzarietaric cembeitec , Pierrisec beharria ebaqui ceraucanaren ahaide batec , Ez aut nic hi ikussi baratzean harequin ?

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Orduan berriz vka ceçan Pierrisec , eta bertan oillarrac io ceçan .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Guero eraman ceçaten Iesus Caiphasganic Pretoriora : eta cen goiça , eta berac etzitecen sar Pretoriora , satsu ezlitecençat , baina Bazcoa ian leçatençat .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Ilki cedin bada Pilate hetara campora , eta erran ceçan , Cer accusatione daccarqueçue guiçon hunen contra ?

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Ihardets ceçaten eta erran cieçoten , Baldin hori gaizqui - eguile ezpaliz , ezquindrauqueán hiri liuratu .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Dioste orduan Pilatec , Har eçaçue haur çuec , eta çuen Leguearen arauez condemna eçaçue . Orduan erran cieçoten Iuduéc , Eztuc sori guretzát nehoren hiltzea .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Haur cen Iesusen hitza compli ledinçát , cein erran baitzeçan aditzera emaiten çuela cer herioz hil behar luen .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Sar cedin bada berriz Pretoriora Pilate , eta dei ceçan Iesus , eta erran cieçón , Hi aiz Iuduen Reguea ?

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Ihardets cieçon Iesusec , Eurorren burutic hic hori erraiten duc , ala bercéc erran draue niçaz ?

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Ihardets ceçan Pilatec , Ala ni Iudu naiz ? eure nationeac eta Sacrificadore principaléc liuratu arauté : cer eguin duc ?

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Ihardets ceçan Iesusec , Ene resumá eztuc mundu hunetaric : baldin mundu hunetaric baliz ene resumá , ene gendeac combati litezquec Iuduey liura eznendinçát : baina orain ene resumá eztuc hemengo .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Erran cieçón orduan Pilatec , Regue aiz bada hi ? Ihardets ceçan Iesusec , Hic dioc ecen Regue naicela ni . Ni hunetacotzát iayo içan nauc , eta hunetacotzát ethorri içan nauc mundura , testimoniage demodançát eguiari . Eguiatic den guciac , ençuten dic ene voza .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Diotsa Pilatec , Cer da eguia ? Eta haur erran çuenean , berriz ilki cedin Iuduetara , eta dioste , Nic eztut erideiten haur baithan causaric batre .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Eta costumabat baituçue bat larga dieçaçuedan Bazcoz : nahi duçue bada larga dieçaçuedan Iuduen Reguea ?

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Oihuz iar citecen bada berriz guciac , cioitela , Ez hori , baina Barabbas : eta cen Barabbas gaichtaguin - bat .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Orduan bada har ceçan Pilatec Iesus , eta açota ceçan .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Eta gendarmeséc plegaturic coroabat elhorriz eçar ceçaten haren buru gainean , eta escarlatazco abillamendu batez vezti ceçaten .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Eta erraiten çutén , Vngui hel daquiala Iuduen Regueá . Eta cihor vkaldiz ceraunsaten .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Ilki cedin bada berriz Pilate campora , eta erran ciecén , Huná , ekarten drauçuet campora , eçagut deçaçuençat ecen eztudala hunetan hoguenic batre erideiten .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Ilki cedin bada Iesus campora , elhorrizco coroá çacarquela , eta escarlatazco abillamendua . Eta dioste Pilatec , Huná guiçona .

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Baina ikussi çutenean hura Sacrificadore principaléc eta officieréc , oihu eguin ceçaten , cioitela , Crucifica eçac , crucifica eçac . Dioste Pilatec , Har eçaçue ceuroc , eta crucifica eçaçue : ecen nic eztut erideiten haur baithan hoguenic .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Ihardets cieçoten Iuduéc , Guc Leguea diagu , eta gure Leguearen arauez hil behar dic , ecen Iaincoaren Seme bere buruä eguin dic .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Ençun çuenean bada Pilatec hitz haur , beldurrago cedin .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Eta sar cedin Pretoriora berriz , eta erran cieçón Iesusi , Nongo aiz hi ? Eta Iesusec repostaric etzieçón eman .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Diotsa bada Pilatec , Niri ezatzait minço ? Eztaquic ecen bothere dudala hire crucificatzeco , eta bothere dudala hire largatzeco ?

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Ihardets ceçan Iesusec , Ezuque bothereric batre ene contra , baldin eman ezpalitzaic gainetic : halacotz , ni hiri liuratu narauanac , bekatu handiagoa dic .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Handic harat baçabilan Pilate hura largatu nahiz : baina Iuduac heyagoraz ceuden , Baldin hori larga badeçac , ezaiz Cesaren adisquide : ecen bere buruä regue eguiten duen gucia contrastatzen ciayóc Cesari .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Pilatec bada ençunic hitz haur , eraman ceçan campora Iesus , eta iar cedin alki iudicialean , Pabadura , eta Hebraicoz Gabbatha deitzen den lekuan .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Eta cen orduan Bazcoco preparationea , eta sey orenén inguruä : orduan dioste Pilatec Iuduey , Huná çuen Reguea .

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Baina hec oihu ceguiten , Ken , ken , crucifica eçac . Dioste Pilatec , çuen Reguea crucificaturen dut ? Ihardets çaçaten Sacrificadore principaléc , Eztiagu regueric Cesar baicen .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Orduan bada eman ciecén crucifica ledinçát . Eta har ceçaten Iesus , eta eraman ceçaten .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Eta hura bere crutzea çacarquela ethor cedin Bur - heçur plaça deitzen denera , eta Hebraicoz Golgotha .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Non crucifica baitzeçaten hura , eta harequin berceric biga , alde batetic eta bercetic , eta Iesus artean .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Eta scriba ceçan titulubat Pilatec , eta eçar ceçan haren crutze gainean : eta cen scribatua , IESVS NAZARENO IVDVEN REGVEA .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Titulu haur bada Iuduetaric anhitzec iracurt ceçaten : ecen ciuitate aldean cen Iesus crucificatu cen lekua : eta cen scribatua Hebraicoz , Grecquez , eta Latinez .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Ciotsaten bada Pilati Iuduén Sacrificadore principaléc , Ezteçála scriba Iuduén Regue : baina berac erran duela , Iuduén Reguea naiz .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Ihardets ceçan Pilatec , Scribatu dudana , scribatu dut .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Bada gendarmeséc Iesus crucificatu çutenean har citzaten haren abillamenduac , ( eta eguin citzaten laur parte , gendarmesetaric batbederari ceini bere partea ) iaca - ere har ceçaten : eta iacá cen iostura gabe gainetic gucia ehoa .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Erran ceçaten bada bere artean , Ezteçagula hura erdira , baina daguigun harçaz çorthe ceinen içanen den : eta haur , Scriptura compli ledinçát , dioela , Ene abillamenduac partitu vkan dituzté bere artean , eta ene abillamenduaren gainean çorthe egotzi vkan duté . Bada gendarmeséc gauça hauc eguin citzaten .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Eta ceuden Iesusen crutzearen aldean , haren ama eta haren amaren ahizpá , Maria Cleopasena eta Maria Magdalena .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Ikus citzanean bada Iesusec bere ama , eta maite çuen discipulua han cegoela , diotsa bere amari , Emazteá , horrá hire semea .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Guero diotsa discipuluari , Horrá hire ama . Eta orduandanic recebi ceçan hura discipuluac beregana .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Guero nola baitzaquian Iesusec ecen berce gauça guciac ia complitu ciradela , compli ledinçát Scripturá , erran ceçan , Egarri naiz .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Eta vncibat cen han vinagrez betheric eçarria . Eta hec bethe ceçaten spongiabat vinagrez , eta hissopoaren inguruän eçarriric , presenta cieçoten ahora .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Eta hartu çuenean Iesusec vinagrea , erran ceçan , Gucia complitu da : eta buruä beheraturic renda ceçan spiritua .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Orduan Iuduéc ezlaudençat crutzean gorputzac Sabbathoan , ceren orduan baitzén preparationeco eguna : ( ecen Sabbath hartaco egun handia cen ) othoitz ceguioten Pilati hauts litecen hayén çangoac , eta ken litecen .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Ethor citecen bada gendarmesac , eta hauts citzaten lehenaren çangoac , eta berce harequin crucificatu cenarenac .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Baina Iesusgana ethor citecenean , ikussiric ia hura hil cela etzitzaten hauts haren çangoac .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Baina gendarmesetaric batec dardoaz haren seihetsa iragan ceçan , eta bertan ilki cedin odol eta vr .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Eta ikussi duenac testificatu vkan du , eta eguiazcoa da haren testimoniagea : harc badaqui ecen eguiác erraiten dituela , çuec - ere sinhets deçaçuençát .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Ecen gauça hauc eguin içan dirade Scriptura compli ledinçát , Ezta hautsiren haren heçurric .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Eta berriz berce Scriptura batec erraiten du , Ikussiren duté nor çulhatu dutén .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Gauça hauen ondoan othoitz eguin cieçön Pilati Ioseph Arimatheacoac ( cein baitzén Iesusen discipulu , baina ichilizco , Iuduén beldurrez ) ken leçan Iesusen gorputza : eta permetti cieçón Pilatec . Ethor cedin bada eta ken ceçan Iesusen gorputza .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Eta ethor cedin Nicodemo - ere ( ethorri içan cena Iesusgana gauaz lehenic ) ekarten çuela myrrhazco eta aloesezco quasi ehun liberataco mixtionebat .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Har ceçaten orduan Iesusen gorputza , eta lot ceçaten hura mihistoihalez aromatezco vssainequin , nola costuma baitute Iuduéc ohorzteco .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Eta hura crucificatu içan cen leku hartan cen baratzebat , eta baratzean monument berribat , ceinetan oraino ezpaitzén nehor eçarri içan .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Han bada , Iuduén preparationeco egunaren causaz , ceren hurbil baitzén monumenta , eçar ceçaten Iesus .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Eta Sabbathoén lehen egunean Maria Magdalena ethorten da goicean , oraino ilhun celaric monumentera : eta ikusten du harria monumentetic aldaratua .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Orduan laster eguiten du eta ethorten da Simon Pierrisgana , eta berce discipulu Iesusec maite çuenagana , eta dioste , Kendu duté Iauna monumentetic , eta eztaquigu non eçarri dutén .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Ilki cedin bada Pierris , eta berce discipulu hura , eta ethor citecen monumentera .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Eta lasterca cioacen biac elkarrequin : baina berce discipulu hura aitzin cequión Pierrisi , eta lehen ethor cedin monumentera .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Eta beheitituric ikus citzan oihalac aldaratuac : badaric - ere etzedin sar .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Ethorten da orduan Simon Pierris hari darreicola , eta sar cedin monumentera , eta ikus citzan oihalac han eçarriac :

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Eta haren buru gainean içan cen crobitcheta , ez oihalequin eçarria , baina appart biribilgatua leku batetara .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Orduan bada sar cedin berce discipulu monumentera lehenic ethorri içan cen hura - ere , eta ikus ceçan , eta sinhets ceçan .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Ecen oraino etzaquiten Scripturá , ecen behar cela hura hiletaric resuscita ledin .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Itzul citecen bada discipuluac beretarat .
