text2: Guciac aldaratu içan dirade , eta guciac elkarrequin inutil eguin içan dirade : ezta ontassunic eguiten duenic , ez batetarano .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Sepulchre irequibat da hayén eztarria : bere mihiéz enganiotara vsatu vkan duté : sugue aspic - aren poçoina da hayén ezpainetan .

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: Hayén ahoa maledictionez eta karminduraz bethea da .

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: Arin dirade hayén oinac odol issurtera .

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: Destructione eta miseria hayén bidetan .

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: Eta bide baquezcoa eztute eçagutu vkan .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Ezta Iaincoaren beldurra hayen beguién aitzinean .

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Eta badaquigu ecen cerere Legueac erraiten baitu , Leguean diradeney erraiten drauela : aho gucia boça dadinçát , eta mundu gucia hoguendun dençát Iaincoaren aitzinean .

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: Hunegatic Leguearen obréz ezta iustificaturen haraguiric batre haren aitzinean : ecen Legueaz da bekatuaren eçagutzea .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: Baina orain Leguea gabe Iaincoaren iustitiá manifestatu içan da , Leguearen eta Prophetén testimoniagea duela .

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: Bada Iaincoaren iustitiá , Iesus Christen fedez sinhesten duten gucietara eta gucién gainera : ecen ezta differentiaric batre : ikussiric ecen guciéc bekatu eguin dutela , eta Iaincoaren gloriaren falta diradela .

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: Eta iustificatzen dirade dohainic haren gratiaz , Iesus Christ Iaunean eguin içan den redemptioneaz :

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: Cein ordenatu baitu Iaincoac fedeazco appacegagarri haren odolean , bere iustitiaren declaratzeco , aitzineco bekatuén barkamenduagatic , Iaincoaren patientiáz :

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: Diot bere iustitiaren declaratzeco dembora hunetan : bera iusto dencát , eta Iesusen fedeco denaren iustificaçale .

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: Non da beraz vantationea ? iraitzi içan da . Cein leguez ? obrenaz ? Ez : baina fedearen legueaz .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Concluditzen dugu beraz , fedez iustificatzen dela guiçona Leguearen obrác gabe .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Ala Iuduén ber da Iaincoa ? ala ez Gentilen - ere ? guerthuqui Gentilen - ere .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Ecen bat da Iaincoa , ceinec iustificaturen baitu circoncisionea fedetic , eta preputioa fedeaz .

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: Leguea bada ez deus bilhatzen dugu fedeaz ? Guertha eztadila : aitzitic Leguea confirmatzen dugu .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: Cer beraz erranen dugu gure aita Abrahamec eriden duela haraguiaren arauez ?

text: For if Abraham were justified by works , he hath whereof to glory ; but not before God .
text2: Ecen baldin Abraham obréz iustificatu içan bada , badu cerçaz gloria dadin , baina ez Iaincoa baithan .

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: Baina cer dio Scripturác ? Sinhetsi vkan du Abrahamec Iaincoa , eta imputatu içan çayó iustitiatara .

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Baina obratzen duenari alocairua etzayó gratiatan contatzen baina hartzetan :

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: Ordea obratzen eztuenari , baina gaichtoa iustificatzen duena baithan sinhesten duenari , bere fedea iustitiatan contatzen çayó .

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: Nola Dauidec - ere declaratzen baitu Iaincoac obrác gabe iustitiá imputatzen draucan guiçonaren dohain - ontassuna , dioela ,

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: Dohatsu dirade ceinén iniquitateac quittatu içan baitirade eta ceinén bekatuac estali içan baitirade .

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: Dohatsu da Iaunac bekatua imputatu eztrauqueon guiçona .

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: Bada dohain - ontassun haur , circoncisionean da solament ala bay preputioan - ere ? Ecen erraiten dugu imputatu içan çayola Abrahami fedea iustitiatan .

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Nola bada imputatu içan çayo ? circoncisionean cela , ala preputioan ? ez circoncisionean , baina preputioan .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Guero recebi ceçan circoncisionearen seignalea , fedealen iustitiataco cigulutan cein baitzen preputioan : preputioan diradela sinhesten duten gucién aita licençát , hæy - ere iustitiá imputa lequiençát :

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: Eta circonsionearen aita , erran nahi da , ez circoncisionecoén solament , baina gure aita Abrahamen fede preputioan çuenaren hatzari darreizconen - ere .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Ecen promessa etzayó Legueaz heldu içan Abrahami , edo haren haciari , munduaren heredero içateco , baina fedeazco iustitiáz .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Ecen baldin Leguetic diradenac , heredero badirade ezdeus bilhatu da fedea , eta iraungui da promessa .

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: Ceren Legueac hirá engendratzen baitu : ecen non ezpaita legueric , han ezta transgressioneric

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Harren fedez da heretagea , gratiaz dençát , promessa haci guciaren fermu dençát : ez Leguetic den haciaren solament , baina Abrahamen fedetic denaren - ere , cein baita gure gución aita ,

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: ( Scribatua den beçala , Anhitz nationeren aita ordenatu vkan aut ) Iaincoaren aitzinean , cein sinhetsi vkan baitu : ceinec hiley vicitze emaiten baitraue , eta deitzen baititu eztiraden gauçác balirade beçala .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Ceinec sperançaren contra sperançaz sinhets baitzeçan , anhitz nationeren aita içanen cela : erran içan çayonaren araura , Hala içanen duc hire hacia .

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: Eta fedean flaccu ez içanez , etzeçan behá bere gorputz ia hilera , ehun vrtheren inguruä baçuen - ere : ezeta Sararen vmunci ia hilera .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Eta Iaincoaren promessaren gainean etzeçan duda incredulitatez : baina fortifica cedin fedez Iaincoari gloria emanic :

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: Eta frangoqui seguraturic , ecen hari promes eguin ceraucana , botheretsu cela eguiteco - ere .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Halacotz haur - ere iustitiatan imputatu içan çayo .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Eta ezta scribatu içan harengatic solament , ecen haur iustitiatan imputatu içan çayola :

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: Baina guregatic - ere , ceini imputaturen baitzaicu , Iesus gure Iauna hiletaric resuscitatu duena baithan sinhesten dugunoy ,

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Cein heriotara liuratu içan baita gure bekatuacgatic , eta resuscitatu gure iustificationeagatic .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Iustificaturic bada Fedez , dugu baque Iaincoa baithara Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz .

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: Ceinez are vkan baitugu sartze haur fedez gratia hunetara , ceinetan fermu baicaude , eta gloriatzen baicara Iaincoaren gloriaren sperançán .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Eta ez haur solament , baina are gloriatzen gara tribulationetan , daquigularic ecen tribulationeac patientia ekarten duela .

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: Eta patientiác experientia , eta experientiac sperançá .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Eta sperançác eztu confunditzen , ceren Iaincoaren amorioa eraitsia baita gure bihotzetan eman içan çaicun Spiritu sainduaz .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Ecen Christ , oraino indar gabe guinela , bere demborán infidelacgatic hil içan da .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Ecen miraz iustoagatic nehor hiltzen da : baina aguian norbeit ventura leite cembeit vnguieguilegatic hiltzera .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: Baina certificatzen du bere charitatea gu baithara Iaincoac , ceren oraino bekatutara abandonnatuac guinela , Christ guregatic hil içan baita .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Anhitzez areago beraz orain haren odolaz iustificaturic , harçaz salbu içanen gara hiratic .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Ecen baldin etsay guinela reconciliatu içan bagara Iaincoagana haren Semearen herioaz , anhitzez areago reconciliaturic saluaturen gara haren viciaz .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: Eta ez haur solament baina gloriatzen - ere bagara Iaincoa baithan Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz , ceinez orain reconciliatione recebitu baitugu .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: Halacotz , nola guiçon - batez bekatua mundura sarthu içan baita , eta bekatuaz herioa : eta halaz guiçon gucietara herioa heldu içan da , ceren guciéc bekatu eguin baituté .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Ecen Leguerano bekatua munduan cen , baina bekatua ezta imputatzen legueric eztenean

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: Baina regnatu vkan du herioac Adamganic Moysesganano , bekaturic eguin eztutenén gainean - ere Adamen transgressionearen façoinera cein baita ethorteco cenaren figura .

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: Baina dohaina ezta offensá beçala : ecen baldin baten offensáz anhitz hil içan badirade , anhitzez areago Iaincoaren gratiá , eta guiçon - batez den gratiaren dohaina , cein baita Iesus Christ anhitzetara abondatu içan da .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Eta ezta dohaina bekatu eguin duen batez sarthu içan den gaucá beçala : ecen hoguena offensa batetaric sarthu içan da condemnationetan : baina dohaina , da anhitz offensataric iustificationetan .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: Ecen baldin baten offensaz herioac regnatu vkan badu , anhitzez areago iustitiazco gratiaren eta dohainaren abundantiá recebitzen dutenéc vicitzetara regnaturen duté Iesus Christ batez .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Bada nola offensa batez hoguena ethorri baita guiçon gucietara condemnationetan : hala iustificatzen gaituen iustitia batez ethorri da dohaina - ere guiçon gucietara vicitzezco iustificationetan .

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: Ecen nola guiçon baten desobedientiáz , bekatore anhitz eguin içan baitirade , hala baten obedientiáz iusto anhitz eguinen dirade .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Eta Leguea berçalde sarthu içan da handi ledinçat offensá : baina non handitu içan baita bekatua , han abundosago içan da gratiá :

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Nola regnatu baitu bekatuac heriotara , hala gratiác - ere regna leçançát iustitiaz vicitze eternaletara , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: Cer erranen dugu beraz ? egonen gara bekatutan , gratiá abunda dadinçát ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: Guertha eztadila . Ecen bekatuari hil içan gaizquionac , nola hartan oraino vicico gara ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: Ala eztaquiçue ecen Iesus Christ Iaunean batheyatu içan garen gucioc , haren herioan batheyatu içan garela ?

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Ohortze içan gara bada harequin batean Baptismoaz haren herioan : nola resuscitatu içan baita Christ hiletaric Aitaren gloriaz , hala gu - ere vicitze berritan ebil gaitecençát .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: Ecen baldin harequin chartatuac bagara haren hiltzearen conformitatez , haren resurrectionearen conformitatez - ere içanen gara .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Haur daquigularic ecen gure guiçon çaharra harequin crucificatu içan dela , deseguin dadinçát bekatuaren gorputza , guehiagoric bekatua cerbitza ezteçagunçát .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Ecen hil dena libre da bekatutaric .

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: Eta baldin hil bagara Christequin , sinhesten dugu vicico - ere harequin garela :

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Daquigularic ecen Christ hiletaric resuscitaturic , eztela guehiagoric hiltzen , herioac eztuela haren gainean guehiago dominationeric .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Ecen hil içan dena , bekatuari hil içan çayó behingotz : baina vici dena , Iaincoari vici çayó .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Hala çuec - ere estima eçaçue bekatuari hil çaizquiotela , baina Iaincoari vici çaizquiotela Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Ezteçala bada regna bekatuac çuen gorputz mortalean , haren guthicietan bekatua obedi deçaçuençát .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Eta eztietzoçuela applica çuen membroac iniquitatezco harma içateco bekatuari : baina applica ietzoçue çuen buruäc Iaincoari , hiletaric viztu anço : eta çuen membroac iustitiataco harma içateco Iaincoari .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Ecen bekatuac eztu çuen gainean dominationeric vkanen : ecen etzarete Leguearen azpian , baina gratiaren azpian .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Cer bada ? eguinen dugu bekatu , ceren Leguearen azpian ezgarén , baina gratiaren azpian ? Guertha eztadila .

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Ala eztaquiçue ecen noren - ere obeditzera cerbitzari iarten baitzarete , obeditzen duçuenaren cerbitzari çaretela : edo bekatuaren heriotara , edo obedientiaren iustitiatara ?

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Bada esquer Iaincoari ceren bekatuaren cerbitzari içan baitzarete , baina bihotzetic obeditu baituçue doctrinaren formá , ceinetara eman içan baitzarete :

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Eta bekatuaren azpitic ilkiric , iustitiaren cerbitzari eguin içan baitzarete .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Guiçonén ançora minço naiz çuen haraguiaren infirmitatearen causaz . Bada nola applicatu baitituçue çuen membroac cerbitzatzeco satsutassunari eta iniquitateari iniquitate eguitera : hala orain applicaitzaçue çuen membroac cerbitzatzeco iustitiari saindutassunetara

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Ecen bekatuaren cerbitzari cinetenean : libré cineten iustitiaz den becembatean .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Cer fructu cenduten bada orduan orain ahalque çareten gauça hetaric ? ecen hayén fina , herioa da .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Baina orain bekatuaren azpitic libreturic , eta Iaincoaren cerbitzari eguinic , baduçue çuen fructua saindutassunetan : eta fina , vicitze eternala .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ecen bekatuaren gageac , herioa : eta Iaincoaren dohaina da vicitze eternala Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Ala eztaquiçue , anayeác , ( ecen Leguea eçagutzen duteney minço natzaye ) nola Legueac dominatione duen guiçonaren gainean vici den artean ?

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Ecen emazte ezcondua , senharra vici dueno obligatua da Legueaz : baina baldin senharra hil badadi , libre da senharraren leguetic .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Beraz senharra vici deno adultera deithuren da , berce senhar baten emazte eguin badadi : baina senharra hil badadi legue hartaric libre da : hala non ezpaitate adultera baldin berce senhar baten emazte eguin badadi .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Bada , ene anayeác , çuec - ere Legueari hil çaizquiote Christen gorputzean : berce , hiletaric resuscitatu den baten çaretençát : Iaincoari fructifica dieçogunçat .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Ecen haraguian guinenean , bekatuén affectione Legueaz ciradenéc indar çuten gure membroetan , herioari fructificatzeco .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Baina orain Leguetic libre gara , hari hil içanic ceinetan hatzamanac baiquineunden : spirituzco berritassunetan cerbitza deçagunçát , eta ez letrazco çahartassunetan .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Cer erranen dugu beraz ? Leguea bekatu da ? Guertha eztadila . Aitzitic bekatua eztut eçagutu vkan Legueaz baicen . Ecen eznuqueen eçagutu guthiciá baldin legueac erran ezpalu , Eztuc guthiciaturen .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Baina bekatuac occasione harturic manamenduaz engendratu vkan du nitan guthicia gucia . Ecen Leguea gabe , hila da bekatua .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Ecen ni vici nincén Leguea gabe noizpait : baina manamendua ethorri denean , bekatua berriz vitzen hassi içan da .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Eta ni hil içan naiz : eta eriden içan da vicitzetaco ordenatu ceitadan manamendua , heriotara itzultzen çaitadala .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Ecen bekatuac occasione harturic , seducitu nau manamenduaz eta harçaz hil vkan nau .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Bada Legueaz den becembatean hura saindu da , eta manamendua saindu eta iusto eta on .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Beraz on den gauçá herio eguin içan çait ? Guertha eztadila : aitzitic bekatuac , bekatu cela aguer ledinçát , on den gauçáz herioa engendratu vkan draut , bekatua excessiuoqui bekatore eguin ledin manamenduaz .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Ecen badaquigu Leguea spiritual dela : baina ni carnal naiz , bekatuaren azpira saldua .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Ecen eguiten dudana , etzait on : ecen eztut cer nahi baitut , hura eguiten : baina ceri gaitz baitaritzat , hura eguiten dut .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Bada baldin cer nahi ezpaitut , hura eguiten badut , consentitzen draucat Legueari , ecen ona dela .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Bada orain guehiagoric eznaiz ni hura eguiten dudana , baina nitan habitatzen den bekatua .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Ecen badaquit eztela habitatzen nitan ( erran nahi baita , ene haraguian ) onic : ecen nahia bada nitan , baina onaren complitzea , eztut erideiten .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Ecen nahi dudan vnguia eztut eguiten : baina nahi eztudan gaizquia eguiten dut .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Bada baldin cer nic nahi ezpaitut hura eguiten badut , eznaiz guehiagoric ni , hura eguiten dudana , baina nitan habitatzen den bekatua .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Erideiten dut beraz legue haur nitan , vnguia eguin nahi dudanean , ecen gaizquia datchetala niri .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Ecen atseguin hartzen dut Iaincoaren Leguean barneco guiçonaz den becembatean :

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Baina badacussat berce leguebat neure membroetan , ene adimenduco leguearen contra bataillatzen denic , eta ene membroetan den bekatuaren legueari gathibatzen nerauconic .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Helas guiçon miserablea ni , norc idoquiren nau herio hunetaco gorputzetic ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Esquerrac emaiten drautzat Iaincoari Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz . Bada nic neurorrec adimenduaz cerbitzatzen dut Iaincoaren Leguea , baina haraguiaz bekatuaren leguea .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Beraz orain ezta condemnationeric batre Iesus Christean diradenençát : erran nahi da , haraguiaren araura ebilten eztiradenen , baina spirituaren araura .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Ecen Iesus Christ Iaunean den vicitzetaco Spirituaren Legueac libre eguin nau bekatuaren eta herioaren leguetic .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Ecen Leguearen impotentiác deus ecin çaidianean haraguian , Iaincoac igorriric bere Seme propria bekatutaco haraguiaren formán , eta bekatuagatic , condemnatu vkan du bekatua haraguian .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Leguearen iustitiá compli dadinçát gutan , haraguiaren araura ezgabiltzanotan , baina Spirituaren araura .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Ecen haraguiaren arauezco diradenac haraguiaren gaucetara dirade affectionatu : baina Spirituaren arauezcoac , Spirituaren gaucetara .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Eta haraguiaren affectionea , herio da : baina Spirituaren affectionea , vicitze eta baque :

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Ceren haraguiaren affectionea etsaigoa baita Iaincoaren contra : ecen Iaincoaren Leguearen ezta suiet : eta ecin - ere daite .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Beraz haraguian diradenac , Iaincoari placent ecin dirateque .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Ordea çuec etzarete haraguian , baina Spirituan : baldin behinçát Iaincoaren Spiritua habitatzen bada çuetan : baina baldin edoceinec Christen Spiritua ezpadu , haina ezta haren .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Eta baldin Christ çuetan bada , gorputza behinçát hil da bekatuaren causaz : baina Spiritua da vicitzea iustitiaren causaz .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Bada baldin Iesus hiletaric resuscitatu duenaren Spiritua habitatzen bada çuetan , Christ hiletaric resuscitatu duenac , viuificaturen ditu çuen gorputz mortalac - ere bere Spiritu çuetan habitatzen denaren causaz .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Halacotz bada , anayeác , çordun gara , ez haraguiagana , haraguiaren araura vicitzeco , baina Spirituagana .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Ecen baldin haraguiaren araura vici baçarete , hilen çarete : baina baldin Spirituaz gorputzaren eguitateac mortificatzen badituçue , vicico çarete .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren Spirituaz gobernatzen diraden guciac , Iaincoaren haour dirade .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Ecen eztuçue suiectionetaco spiritubat recebitu , berriz beldurretan içateco : baina recebitu duçue adoptionezco spiritua , ceinez oihu eguiten baitugu Abba , erran nahi baita , Aita .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Spiritu hunec berac testificatzen du gure spirituarequin batean , ecen Iaincoaren haour garela .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Eta baldin haour bagara , bayeta heredero : heredero , diot , Iaincoaren , eta Christen herederoquide , baldin ordea harequin batean suffritzen badugu , harequin batean glorifica gaitecençat .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Ecen estimatzen dut dembora hunetaco suffrimenduac eztiradela comparatzeco ethorteco den gloria gutan manifestaturen denarequin .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Ecen creaturác desir handiz beguira daude noiz Iaincoaren haourrac manifesta daitezqueen .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Ecen creaturác vanitatetara suiet dirade , ez bere nahiz , baina sperançaren azpian suiectionetan eçarri dituenaren causaz , hec - ere deliuraturen diradela corruptionearen suiectionetic , Iaincoaren haourrén gloriaren libertatean içateco .

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Ecen badaquigu creatura guciac suspirioz elkarrequin daudela , eta penatan diradela oraindrano .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Eta ez hec solament , baina gu - ere Spirituaren primitiác ditugula , gueuroc gure baithan suspirioz gaude , adoptionearen beguira gaudela , gure gorputzaren deliurançaren diot .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Ecen sperançaz saluatu içan gara . Eta ikusten den sperançá , ezta sperança : ecen nehorc ikusten duena , certaco spera leçaque ?

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Baina baldin ikusten eztugunaz sperança badugu , patientiaz iguriquiten dugu .

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Eta halaber Spirituac - ere arincen ditu gure infirmitateac , ecen cerçaz othoitz eguin behar dugun bide beçala , eztaquigu : baina Spiritua bera othoiztez dago guregatic erran ecin daitezqueen suspirioz .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Baina bihotzac examinatzen dituenac badaqui , ceric den Spirituaren affectionea : ecen Iaincoaren araura othoitz eguiten du sainduacgatic .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Badaquigu halaber ecen Iaincoari on daritzoteney gauça guciac elkarrequin aiutatzen çaiztela onetara , iaquiteco da , haren ordenançaren araura deithu diradeney .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Ecen lehenetic cein eçagutu baititu hec predestinatu - ere ditu bere Semearen imaginaren conforme içateco , hura dençát lehen iayoa anhitz anayeren artean .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Eta cein predestinatu baititu , hec deithu - ere ditu : eta cein deithu baititu , hec iustificatu - ere ditu : eta cein iustificatu baititu hec glorificatu - ere ditu .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Cer bada erranen dugu gauça hautara ? Baldin Iaincoa gure alde bada , nor içanen da gure contra ?

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Ceinec bere Seme propria ezpaitu guppida vkan , baina gure guciongatic eman vkan baitu , nola eztrauzquigu gauça guciac - ere harequin emanen ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Norc produituren du accusationeric Iaincoaren elegituén contra ? Iaincoa da iustificatzen duena .

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Nor da condemnaturen duena ? Christ da hil içan dena , baina are resuscitatu - ere dena : Iaincoaren escuinean - ere dena , eta guregatic othoitz eguiten duena .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Norc separaturen gaitu gu Christen amoriotic ? ala tribulationec , ala hersturac , ala persecutionec , ala gossetec , ala billuci içatec , ala perilec , ala ezpatac ?

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Scribatua den beçala , Hire causaz hiltzen gaituc egun oroz : estimatu içan gaituc haraquinçaco ardién pare .

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Baina gauça hautan guciotan victorioso bainoago gara , gu onhetsi gaituenaren partez .

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Ecen segur naiz ecen ez herioc , ez vicitzec , ez Aingueruèc , ez principaltassunéc , ez botheréc , ez presenteco gaucéc , ez ethortecoéc :

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Ez goratassunec , ez barnatassunec , ez berce creaturac batec - ere ecin separaturen gaituela Iaincoaren amorio Iesus Christ gure Iaunean ekarri draucunetic .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Eguia diot Christean , eztiot gueçurric , neure conscientiác halaber testificatzen drautalaric Spiritu sainduaz ,

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Ecen tristitia handia , eta tormenta ardurazcoa dudala neure bihotzean .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Ecen desir nuque ni neuror Christganic separatua nincén neure anayeacgatic , cein baitirade ene ahaide haraguiaren arauez :

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Cein baitirade Israeltár : ceinena baita adoptionea , eta gloriá , eta alliançác , eta Leguearen ordenançá , eta cerbitzu diuinoa eta promessac :

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Ceinenac baitirade Aitác , eta hetaric da Christ haraguiaren arauez , cein baita gauça gucién gaineco Iainco , eternalqui benedicatua . Amen .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Badaric - ere ecin date Iaincoaren hitza erori den : ecen eztirade Israeleco diraden guciac , Israel .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Eta ceren Abrahamen haci diraden eztirade halacotz guciac haour , baina Isaactan haci deithuren çaic hiri .

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Erran nahi da , eztiradela haraguiaren haour diradenac , ha1acotz Iaincoaren haour : baina promessaren haour diradenac estimatzen diradela hacitan .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Ecen promessaren hitza haur da , Dembora hunetan ethorriren naiz , eta Sarac vkanen du semebat .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Eta ez haur solament , baina Rebeccac - ere batganic concebitu çuenean , baitzén , gure aita Isaacganic .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Ecen oraino haourrac sorthu gabe , eta hec vnguiric ez gaizquiric eguin gabe ( Iaincoaren ordenançá electionearen araura legoençát ,

text: It was said unto her , The elder shall serve the younger .
text2: Ez obrén baina deitzen duenaren partez ) erran içan çayon hari , Guehienac cerbitzaturen din chipiena .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Scribatua den beçala , Iacob onhetsi dut eta Esau gaitzetsi .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Cer beraz erranen dugu ? Ala da iniustitiaric Iaincoa baithan ? Guertha eztadila .

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Ecen Moysesi erraiten drauca , Pietate vkanen diát pietate eguin nahi vkanen draucadanaz , eta misericordia eguinen diarocat misericordia eguin nahi vkanen draucadanari .

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Halacotz beraz electionea ezta nahi duenaren , ez laster eguiten duenaren , baina Iainco misericordia eguiten duenaren .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Ecen badiotsa Scripturác Pharaori , Hunetacotz ber suscitatu aut , eracuts deçadançát hitan neure botherea , eta denuntia dadinçát ene icena lur gucian .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Beraz nahi duenari misericordia eguiten drauca , eta nahi duena gogortzen du .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Erranen drautac bada niri , Cergatic oraino arranguratzen da ? ecen nor da haren vorondateari resisti ahal dieçaqueona ?

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Bainaitzitic , o guiçoná , hi nor aiz Iaincoaren contra replicatzen duana ? Ala erranen drauca gauça moldatuac hura moldatu duenari , Cergatic hunelaco eguin nauc ?

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Ala eztu lur - tupinaguileac orhe ber batetaric eguiteco bothere , vnci bataren ohoretaco , eta bercearen desohoretaco ?

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Eta cer da , baldin eracutsi nahiz Iaincoac hirá , eta eçagut eraci nahiz bere botherea , suffritu baditu patientia handitan hirazco vnci galtzecotzat apprestatuac ?

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Eta bere gloriazco abrastassunén eçagut eraciteco misericordiazco vnci gloriataco apprestatu dituenetara ?

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Cein deithu - ere baititu diot gu , ez solament Iuduetaric , baina Gentiletaric - ere .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Nola Osea baithan - ere erraiten baitu , Deithuren dut ene populu etzena , neure populu : eta niçaz onhetsi etzena , neure onhetsi .

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Eta içanen da , erran içan çayen lekuan , Etzarete ene populu çuec , han deithuren baitirade Iainco viciaren haour .

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Esaias - ere oihuz dago Israelen gainean , Israeleco haourrén contua itsassoco sablea beçala licen orduan , restançác dirade saluaturen

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Ecen Iaunac acabatzen eta laburtzen du beharquia iustitiarequin : ceren beharqui laburtubat eguinen baitu Iaunac lurraren gainean .

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Eta lehen Esaiasec erran çuen beçala , Baldin armadén Iaunac vtzi ezpaleraucu hacia , Sodoma beçalacatu guinatequeen , eta Gomorrha irudi vkan guenduqueen .

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Cer beraz erranen dugu ? Ecen Gentil iustitiari etzarreitzanéc , iustitia ardietsl vkan dutela : etare iustitia fedezcoa :

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Baina Israel , iustitiazco Legueari çarreicalaric , iustitiazco Leguera eztela heldu içan .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: Cergatic ? ceren ezpaita haur içan fedez , baina Legueco obréz beçala : ecen behaztopatu içan dirade behaztopagarrico harrian .

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Scribatua den beçala , Huná , eçarten dut Sionen behaztopagarrico harria , eta trebucagarrico harria : eta nor - ere baita hura baithan sinhesten duena , ezta confus içanen .

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Anayeác , ene bihotzeco affectione ona eta Iaincoagana Israelgatic eguiten dudan othoitzá da salua ditecen .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Ecen testimoniage ekarten drauet , nola Iaincoaren zeloa badutén , baina ez scientiaren araura .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren iustitiá eçagutzen eztutelaric , eta bere iustitia fundatu nahiz dabiltzalaric , Iaincoaren iustitiari etzaizca susmettitu .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Ecen Leguearen fina Christ da , sinhesten duen guciaren iustitiatan .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Ecen Moysesec - ere scribatzen du Leguetic den iustitiáz , Ecen gauça hec eguinen dituen guiçona , heçaz vicico dela .

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Baina fedez den iustitiác , hunela erraiten du , Ezterrála eure bihotzean , Nor iganen da cerura ? hori duc Christen garaitic erekartea .

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: Edo , nor iautsiren da abysmera ? hori duc Christen hiletaric harçara erekartea .

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: Baina cer erraiten du ? Hire hurbil duc hitza hire ahoan eta hire bihotzean . Haur da fedeazco hitz predicatzen duguna .

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Ecen baldin confessa badeçac eure ahoz Iesus Iauna , eta eure bihotzean sinhets badeçac , ecen Iaincoac hura hiletaric resuscitatu duela , saluaturen aiz .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Ecen bihotzez sinhesten da iustificatu içateco , eta ahoz confssione eguiten saluatu içateco .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Ecen erraiten du Scripturác , Nor - ere baita hura baithan sinhesten duena , ezta confus içanen .

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Ecen ezta differentiaric Iuduaren eta Grecoaren artean : ecen gucién Iaun bera da abrats , hura inuocatzen duten gucietara .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Ecen norere baita Iaunaren icena inuocaturen duena , saluaturen da .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Nolatan bada inuocaturen duté hura baithan sinhetsi vkan eztutenéc : eta nolatan sinhetsiren duté harçaz ençun vkan eztutenéc ? eta nolatan ençunen duté predicaçaleric gabe ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Eta nolatan predicaturen duté baldin igor ezpaditez ? scribatua den beçala , O cein eder diraden baquea euangelizatzen dutenén oinac , gauça onac euangelizatzen dituztenenac !

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Baina guciac etzaizquio behatu içan Euangelioari , ecen Esaiasec erraiten du , Iauna , norc sinhetsi du gure predicationea ?

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Beraz fedea ençutetic da : eta ençutea Iaincoaren hitzaz .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Baina galdez nago , ala eztute ençun vkan ? Bainaitzitic lur orotara ilki içan da hayen soinuä , eta munduaren bazterretarano hayén hitzac .

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Baina galdez nago , ala Israelec eztu Iaincoa eçagutu vkan ? Lehenic Moysesec erraiten du , Nic ielosgoatara prouocaturen çaituztét gende gende - eztenaz , gende adimendu gabe batez asserre eraciren çaituztét .

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Eta Esaiasec hardieça hartzen du , eta erraiten , Eriden içan naiz bilhatzen eznindutenéz , eta claroqui aguertu içan natzaye ene galderic eguiten etzuteney .

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Baina Israelez den becembatean erraiten du , Egun gucian hedatu vkan ditut neure escuac populu desobedientagana eta contrastatzen denagana .

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Galdez nago bada , Ala iraitzi vkan du Iaincoac bere populua ? Guertha eztadila : ecen ni - ere Israeltár naiz , Abrahamen hacitic , Beniaminen leinutic .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Eztu iraitzi Iaincoac bere populu lehenetic eçagutua . Ala eztaquiçue Eliasez cer erraiten duen Scripturác ? nola requesta eguiten draucan Iaincoari Israelen contra , dioela ,

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: Iauna hire Prophetác hil citié , eta hire aldareac deseguin citié , eta ni azquendu içan nauc neuror , eta ene arimaren ondoan diabiltzac .

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Baina cer diotsa hari reposta diuinoac ? Reseruatu citiát neurorrendaco çazpi milla guiçon belhaunic Baalen imaginari plegatu eztraucatenic .

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Hala bada dembora hunetan - ere , reseruatione gratiazco electionearen arauez eguin içan da .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Eta baldin gratiaz , ez guehiagoric obréz : bercela gratiá guehiagoric ezta gratia : baina baldin obréz bada , guehiagoric ezta gratia : bercela obrá guehiagoric ezta obra .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: Cer beraz ? Bilhatzen çuena Israelec eztu ardietsi : eta electioneac ardietsi vkan du , eta goiticoac gogortu içan dirade ,

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Scribatua den beçala , Eman vkan draue Iaincoac spiritu ithobat : eta begui , ikus ezteçatençát : eta beharri , ençun ezteçatençát egungo egunerano .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Eta Dauid - ec erraiten du , Berén mahaina arte bilha bequié , eta laço eta trebucamendu , eta haur pagamendutan .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Ilhun bitez hayén beguiac , ikus ezteçatençát : eta hayén bizcarra bethiere makur eçac .

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Galdez nago bada , ala trebucatu içan dirade eror litecençat ? Guertha eztadila : baina hayén erorteaz saluamendua Gentiletara ethorri içan da , hæy iarreiquitera incitatzeco .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Eta baldin hayén erortea munduaren abrastassun bada , eta hayén diminutionea Gentilén abrastassun : cembatez areago hayén abundantia ?

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Ecen çuey Gentiloy diotsuet , ni Gentilén Apostolu naicen becembatean , neure ministerioa ohoratzen dut :

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: Eya nolazpait neure ahaideac ielos eraci ahal ditzaquedanez , eta hetaric batzu salua .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Ecen baldin hayén iraiztea munduaren reconciliatione bada , ceric içanen da receptionea , hiletaric vicitze baicen ?

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Eta baldin primitiác saindu badirade , bayeta orhea : eta baldin erroa saindu bada , bayeta adarrac .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Eta baldin adarretaric batzu hautsi içan badirade , eta hi bassa oliua incelaric , charthatu içan bahaiz hayén orde , eta oliua erroan eta vrinean participant eguin bahaiz ,

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Ezadila gloria adarrén contra : eta baldin gloriatzen bahaiz , eztuc hic erroa egarten , baina erroac hi .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Erranen duc bada , Hautsi içan dirade adarrac , ni chartha nendinçát .

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Vngui : hec infidelitatez hautsi içan dituc , eta hi fedez çutic ago : ezadila vrguluz hant , baina aicén beldur .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Ecen baldin Iaincoac adar naturalac guppida vkan ezpaditu , beguirauc hi - ere guppida ezauèn .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Ikussac beraz Iaincoaren benignitatea eta seueritatea : trebucatuetara , seueritatea : eta hiregana , benignitatea , baldin perseuera badeçac benignitatean : ezpere hi - ere ebaquiren aiz .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Eta hec - ere baldin perseuera ezpadeçate infidelitatean , charthaturen dituc , ecen Iaincoa botheretsu duc harçara hayén charthatzeco .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Ecen baldin hi naturaz bassa cen oliuatic ebaqui içan bahaiz , eta natura contra oliua onean charthatu bahaiz : cembatez areago natural diradenac charthaturen dirade bere oliua proprian ?

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Ecen eztut nahi ignora deçaçuen , anayeác , secretu haur , ( ceuroc baithan arrogant etzaretençat ) ecen gogortassuna parte Israeli ethorri içan çayola , Gentilén complimendua sar leiteno .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Eta hala Israel gucia saluaturen da , scribatua den beçala , Ethorriren da Siondic liberaçalea , eta aldaraturen ditu infidelitateac Iacobganic .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Eta alliança haur eneganic vkanen duté , Kendu dituquedanean hayén bekatuac .

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Euangelioaz den becembatean , bay etsay dirade çuen causaz , baina electioneaz den becembatean , onhetsiac , Aitén causaz .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Ecen dolu gabe dirade Iaincoaren dohainac eta vocationea .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Ecen nola çuec - ere noizpait Iaincoagana desobedient içan baitzarete : baina orain misericordia ardietsi baituçue hayén desobedient içanez :

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Hala hauc - ere orain eztuté obeditu vkan , çuey eguin çaiçuen misericordiaz hauc - ere misericordia ardiets deçatençát .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Ecen Iaincoac ertsi vkan ditu guciac desobedientiatan , guciey misericordia leguiençát .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: O Iaincoaren sapientiaren eta eçagutzearen abrastassunen barná ! ala haren iugemenduac baitirade comprehendi ecin daitezqueen beçalacoac , eta haren bideac erideiteco impossibleac !

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: Ecen norc eçagutu vkan du Iaunaren gogoa ? edo nor içan da haren conseillari ?

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: Edo norc lehenic eman drauca hari , eta rendaturen baitzayo ?

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Ecen harenganic , eta harçaz , eta harengatic dirade gauça guciac : hari gloria seculacotz . Amen .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Othoitz eguiten drauçuet bada , anayeác , Iaincoaren misericordién partez , offrenda ditzaçuen çuen gorputzac sacrificio vicitan , saindutan , Iaincoaren gogaracotan , cein baita çuen cerbitzu raçoinezcoa .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Eta etzaquitzotela conforma mundu huni , baina transforma çaiteztez çuen adimenduaren arramberritzez , phoroga deçaçuençát ceric den Iaincoaren vorondate ona eta placenta eta perfectoa .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Ecen niri eman içan çaitadan gratiáz , erraiten draucat çuen artecoetaric batbederari , ezteçan presumi iaquitera iaquin behar den baino guehiago , baina den çuhur sobrietatera : Iaincoac batbederari fedearen neurria repartitu draucan beçala .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Ecen nola gorputz batetan anhitz membro baitugu , eta membro guciéc ezpaitute operationebat bera :

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Hala anhitz garelaric gorputzbat gara Christ baithan eta batbedera gara bata bercearen membro .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Eta ditugula dohain diuersac , eman içan çaicun gratiaren araura , edo prophetia , deçagun prophetiza fedearen proportionearen arauez :

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: Edo ministerio , garen administrationean : edo iracasten ari dena , den instructione emaile .

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: Edo exhortatzen ari denac , exhorta deçan : distribuitzen ari denac , distribui deçan simplicitatetan : presiditzen duenac daguian diligentqui : misericordia eguiten duenac , daguian alegueraqui .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Charitatea den fictione gabe : çareten gaitzaren gaitzetsle , vnguiari eratchequiac .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Anayetassunezco charitatez elkarren onhestera emanac : elkarri ohoratzera aitzincen çaitzatela .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Cerbitzu eguitera ez nagui , spirituz ardént , Iauna cerbitzatzen duçuela .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Sperançaz aleguera çaretelaric , tribulationean patient , orationean perseueratzen duçuela .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Sainduén necessitatetara communicatzen duçuela : hospitalitateari iarreiquiten çaitzatela .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Benedicaitzaçue çuec persecutatzen çaituztenac : benedicaitzaçue , diot , eta ez maradica .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Aleguera çaitezte aleguera diradenequin , eta nigar eguiçue nigarrez daudenequin .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Gogo batez bata berceagana affectionatuac çaretelaric : gauça gorác affectatzen eztituçuelaric , baina beheretara accommodatzen çaretelaric . Etzaretela çuhur ceuroc baithan .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Ezteçoçuela nehori gaitza gaitzagatic renda . Procuraitzaçue gauça honestac guiçon gucién aitzinean .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Eguin albadadi , çuetan den becembatean , guiçon guciequin baquea duçuen .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Etzaiteztela ceuroc mendeca , ene maiteác , baina leku emoçue hirari : ecen scribatua da , Niri mendequioa : nic dut rendaturen , dio Iaunac .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Bada baldin gosse bada hire etsaya , emóc iatera : baldin egarri bada , emóc edatera : ecen hala eguiten duála suco ikatzac bere buru gainera bilduren drautzac .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Ezadila gaizquiaz garait , baina garait eçac vnguiaz gaizquia .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Persona gucia potestate goragoén suiet biz , ecen ezta potestateric Iaincoaganic baicen : eta diraden potestateac , Iaincoaz ordenatuac dirade .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Halacotz , potestateari resistitzen draucanac , Iaincoaren ordenançari resistitzen drauca : eta resistitzen dutenéc , bere buruén gainera damnatione erekarriren duté .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Ecen magistratuac eztirade icigarri , obra onacgatic , baina gaichtoagatic . Bada nahi duc potestatearen beldur ez içan ? eguic vngui , eta recebituren duc laudorio harenganic .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren cerbitzari duc hire onetacotz : baina gaizquiric badaguic , aicén beldur : ecen eztic causa gabe ezpatá ekarten : ecen Iaincoaren cerbitzari duc , mendecari hiratan , gaizqui eguiten duenaren gainean .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Harren behar da içan suiect ez hiragatic solament , baina conscientiagatic - ere .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Ecen halacotz tributac - ere pagatzen dituçue : ecen Iaincoaren ministre dirade , hunetara berera emplegatzen diradela .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Renda ieceçue bada guciey çor draueçuena : nori tributa , tributa : nori peagea , peagea : nori beldurra , beldurra : nori ohorea , ohorea .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Etzaretela nehorengana deusez çordun : elkarri on daritzoçuen baicen : ecen berceri on daritzanac , Leguea complitu du .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ecen haur , Ezaiz adultero içanen , Eztuc hilen , Eztuc ebatsiren , Eztuc falsu testimoniageric erranen , Eztuc guthiciaturen : eta baldin cembeit berce manamenduric bada , hitz hunetan sommarioqui comprehenditzen da , Onhetsiren duc eure hurcoa eure burua beçala .

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Charitateac hurcoari gaizquiric eztrauca eguiten . Beraz Leguearen complimendua , charitatea da .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Principalqui ikussiric sasoina , ecen ia ordu dela lotaric iratzar gaitecen : ecen orain hurbilago daucu saluamendua , ecen ez sinhetsi vkan dugunean .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Gauä iragan da eta eguna hurbildu . Iraitz ditzagun bada ilhumbearen obrác , eta vezti gaitecen arguiari dagocan abillamenduz .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Egunáz anco honestqui ebil gaitecen : ez gormandicetan eta hordiquerietan , ez ohatzetan eta insolentietan , ez gudutan eta inuidiatan .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: Baina vezti çaiteztez Iesus Christ Iaunaz , eta haraguiaz artharic eztuçuela haren guthicién complitzeco .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Eta fedez infirmo dena recebi eçaçue , baina ez disputationez iharduquitera .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Batac sinhesten du gauça gucietaric ian ahal deçaquela : eta berce infirmo denac belhar iaten du .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Iaten duenac , iaten eztuena ezteçan menosprecia : eta iaten eztuenac , iaten duena ezteçan iudica . Ecen Iaincoac hura bere recebitu vkan du .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: Hi nor aiz berceren cerbitzaria iudicatzen duana ? bere Iaunari fermu egoiten edo erorten ciayóc : baina fermaturen dic : ecen botheretsu duc Iaincoa haren fermatzeco .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Batac estimatzen du egun bata bercea bainoago , eta berceac estimatzen du bardin cein egun nahi den : batbedera biz segur bere conscientián .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Egunera behatzen duenac , Iaunagana behatzen du : eta egunera behatzen eztuenac , Iaunagana eztu behatzen . Iaten duenac , Iaunari iaten du : ecen regratiatzen du Iaincoa : eta iaten eztuenac , Iaunari eztu iaten , eta regratiatzen du Iaincoa .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Ecen ezta gutaric nehor bere buruäri vici , eta ezta nehor bere buruäri hiltzen .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Ecen edo dela vici garén , Iaunari vici gara : edo dela hiltzen garén , Iaunari hiltzen gara . Beraz nahi bada vici garén , nahi bada hiltzen garén , Iaunaren gara

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Ecen hunetacotzát Christ hil , eta resuscitatu , eta vicitara itzuli içan da , hambat hilén nola vicién gainean dominatione duençát .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Baina hic cergatic iudicatzen duc eure anayea ? edo hic - ere cergatic menospreciatzen duc eure anayea ? Ecen guciac comparituren gara Christen iudicioco throno aitzinean .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Ecen scribatua da , Vici naiz ni , dio Iaunac , ecen niri gurthuren çait belhaun gucia : eta mihi oroc laudorio emanen drauca Iaincoari .

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Bada segur gutaric batbederac bere buruaz contu rendaturen drauca Iaincoari .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Ezteçagula beraz guehiagoric elkar iudica , bainaitzitic hunetan iugemenduz vsat eçaçue , behaztopagarriric batre edo trebucagarriric çuen anayeri eçar ezteçoçuen .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Badaquit , eta segur naiz Iesus Iaunaren partez , eztela deus satsuric bere berez : salbu , cerbait satsu dela estimatzen duenaren , hura harendaco satsu baita .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Baina baldin viandagatic hire anayea tristetzen bada , ezabila ia charitatearen araura : ezteçála eure viandagatic hura gal , ceinagatic Christ hil içan baita .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Eztadila beraz çuen vnguia gaitz erran .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren resumá ezta ianhari ez edari : baina iustitia eta baque eta bozcario Spiritu sainduaz .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Ecen gauça hautan Christ cerbitzatzen duena , Iaincoaren gogaraco da , eta laudatua da guiçonéz .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Iarreiqui gaquiztén beraz baqueari dagozcan gaucey , eta elkarren edificationetaco diradeney .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Ezteçála hic viandaren causaz Iaunaren obra deseguin : eguia duc gauça guciac chahu diradela , baina gaizquia duc scandalorequin iaten duen guiçonaren .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: On duc haraguiric ez iatea , eta mahatsarnoric ez edatea , eta hire anaye behaztopatzen edo scandalizatzen , edo infirmo eguiten den gauçaren ez eguitea .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: Hic fede duc ? auc euror baithan Iaincoaren aitzinean . Dohatsu da bere buruä iudicatzen eztuena laudatzen duen gauçän .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Baina scrupulo eguiten duena , baldin ian badeça , iudicatua da : ecen eztu fedez iaten : eta fedetic eztén gucia bekatu da .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Eta behar ditugu fermu garenóc , infirmoén flaccatassunac supportatu , eta ez gure buruey complacitu .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Bada gutaric batbederac complaci beça bere hurcoa vnguira edificationetan .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Ecen Christec - ere eztu bere buruä complacitu nahi vkan , baina , scribatua den beçala , Hiri iniuria erraiten drauèanén iniuriác ene gainera erori içan dituc .

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Ecen aitzinetic scribatu diraden gauça guciac , gure doctrinatan scribatu içan dirade , Scripturetaco patientiaz eta consolationez sperança dugunçát .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Bada patientiataco eta consolationetaco Iaincoac diçuela elkarren artean gauça ber baten pensatzeco gratia Iesus Christen araura :

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gogo batez eta aho batez glorifica deçaçuençát Iaincoa , cein baita Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Aita .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Halacotz recebi eçaçue elkar , Christec - ere gu recebitu gaituen beçala Iaincoaren gloriatan .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Bada erraiten dut , Iesus Christ circonsionearen ministre içan dela , Iaincoaren eguiagatic , Aitey eguin çaizten promessac confirma litzançát :
