text2: Ala eztituçue etcheac hetan iateco eta edateco ? ala Iaincoaren Eliçá menospreciatzen duçue , eta ahalquetzen dituçue eztutenac ? Cer erranen drauçuet ? Laudaturen çaituztet hunetan ? etzaituztet laudatzen .

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Ecen nic recebitu vkan dut Iaunaganic eman - ere drauçuedana : nola Iesus Iaunac , traditu içan cen gauean , hartu çuen oguia :

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Eta gratiác rendaturic , hauts ceçan , eta erran ceçan , Har eçaçue , ian eçaçue : haur da ene gorputza çuengatic hausten dena : haur eguiçue ene memoriotan .

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Halaber copa - ere har ceçan affaldu cenean , cioela , Copa haur da Testamentu berria ene odolean : haur eguiçue , noiz - ere edanen baituçue , ene memoriotan .

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Ecen noiz - ere ianen baituçue ogui haur , eta copa haur edanen , Iaunaren herioa denuntiaturen duçue , dathorreno .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Halacotz , norc - ere ianen baitu ogui haur , edo edanen Iaunaren copá indignoqui , hoguendun içanen da Iaunaren gorputzaren eta odolaren

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Phoroga beça bada batbederac bere buruä , eta hunela ogui hartaric ian beça , eta copá hartaric edan .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: Ecen iaten eta edaten duenac indignoqui , bere condemnationea iaten eta edaten du , discernitzen eztuelaric Iaunaren gorputza .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Halacotz da çuen artean anhitz infirmoric , eta eriric , eta lo daunça anhitz .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Ecen segur baldin gure buruäc iugea baguinça , ezguintezque puni .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Baina punitzen garenean , Iaunaz instruitzen gara : munduarequin condemna ezgaitecençát .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Bada , ene anayeác , biltzen çaretenean iatera batac bercea iguriqui eçaçue .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: Eta baldin nehor gosse bada , etchean ian beça : condemnationetan bil etzaiteztençát . Eta garaitico gaucéz , nathorrenean ordonaturen duquet .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Dohain spiritualez den becembatean , anayeác , eztut nahi ignora deçaçuen .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Badaquiçue ecen Gentil içan çaretela , eta idola mutuén onduan guidatzen cineten beçala lasterca cinabiltzatela .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Halacotz iaquin eraciten drauçuet , ecen Iaincoaren Spirituaz minço denec batec - ere , eztuela erraiten Iesus maledictione dela : eta nehorc ecin derraqueela Iesus dela Iaun , Spiritu sainduaz baicen .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Eta dohainén differentiác badirade , baina Spiritu ber - bat da :

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Administrationén differentiac - ere badirade : baina Iaun ber - bat :

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Operationén differentiác - ere badirade : baina Iainco ber - bat da , ceinec eguiten baitu gucia gucietan .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Baina batbederari emaiten çayó spirituaren manifestationea probetchatzeco .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Ecen batari spirituaz emaiten çayó sapientiataco hitza , eta berceari eçagutzetaco hitza , spiritu beraren arauez :

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Eta berceari fedea , Spiritu harçaz beraz : eta berceari sendatzeco dohainac Spiritu harçaz beraz .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: Eta berceari , verthutén operationeac : eta berceari prophetiá : eta berceari , spirituen discretioneac : eta berceari , lengoagén diuersitateac : eta berceari , lengoagén interpretationea .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Baina gauça hauc guciac eguiten ditu , Spiritu bat harc eta berac , distribuituz hec particularqui batbederari , nahi duen beçala .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Ecen gorputza bat den beçala , eta baitu anhitz membro , baina gorputz batetaco membro guciac , anhitz diradelaric , gorputzbat dirade : hala da Christ - ere .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Ecen Spiritu batez gu gucioc batheyatu içan gara gorputzbat içateco , bada Iuduric , bada Grecoric , bada sclaboric , bada libreric : eta guciac edaran içan gara Spiritu ber batez .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Ecen gorputza - ere ezta membrobat , baina anhitz .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Baldin erran badeça oinac , Eznaiz escua , eznaiz gorputzeco : ezta halacotz gorputzeco ?

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Eta baldin erran badeça beharriac , Eznaiz beguia , eznaiz gorputzeco : ezta halacotz gorputzeco ?

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: Baldin gorputz gucia beguia bada , non içanen da ençutea ? baldin gucia ençutea bada , non içanen da senditzea ?

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: Baina orain eçarri vkan du Iaincoac membroetaric batbedera gorputzean , nahi vkan duen beçala .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: Ecen baldin guciac membrobat balirade non liçateque gorputza ?

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: Baina orain anhitz dirade membroac , badaric - ere gorputzbat .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: Eta ecin beguiac derraqueo escuari , Hire beharric eztiat : edo berriz buruäc oiney , Çuen beharric eztut .

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: Baina are guehiago dena gorputzeco membro infirmoen irudi dutenac , necessarioenac dirade .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Eta gorputzeco membro deshonestén diradela vste dugunac , ohoratuquienic estaltzen ditugu : eta gure membro deshonestenéc , ornamendu guehienic duté .

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: Eta gutan honest diraden partéc ornamendu beharric eztute : baina Iaincoac moderatu vkan du gorputza batean , falta çuenari ohore guehienic emanez :

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: Gorputzean diuisioneric eztençát , baina membroéc batac berceagatic ansia berbat dutén .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: Eta den membro batec cerbait suffritzen duen , membro guciéc harequin suffritzen duté : edo den membrobat ohoratzen den , membro guciac alegueratzen dirade elkarrequin .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Bada çuec çarete Christen gorputz , eta membro partez .

text: And God hath set some in the church , first apostles , secondarily prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , governments , diversities of tongues .
text2: Eta batzu eçarri vkan ditu Iaincoac Eliçán , lehenic Apostoluac , guero Prophetác , herenean Doctorac : eta guero verthuteac : guero sendatzeco dohainac , aiutác , gobernamenduac , lengoagén diuersitateac .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: Ala guciac dirade Apostolu ? ala guciac Propheta ? ala guciac doctor ? ala guciac verthutedun ?

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: Ala guciéc badute sendatzeco dohaina ? ala guciac lengoage diuersez minço dirade ? ala guciéc interpretatzen dute ?

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: Baina çareten dohain excellentenén guthicioso : eta oraino bide excellentagobat eracutsiren drauçuet .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Baldin guiçonén eta Aingueruen lengoagez minça banadi , eta charitateric eztudan , eguin naiz cobre soinu eguiten duenaren , edo cymbala dindatzen duenaren pare .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Eta baldin banu prophetiazco dohaina , eta naquizquian mysterio guciac eta scientia gucia : eta nuen fede gucia , hambat non mendiac transporta nitzan , eta charitateric eztudan , deus eznaiz .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Eta baldin distribui baditzat neure on guciac paubrén hatzeco , eta baldin eman badeçat neure gorputza erre içateco , eta charitateric eztudan , etzait deus probetchatzen .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Charitatea patient da , benigno da , charitatea ezta inuidioso : charitateac eztu insolentiaric , eta ezta hancen :

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Eztu deshonestateric eguiten , eztabila bere probetchuén ondoan , ezta despitatzen : eztu gaitzic pensatzen :

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Ezta bidegabeaz alegueratzen , baina alegueratzen da eguiaz .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Gauça guciac pairatzen ditu , gauça guciac sinhesten ditu , gauça guciac speratzen ditu , gauça guciac suffritzen ditu .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Charitatea nehoiz - ere ezta erorten : baina are prophetiác abolituren dirade , eta lengoagéc fin harturen duté , eta scientiá abolituren da .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Ecen partez eçagutzen dugu eta partez prophetizatzen .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: Eta perfectionea ethorri datenean , orduan partez dena abolituren date .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Haourra nincenean , haour anço minço nincén , haour anço iugeatzen nuen , haour anço pensatzen nuen : baina guiçon eguin naicenean , abolitu vkan ditut haourtassuneco manerác .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Ecen orain mirail batez ikusten dugu ilhunqui : baina orduan beguithartez beguitharte ikussiren dugu : orain eçagutzen dut partez , baina orduan eçaguturen dut eçagutu - ere naicén beçala .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Bada orain badaude hirur gauça hauc , fedea , sperançá , charitatea : baina hautarico handiena charitatea da .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Çarreitzate chariteari , eta çareten dohain spiritual guthicioso , baina guehienic prophetiza deçaçuen .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Ecen lengoage arrotzez minço dena etzaye guiçoney minço , baina Iaincoari : ecen nehorc eztu ençuten , eta spirituz mysterioac erraiten ditu .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: Baina prophetizatzen duena , guiçoney minço çaye edificationetan , eta exhortationetan , eta consolationetan .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Lengoage arrotzez minço denac , bere buruä edificatzen du : baina prophetizatzen duenac , Eliçá edificatzen du .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Nahi dut bada çuec gucioc lengoage diuersez minça çaitezten , baina nahiago prophetiza deçaçuen ecen handiago da prophetizatzen duena ecen ez lengoage diuersez minço dena , baldin interpretatzen ezpadu , Eliçác edificatione har deçançát .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Bada orain , anayeác , baldin banathor çuetara lengoage arrotzez minço naicela , cer probetchu eguinen drauçuet : baldin minça ezpanaquiçue edo reuelationez , edo scientiaz , edo prophetiaz , edo doctrinaz ?

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Eta gauça arima gabe soinu emaiten dutenec - ere edo den chirula , edo harpa , baldin cerbait differentia tonuz ezpademate , nolatan eçaguturen da chiruláz edo harpáz ioiten dena ?

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Ecen baldin soinu iaquin - bat eman ezpadeça trompettác , nor preparaturen da bataillara ?

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Hala çuec - ere baldin adi daitequeen hitza mihiaz pronuntia ezpadeçaçue , nolatan adituren da erraiten dena ? ecen airera minçaçale içanen çarete .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Hambat ( heltzen ohi den beçala ) soinu mota da munduan , eta batre ezta muturic .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Beraz baldin ezpadaquit vozaren verthutea , içanen natzayó minço denari barbaro : eta minço çaitadana barbaro içanen çait .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Hala çuec - ere dohain spiritual guthicioso çaretenaz gueroz , çarreitzate hetan abundoso içateari Eliçaren edificationetan .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Halacotz lengoage arrotzez minço denac othoitz begui interpreta ahal deçançát .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Ecen baldin lengoage arrotzez othoitz eguiten badut , ene spirituac othoitz eguiten du : baina ene adimendua fructu gabe da .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: Cer bada ? othoitz eguinen dut spirituz , baina othoitz eguinen dut adimenduz - ere : cantaturen dut spirituz , baina cantaturen dut adimenduz - ere .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Bercela , baldin benedica badeçac spirituz , ignorantaren lekua daducanac nolatán erranen du Amen hire remerciamenduaren gainera ? ecen hic cer erraiten duan etzeaquic .

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Ecen hic bay esquerrac emaiten dituc , baina bercea eztatec edificatzen .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Esquerrac emaiten drauzquiot neure Iaincoari , ceren çuec gucioc baino guehiago lengoagez minço bainaiz .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Baina Eliçán nahiago naiz borz hitz neure adimenduz minçatu , berceac - ere instrui ditzadançát , ecen ez hamar milla hitz lengoage arrotzez .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Anayeác , etzaretela adimenduz haour : baina çareten malitiaz haour , eta adimenduz çareten guiçon eguinac .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Leguean scribatua da , Halacotz berce lengoagetaco gendez , eta ezpain arrotzez minçaturen natzayo populu huni : eta are halatan eznaute ençunen , dio launac .

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Bada lengoage arrotzac dirade seignaletan , ez sinhesten duteney , baina infideley : baina prophetiá , ez infideley , baina sinhesten duteney .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Bada baldin Eliça gucia bil badadi batetara , eta guciac lengoage arrotzez minça ditecen , eta ignorantac , edo infidelac sar ditecen : eztuté erranen , ecen erhotzen çaretela ?

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: Baina baldin guciéc prophetizatzen baduté , eta sar dadin cembeit infidel edo ignorant , vençutzen da guciéz , eta iugeatzen da guciéz .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Eta halatan haren bihotzeco secretuac manifestatzen dirade : eta hala ahoz beheraturic adoraturen du Iaincoa , declaratzen duela ecen Iaincoa eguiazqui çuetan dela .

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Cer da bada anayeac ? biltzen çareten oroz , çuetaric batbederac psalmu du , doctrina du , reuelatione du , lengoage du , interpretatione du , gauça guciac edificationetan eguin bitez .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Ezpa lengoage arrotzez edocein minço bada , biguez edo gorena hirurez eguin bedi , eta aldizca : eta batec interpreta beça .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: Eta baldin interpretaçaleric ezpada , ichil bedi Eliçan lengoage arrotzez minço dena , eta bere buruäri minça bequió eta Iaincoari .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Eta biga edo hirur Propheta minça bitez , eta bercéc iugea beçate .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Eta baldin cerbait berce iarriric dagoen bati reuelatu içan baçayó , lehena ichil bedi .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Ecen guciéc bata bercearen ondoan prophetiza ahal deçaqueçue , guciéc ikas deçatençát , eta guciac consola ditecençát .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Eta Prophetén spirituac Prophetén suiet dirade .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Ecen Iaincoa ezta confusionezco Iainco , baina baquezco , sainduén Eliça gucietan agueri den beçala .

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: Çuen emazteac Elicetan ichilic beude : ecen etzaye permettitzen minçatzera : baina bire suiet , Legueac - ere erraiten duen beçala .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Eta baldin cerbait ikassi nahi baduté , etchean bere senharrac interroga bitzate : ecen deshonest da emaztén Eliçán minçatzea .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Ala çuetaric Iaincoaren hitza ilki içan da ? ala çuetara beretara heldu içan da ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Baldin cembeitec vste badu Propheta dela , edo spiritual , eçagut beça ecen scribatzen drauzquiçuedan gauçác Iaincoaren manamendu diradela .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Eta ignorant dena , ignorant biz .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Halacotz , anayeác , çareten prophetizatzera guthicioso , eta lengoage arrotzez minçatzea ezteçaçuela empatcha .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Baina gauça guciac bidezqui eta ordenançaz eguin bitez .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Bada auisatzen çaituztet , anayeác , declaratu drauçuedan Euangelioaz , cein recebitu baituçue , ceinetan egoiten - ere baitzarete .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Ceinez saluatzen - ere baitzarete , baldin orhoit baçarete cer maneraz hura denuntiatu drauçuedan : baldin alfer sinhetsi vkan ezpaduçue .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Ecen eman drauçuet recebitu - ere vkan nuena : nola Christ hil içan den gure bekatuacgatic , Scripturén araura :

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Eta nola ohortze eta resuscitatu içan den hereneco egunean , Scripturén araura :

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Eta nola ikussi içan den Cephasez , eta guero hamabiéz .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Gueroztic ikussi içan da borz ehun anayez baina guehiagoz aldi batez : ceinetaric anhitz vici baitirade oraindrano , eta batzu lokartu - ere içan dirade :

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Gueroztic ikussi içan da Iacquesez : eta guero Apostolu guciez .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Eta gucietaco azquenenic , aburtoin ançocoaz ikussi içan da niçaz - ere .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Ecen ni naiz Apostoluetaco chipiena , Apostolu deithu içateco digne eznaicenor , ceren persecutatu vkan baitut Iaincoaren Eliçá .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Baina Iaincoaren gratiaz naiz naicena : eta haren ni baitharaco gratiá , ezta vano içan , aitzitic hec guciac baino guehiago trabaillatu içan naiz : badaric - ere ez ni , baina Iaincoaren gratia enequin dena .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Beraz , bada nic , bada hec , hunela predicatzen dugu , eta hunela sinhetsi vkan duçue .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Eta baldin Christ predicatzen bada ecen hiletaric resuscitatu içan dela , nola erraiten dute batzuc çuen artean , ecen hilén resurrectioneric eztela ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Ecen baldin hilén resurrectioneric ezpada , Christ - ere ezta resuscitatu içan .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Eta baldin Christ resuscitatu içan ezpada , beraz vano da gure predicationea , eta çuen fedea - ere vano da .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Eta erideiten - ere bagara Iaincoaren testimonio falsu : ecen testificatu vkan dugu Iaincoaz , nola resuscitatu vkan duen Christ , cein ezpaitu resuscitatu , baldin hilac resuscitatzen ezpadirade .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Ecen baldin hilac resuscitatzen ezpadirade , Christ - ere ezta resuscitatu içan .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Eta baldin Christ resuscitatu içan ezpada , vano da çuen fedea : oraino çuen bekatuetan çarete .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Beraz Christan lokartu diradenac - ere , galdu içan dirade .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Baldin vicitze hunetan solament Christ baithan sperança badugu , guiçon gucietaco miserablenac gu gara .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Baina orain , Christ resuscitatu içan da hiletaric : eta lokartu içan diradenén primitia eguin içan da .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Ecen herioa guiçon batez denaz gueroz , hilén resurrectionea - ere guiçon - batez da .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Ecen nola guciac Adamtan hiltzen baitirade , hala Christan - ere viuificaturen dirade guciac .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Baina batbedera bere ordenançán : primitia Christ , guero Christen diradenac , haren aduenimenduan .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Guero içanen da fina , eman drauqueonean resumá Iainco Aitari : abolitu duqueenean principaltassun gucia , eta puissança eta bothere gucia .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Ecen behar du harc regnatu , etsay guciac bere oinén azpian eçarri dituqueeno .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Eta azquen etsay deseguinen dena herioa da .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Ecen gauça guciac suiet eguin vkan ditu haren oinén azpico ( baina erraiten duenean , ecen gauça guciac haren suiet eguin içan diradela , agueria da ecen gauça guciac haren suiet eguin dituena reseruatua dela . )

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Eta gauça guciac hari suiet eguin çaizqueonean , orduan Semea bera - ere suiet eguinen çayó gauça guciac hari suiet eguin drauzquionari , Iaincoa dençat gucia gucietan .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Bercela cer eguinen duté hiltzat batheyatzen diradenéc , baldin guciz hilac resuscitatzen ezpadirade ? eta cergatic batheyatzen dirade hiltzat ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Eta cergatic gu periletan gara ordu oroz ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Egunetic egunera hiltzen naiz , gure gloria Iesus Christ gure Iaunean dudanaz .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Baldin guiçonaren arauez bestién contra bataillatu içan banaiz Ephesen , cer probetchu dut , baldin hilac resuscitatzen ezpadirade ? Ian deçagun eta edan deçagun : ecen bihar hilen gara .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Etzaiteztela seduci . Propos gaichtoéc corrumpitzen dituzte conditione onac .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Iratzar çaiteztez iustoqui vicitzera , eta bekaturic eztaguiçuela : ecen batzuc Iaincoaren eçagutzea eztuté : çuen ahalquetan erraiten drauçuet .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Baina erranen du cembeitec , Nola resuscitatzen dirade hilac ? eta nolaco gorputzetan ethorriren dirade ?

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Erhoá , hic ereiten duána , eztuc viuificatzen , baldin hil ezpadadi .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Eta ereiten duána , eztuc gorputz sorthuren dena ereiten , baina bihi hutsa , nola heltzen baita , oguiarena , edo cembeit berce bihirena .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Baina Iaincoac emaiten diraucac gorputza nahi duen beçala , eta hacietaric batbederari ceini bere gorputz propria .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Haragui gucia ezta haragui ber - bat : baina berce da guiçonén haraguia , eta berce , abren haraguia : eta berce arrainena : eta berce choriena .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Eta badirade gorputz cerucoac , eta badirade gorputz lurrecoac : baina berce da cerucoén gloriá , eta berce lurrecoena .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Berce da iguzquiaren gloriá , eta berce ilharguiaren gloriá , eta berce içarren gloriá : ecen içarra içarraganic different da gloriatan .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Halaiçanen da hilén resurrectionea - ere : gorputza ereiten da corruptionetan , resuscitatzen da incorruptionetan .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Ereiten da desohorezco , resuscitatzen da glorioso : ereiten da infirmo , resuscitatzen da botheretsu .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Ereiten da gorputz sensual , resuscitatzen da gorputz spiritual : bada gorputz sensuala , eta bada gorputz spirituala .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Scribatua - ere den beçala , Eguin içan da Adam lehen guiçona arima vicitan : Adam guerocoa spiritu viuificaçaletan .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Baina spiritual dena ezta lehen , baina sensual dena : guero spiritual dena .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Lehen guiçona lurretic , lurreco : eta bigarren guiçona , cein baita Iauna , cerutic .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Lurrecoa nolaco , halaco lurreco diradenac - ere : eta cerucoa nolaco , halaco cerucoac - ere .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Eta lurrecoaren imaginá ekarri vkan dugun beçala , ekarriren dugu cerucoaren imagina - ere .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Huná cer diodan , anayeác , ecen haraguiac eta odolac Iaincoaren resumá hereta ecin deçaquetela : eta corruptioneac eztuela incorruptionea heretatzen .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Huná , mysteriobat erraiten drauçuet , Guciac behinçat lokarturen ez gara , baina guciac bay muthaturen :

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: Moment batez eta begui keinu batez , azquen trompettán ( ecen ioren du trompettác ) eta hilac resuscitaturen dirade incorruptible , eta gu muthaturen gara .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Ecen behar da corruptible haur vezti dadin incorruptionez , eta mortal haur vezti dadin immortalitatez .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Bada corruptible haur veztitu datenean incorruptionez , eta mortal haur veztitu datenean immortalitatez , orduan eguinen da scribatu dena , Iretsi içan da herioa victoriatara .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: O herioá , non da hire victoria ? o sepulchreá , non da hire eztena ?

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Bada herioaren eztena , bekatua da : eta bekatuaren botherea , Leguea .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Baina esquer Iaincoari , ceinec victoria eman baitraucu Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Halacotz , ene anaye maiteác , çareten fermu , constant , abundoso Iaunaren obrán bethiere , daquiçuelaric ecen çuen trabaillua eztela vano gure Iaunean .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Sainduendaco eguiten diraden collectéz den becembatean , nola Galatiaco Elicey ordenatu baitrauet , hala çuec - ere eguiçue .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Asteco lehen egun oroz çuetaric batbederac bere baithan eçar deçan appart , Iaincoaren benignitatez ahal deçana gordatzen duela : nathorren orduan collectác eguin eztitecençát .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Eta guero arriua nadinean , nor - ere çuec letraz approbaturen baitituçue , hec igorriren ditut çuen liberalitatearen eramaitera Ierusalemera .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Eta baldin premiaric bada neuror - ere ioan nadin , enequin ioanen dirateque .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Ethorriren naiz bada çuetara , Macedonia iragan duquedanean ( ecen Macedonian iraganen naiz . )

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Eta çuec baithan aguian egonen naiz , edo neguä iraganen - ere : çuec guida neçaçuençát norat - ere ioanen bainaiz .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Ecen etzaituztet orain iragaitez ikussi nahi : baina sperança dut cerbait dembora egonen naicela çuec baithan , baldin Iaunac permetti badeça .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Baina egonen naiz Ephesen Mendecoste arteno .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Ecen bortha handibat eta efficaciotacobat irequi içan çait , baina etsay anhitz .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Eta baldin ethor badadi Timotheo , gogoauçue segur den çuec baithan : ecen Iaunaren obrá obratzen du nic - ere beçala .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Bada nehorc ezteçala hura menosprecia , baina guida eçaçue baquerequin , dathorrençát enegana , ecen haren beguira nago anayequin .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Eta anaye Apolloz den becembatean , anhitz othoitz eguin draucat ioan ledin çuetara anayequin : baina neholetan - ere eztu vkan vorondateric orain ioaiteco : baina ethorriren da opportunitatea duenean .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Veilla eçaçue , çaudete fedean fermu , valentqui perporta çaitezte , fortifica çaitezte .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Çuen eguiteco guciac charitaterequin eguin bitez .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Eta othoitz eguiten drauçuet , anayeác , badaquiçue Estebenen familiá Achaiaco primitién artean dela , eta sainduén cerbitzura bere buruäc eman dituztela :

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: Çuec - ere çareten suiet halacoén , eta gurequin languiten eta trabaillatzen ari den guciaren .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Boz naiz bada Estebenen eta fortunaten eta Achaicoren ethorteaz , ceren çuen absentiá hec supplitu vkan baituté .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Ecen recreatu vkan dituzte ene spiritua eta çuena . Eçagut itzaçue bada halaco diradenac .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Salutatzen çaituztez Asiaco Elicéc . Salutatzen çaituztez gure Iaunean anhitz , Aquilac eta Priscillac , bere etcheco Eliçarequin .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Salutatzen çaituztez anaye guciéc . Saluta eçaçue elkar pot saindu batez .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Ene Paulen escuazco salutationea .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Baldin cembeit bada Iesus Christ Iaunari on eztaritzanic , biz anathema , maran - atha .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gratiá dela çuequin .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Ene charitatea çuequin gucioquin Iesus Christ Iaunean , Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: PAVLEC Iesus Christen Apostolu Iaincoaren vorondatez denac , eta Timotheo anayeac , Iaincoaren Eliça Corinthen denari , Achaia gucian diraden saindu guciequin :

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea Iainco gure Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Laudatu dela Iaincoa cein baita Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Aita , misericordién Aita eta consolatione guciaren Iaincoa ,

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Gure tribulatione gucian consolatzen gaituena : consola ahal ditzagunçát cer - ere tribulationetan diradenac , gueuroc Iaincoaz consolatzen garen consolatione beraz .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Ecen nola Christen suffrimenduac gutan abundatzen baitirade , hala gure consolationea - ere abundatzen da Christez .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Eta edo affligitzen bagara , çuen consolationeagatic da , eta guc - ere suffritzen ditugun molde bereco suffrimenduén patientián eguiten den saluamenduagatic : edo consolatzen bagara , çuen consolationeagatic da eta saluamenduagatic .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Eta gure sperança çueçaz duguna fermu da , daquigularic ecen nola suffrimenduetan participant baitzarete , hala consolationean - ere içanen çaretela .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Ecen nahi dugu daquiçuen , anayeác , gure afflictione Asian heldu içan çaicunaz , ecen cargatu içan garela excessiuoqui ahalaz garaitic , hambat non hersturatan içanez etsi baiquenduen viciaz - ere .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Baina gueuroc gure baithan heriotaco sententia vkan dugu : gure baithan fida ezquentecençát , baina hilac resuscitatzen dituen Iaincoa baithan :

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Ceinec hain herio handitaric deliuratu baiquaitu , eta deliuratzen : cein baithan sperança baitugu ecen oraino - ere deliuraturen gaituela .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Çuec - ere aiutatzen gaituçuelaric guregatic eguinen duçuen orationeaz : anhitz personaren respectuz eguin çaicun dohainaz , anhitzez guregatic esquerrac renda ditecençát .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Ecen gure gloriatzea haur da , gure conscientiaren testimoniagea ecen Iaincoaren simplicitaterequin eta puritaterequin , ez haraguiaren sapientiarequin , baina Iaincoaren gratiarequin conuersatu vkan dugula munduan , eta principalqui çuec baithan .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Ecen scribatzen drauzquiçuegun gauçác , eztirade iracurtzen edo eçagutzen - ere dituçuenez berce : eta sperança dut finerano - ere eçaguturen dituçuela .

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Nola eçagutu - ere baiquaituçue parte , ecen çuen gloriatze garela , çuec - ere gurea beçala Iesus Iaunaren egunecotzat .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Eta confidança hunetan nahi nincén lehen çuetara ethorri , gratia doblea cindutençát :

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Eta çuetaric Macedoniarat iragan , eta harçara Macedoniaric ethorri çuetara , eta çueçaz guida nendin Iudeara .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Bada haur deliberatzen nuenean arintassunez vsatu vkan dut ? ala deliberatzen ditudan gauçác , haraguiaren arauez deliberatzen ditut , hala non ni baithan den Bay eta Ez ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Aitzitic Iainco fidelac badaqui ecen ene çuetaratco hitza eztela içan Bay eta Ez .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren Seme Iesus Christ guçaz çuen artean predicatu içan dena , niçaz eta Syluanoz eta Timotheoz , ezta içan Bay eta Ez , baina Bay hartan içan da :

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: ( Ecen Iaincoaren promes guciac hartan Bay dirade , eta hartan dirade Amen ) Iaincoaren gloriatan guçaz .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Bada confirmatzen gaituena çuequin Christ Iaunean eta vnctatu gaituena Iaincoa da :

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Ciguilatu - ere gaituena , eta Spirituaren errésac gure bihotzetan eman drauzquiguna .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Nic bada Iaincoa dut testimonio deitzen neure arimaren gain , ecen çuen guppidaz , oraino eznaicela ethorri Corinthera .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Ez dominatzen dugulacotz çuen fedearen gainean , baina çuen bozcarioaren aiutaçale garelacotz : ecen fedez çutic çaudete .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Baina haur neuror baithan deliberatu vkan dut , çuetara tristitiarequin berriz ez ethortera .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Ecen baldin nic contrista baçaitzatet , nor da ni aleguera nençaqueenic , niçaz contristatu liçatequeen bera baicen ?

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Eta haur bera scribatu vkan drauçuet , ethor nadinean tristitiaric eztudançát alegueratu behar nincenetaric : çueçaz gucioz fidaz ecen ene alegrançá , çuen guciona dela .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Ecen afflictione eta bihotz herstura handitan scribatu drauçuet , anhitz nigar chortarequin : ez contrista cindeiztençát , baina eçagut cineçatençát çuetara dudan charitate gucizco abundanta .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Eta baldin norbeit tristitiaren causa içan bada , eznau ni contristatu , baina aldez ( hura cargago ezteçadan ) çuec gucioc .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Asco du harc anhitzez eguin içan çayon reprotchu hunez .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Hala non contrariora barka diecoçuen aitzitic , eta consola deçaçuen , tristitiaren handieguiz irets eztadinçát hura .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Harren othoitz eguiten drauçuet , confirma deçaçuen hura baithara charitatea .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Ecen fin hunetacotz scribatu - ere drauçuet , eçagut neçançát çuen experientiá , eya gauça gucietara obedient çaretenez .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Eta cerbait barkatzen draucaçuenari , nic - ere barkatzen draucat : ecen nic - ere baldin cerbait barkatu badut , barkatu draucadanari çuengatic eguin draucat Christen beguitharte aitzinean , Satanez ardiets ezgaitecençát .

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: Ecen haren entrepresác badaquizquigu .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Goiticoz , ethorriric Troasera Christen Euangelioagatic , borthá irequi baçaitadán - ere Iaunaz :

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Eztut vkan paussuric neure spirituan , ceren ezpaineçan eriden Tite neure anayea : baina hetaric congit harturic , ioan nendin Macedoniarát .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Esquer bada Iaincoari bethi Christean triumpha eraciten draucunari : eta bere eçagutzearen vssaina eçagut eraciten draucunari leku gucietan .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Ecen Christen vssain ona gara Iaincoagana , saluatzen diradenetan , eta galtzen diradenetan :

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Iaquiteco da , hautan , herio vssain heriotaracotz : eta hetan , vicitze vssain vicitzetaracotz : eta gauça hautacotzat nor da sufficientic ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Ecen eztugu , anhitzec beçala , traffiquic eguiten Iaincoaren hitzaz , aitzitic integritatez beçala , aitzitic Iaincoaganic beçala Iaincoaren aitzinean , Christez minço gara .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: Hatsen gara berriz gure buruén gommendatzen ? ala behar dugu batzuc beçala , epistola gommendagarriric çuetara , edo çuetaric gommendagarriric ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Gure epistolá çuec çarete , gure bihotzetan scribatua , cein eçagutzen eta iracurtzen baita guiçon guciéz .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Agueri den becembatean ecen Christen epistola guçaz administratua çaretela , scribatua ez tintaz , baina Iainco viciaren Spirituaz : ez harrizco tauletan , baina bihotzeco taula haraguizcoetan .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Eta halaco confidança dugu Christez Iaincoa baithan .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Ez sufficient garelacotz gure buruz cerbaiten pensatzeco , gueurorganic beçala : baina gure sufficientiá Iaincoaganic da .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Ceinec Testamentu berrico ministre sufficient - ere eguin baiquaitu , ez letraren , baina Spirituaren : ecen letrác hiltzen du , baina Spirituac viuificatzen du .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Eta baldin heriotaco ministerioa letraz harrietan moldatua içan bada glorioso , hambat non Israeleco haourréc ecin behá baitzeçaqueten Moysesen beguithartera , haren beguitharteco gloria fin vkan behar çuenagatic :

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: Nolatan ezta Spirituaren ministerioa gloriosoago içanen ?

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Ecen baldin condemnationetaco ministerioa glorioso içan bada : iustitiataco ministerioac anhitzez iragaitenago du gloriaz .

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Ecen glorificatu içan dena - ere , ezta glorificatu içan respectu hunez , erran nahi da , excellentago den gloriaren causaz .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Ecen baldin fin hartu behar çuena glorioso içan bada , vnguiz gloriosoago da dagoena .

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Beraz hunelaco sperançá dugunaz gueroz , minçatzeco libertate handiz vsatzen dugu .

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: Eta ez gara Moysez beçala ceinec estalquia emaiten baitzuen bere beguitharte gainean , Israeleco haourréc abolitu behar cenaren finera beha ezleçatençát .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Bada , hayén adimenduac gogortu içan dirade : ecen egungo egunerano estalqui bera dago Testamentu çaharreco lecturán kendu gabea ( cein Christez kencen baita )

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Baina egungo egun hunetarano Moyses iracurtzen denean , estalquia hayén bihotz gainean dago .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Baina Iaunagana conuertitu datequeenean kenduren da estalquia .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Eta Iauna Spiritu da : eta Iaunaren Spiritua non , libertatea han .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Bada gu gucioc beguithartea aguerturic Iaunaren glorián miratzen garela , imagina berera transformatzen gara gloriataric gloriatara , Iaunaren Spirituaz beçala .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Halacotz , ministerio haur dugularic recebitu dugun misericordiaren arauez , ezgara naguitzen .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Aitzitic iraitzi ditugu ahalquezco estalquiac , ebilten garela ez fineciarequin , eta ez Iaincoaren hitza falsificatzen dugula , baina eguiaren declarationez approba eraciten ditugula gure buruäc guiçonén conscientia gucia baithan , Iaincoaren aitzinean .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Eta baldin gure Euangelioa estalia bada , galtzen diradenén da estalia :

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Ceinétan mundu hunetaco iaincoac itsutu vkan baititu adimenduac , diot , infideletan , Christ Iaincoaren imagina denaren gloriaren Euangelioco arguiac hæy arguiric eztaguiençát .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Ecen eztitugu gure buruäc predicatzen , baina Iesus Christ Iauna : eta gu , çuen cerbitzari garela Iesusgatic .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ecen arguiac ilhumbetic argui leguian erran duen Iaincoac , argui eguin du gure bihotzetan , Iesus Christen beguithartean Iaincoaren gloriaren eçagutzera illuminatzeco .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Baina thesaur haur lurrezco vncietan dugu , verthute hunen excellentiá Iaincoaren dençát , eta ez gutaric :

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Gucietan affligitzen gara , baina ez hertsen : behartzen gara , baina ez vtziten :

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: Persecutatzen gara , baina ez abandonnatzen : iraizten gara , baina ez galtzen .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Leku gucietan bethiere Iesus Iaunaren mortificationea gorputzean ekarten dugula Iesusen vicitzea - ere gure gorputzean manifesta dadinçát .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Ecen gu vici garenoc , bethi heriotara liuratzen gara Iesusgatic , Iesusen vicitzea - ere gure haragui mortalean manifesta dadinçát .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Hunegatic herioac gutan lan eguiten du , eta vicitzeac çuetan .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Eta ceren fedearen Spiritu ber - bat baitugu , scribatua den beçala , Sinhetsi vkan dut , eta halacotz minçatu içan naiz : guc - ere sinhesten dugu , eta halacotz minço gara .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Daquigularic ecen Iesus Iauna resuscitatu duenac gu - ere Iesusez resuscitaturen gaituela , eta ethor eraciren gaituela bere presentiara cuequin batean .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Ecen hauc gucioc çuengatic dirade , gratia gucizco handi haur , anhitzen remerciamenduz redunda dadinçát Iaincoaren gloriatan .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Halacotz , ezgara naguitzen : baina are baldin gure guiçon campocoa corrumpitzen bada - ere : barnecoa ordea arramberritzen da egunetic egunera .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Ecen gure afflictione arin artegutitacoac eraguiten du gutan gloriataco piçu excellent excellentqui eternalbat .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Gauça visibleac consideratzen eztitugunean , baina inuisibleac : ecen visibleac demboratacotz dirade : baina inuisibleac , seculacotz .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Ecen badaquigu baldin gure lurreco habitatione hunetaco tabernaclea deseguin badadi , edificiobat Iaincoaganic badugula , etche escuz eguin eztén eternalbat ceruètan .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Ecen suspirioz - ere halacotz gaude , gure habitatione cerutic denaz veztitu içatera desir dugula .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Badaric - ere baldin veztituac ez billuciac eriden bagaitez .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Ecen tabernacle hunetan garenoc , cargaturic suspirioz gaude : ceren desir baitugu ez billuci içatera , baina arreueztitu içatera , iretsi dadinçát mortal dena vicitzeaz .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Eta hartara berera gu formatu gaituena Iaincoa da , Spirituaren errésac eman - ere drauzquiguna .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Confidança dugularic bada bethiere eta daquigularic ecen arrotz garela gorputz hunetan , absent gara Iaunaganic .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: ( Ecen fedez gabiltza ez ikustez )

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Baina confidança dugu , eta nahiago gara gorputzetic ilki , eta Iaunarequin habitatzera ioan .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Eta halacotz dugu desiratzen , bay present bagara , bay absent bagara , haren gogaraco içatera .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Ecen guciéc comparitu behar dugu Christen tribunal aitzinean , batbederac gorputzean recebi deçançat eguin duqueenaren araura , edo vngui edo gaizqui .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Daquigularic bada Iaunazco iciapena cer den guiçonac ditugu federa erekarten , eta Iaincoagana manifestatuac gara : eta sporçu dut , çuen conscientietara - ere manifestatuac garela .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Ecen eztrauzquiçuegu gure buruäc berriz laudatzen , baina occasione emaiten drauçuegu guçaz gloriatzeco : duçuençát cer ihardets apparentiaz eta ez bihotzez gloriatzen diradenén contra .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Ecen adimenduz erautzen bagara Iaincoari erautzen guiaizquio : edo adimendu onetaco bagara , çuén gara .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Ecen Christen charitateac hertsen gaitu : hunez guerthu garelaric , ecen baldin bat guciacgatic hil içan bada , beraz guciac hil içan diradela .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Eta hura guciacgatic hil içan da , vici diradenac guehiagoric bere buruèy vici eztiradençát , baina hecgatic hil eta resuscitatu içan denari .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Halacotz , guc hemendic harát nehor eztugu eçagutzen haraguiaren arauez : eta baldin Christ haraguiaren arauez eçagutu badugu - ere , orain ordea eztugu guehiagoric eçagutzen .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Beraz baldin cembeit , bada Christ Iaunean , biz crearura berri : gauça çaharrac iragan dirade , huná , gauça guciac berri eguin dirade .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Eta hauc gucioc Iaincoaganic dirade , ceinec reconciliatu baiquaitu berequin Iesus Christez , eta eman baitraucu reconciliationezco ministerioa :

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Ecen Iaincoa Christean cen , mundua berequin reconciliatzen çuela , hæy imputatzen etzerauztela berén bekatuac : eta eçarri vkan du gutan reconciliationezco hitza .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Harren , Christen icenean embachadore gara , Iaincoac guçaz othoitz eguiten balerauçue beçala : othoitz eguiten drauçuegu Christen icenean , reconcilia çaquizquioten Iaincoari .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Ecen bekaturic eçagutu eztuena , guregatic bekatu eguin vkan du : hartan gu Iaincoaren iustitia eguin guentecençát .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Bada haren languile garelaric , othoitz eguiten - ere badrauçuegu , eztuçuen , alfer Iaincoaren gratiá recebitu .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Ecen dio Iaincoac , Dembora gogaracoan exauditu vkan aut , eta saluamendutaco egunean aiutatu vkan aut . Huná orain dembora gogaracoa , huná orain saluamendutaco eguna .

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Scandaloric batre deusetan emaiten eztugularic , gure ministerioa vitupera eztadinçát :

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Baina gauça gucietán approbatu eracusten ditugularic gure buruäc Iaincoaren cerbitzari anço , patientia handiz tribulationetan , necessitatetan , hersturétan ,

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: Çauriétan , presoindeguiétan , tumultuoétan , trabailluétan , veillatzétan , barurétan .

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: Puritatez , eçagutzez , spiritu patientez , ontassunez , Spiritu sainduaz , hypocrysia gaberico charitatez ,

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: Eguiazco hitzez , Iaincoaren botherez iustitiazco harma escuinez eta ezquerrez .

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: Ohorez eta desohorez , fama gaitzez eta fama onez .

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: Seduciçale beçala , eta alabaina eguiati : ez eçagunac beçala , eta alabaina eçagunac : hiltzen baguina beçala , eta huna vici gara : gaztigatzen garenac beçala , eta alabaina ez hilac :

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: Triste beçala , baina bethi aleguera : paubre beçala , baina anhitzen abratsale : deus gabe beçala , eta alabaina gauça gucien possediçale .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: O Corinthianoác , gure ahoa irequia da çuetara , gure bihotza largatua da .

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Etzarete herssiqui habitatzen gutan : baina enserratuac çarete ceuron halsarretan .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Bada neure haourrey anço recompensa beraz minço natzaiçue : larga çaiteztez çuec - ere .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Etzaiteztela infidelequin vztár : ecen cer participatione du iustitiác iniustitiarequin ? eta cer communicatione arguiac ilhumbearequin .

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Eta cer concordia du Christec Belialequin ? eta cer parte fidelac infidelarequin ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Eta cer consentimendu du Iaincoaren templeac idolequin ? ecen çuec Iainco viciaren temple çarete : Iaincoac erran duen beçala Habitaturen naiz hetan eta ebiliren : eta içanen naiz hayén Iainco eta hec içanen dirade ene populu .

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Harren , ilki çaiteztez hayén artetic , eta separa çaiteztez , dio Iaunac : eta gauça cithalic hunqui ezteçaçuela , eta nic recebituren çaituztet .

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: Eta içanen natzaiçue çuey Aita , eta çuec içanen çaizquidáte seme eta alaba , dio Iaun bothere gucitacoac .

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Beraz , ene maiteác , promessac ditugunaz gueroz , haraguiaren eta spirituaren satsutassun orotaric chahu ditzagun gure buruäc : acabatzen dugularic sanctificationea , Iaincoaren beldurrequin .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Recebi gaitzaçue gu : nehor eztugu iniuriatu , nehor eztugu corrumpitu , nehor eztugu pillatu .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Eznaiz çuen condemnationetan minço : ecen lehen erran dut gure bihotzetan çaretela , elkarrequin hiltzeco eta elkarrequin vicitzeco .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Minçatzeco libertate handia dut çuec baithan : çueçaz gloriatzeco materia handia dut : consolationez complitu naiz , bozcarioz hambat eta guehiago bethe naiz , gure tribulatione gucian .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Ecen Macedoniara ethorri eta , eztu vkan gure haraguiac paussuric batre , baina gucietan affligitu içan gara : campotic bataillác , barnetic icidurác .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Baina abatituac consolatzen dituen Iaincoac consolatu vkan gaitu Titeren ethorteaz .

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: Eta ez solament haren ethorteaz , baina hura çueçaz consolatu içan den consolationeaz - ere , contatzen ceraucunean çuen desir handia , çuen nigarra , çuen eneganaco affectione handia , hala non alegueratuago içan bainaiz .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Ecen baldin tristetu baçaituztet - ere epistolaz , eztut vrriqui , vrriquitu içan baçaitadan - ere , ecen badacussat epistola harc , demboratacotz badere , tristetu vkan çaituztela .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Orain aleguera naiz , ez ceren tristetu içan çareten , baina ceren tristetu içan çareten penitentiatara : ecen tristetu içan çarete Iaincoaren araura , hala non deusetan ezpaitzaiçue calteric eguin içan gure aldetic .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren arauezco tristitiác , penitentia obratzen du , vrriquimendu gaberico saluamendutara : baina munduco tristitiác herioa obratzen du .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Ecen horrá , Iaincoaren arauez tristetu içate horrec berac , cein artha handia çuetan obratu vkan du : aitzitic cer satisfactionea , aitzitic indignationea , aitzitic beldurra , aitzitic desir handia , aitzitic affectione handia , aitzitic mendequioa ? gauça gucietan eracutsi içan çarete nola chahu çareten eguiteco hunetan .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Bada baldin scribatu badrauçuet - ere , eztrauçuet scribatu iniuria eguin vkan duenaren causaz , ezeta iniuriatu içan denaren causaz , baina çuec baithan manifesta ledinçát guc çueçaz dugun arthá Iaincoaren aitzinean .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Causa hunegatic consolatu içan gara çuen consolatu içanaz : baina haguitzez alegueratuago içan gara Titeren alegrançáz , ceren recreatu içan baita haren spiritua çueçaz gucióz .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Eta baldin cerbaitetan çueçaz hura baithan gloriatu içan banaiz , eztut ahalqueric recebitu : baina nola gauça guciac eguiaz erran baitrauzquiçuegu , hala gure gloriatzea - ere , ceinez vsatu vkan baitut Tite baithara , eguiá eriden içan da .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Eta haren affectionea handiago da çuetara , orhoitzen denean çuen gucion obedientiáz , eta nola hura recebitu vkan duçuen beldurrequin eta ikararequin

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Aleguera naiz bada ceren guça gucietan çueçaz assegura ahal bainaite .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Iaquin eraciten drauçuegu bada , anayeác , Macedoniaco Elicey eman içan çayen Iaincoaren gratiá :

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Nola afflictionezco phorogança handitan hayén alegranciázco abundantiá , eta hayén paubrecia beherá abundant içan den hayén prompt içatearen abrastassunetan :

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Ecen testificatzen dut , ahalaren arauez , eta ahalaz garaitic , gogatsu içan diradela :
