text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: Othoitz handirequin othoitz eguiten ceraucutela , sainduey eguiten , çayen aiutaren gratiá eta communicationea , recebi gueneçan .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Eta eztute sperança guenduen beçala eguin , baina bere buruäc eman drautzate lehenic Iaunari , eta guero guri , Iaincoaren vorondatez .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Tite exhorta gueneçançát , nola lehenetic hassi vkan baitu , hala acaba - ere leçan çuec baithan gratia haur - ere .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Bada gauça gucietan abundos çareten beçala fedez , eta hitzez , eta eçagutzez , eta diligentia oroz , eta çuen gureganaco charitatez , eguiçue gratia hunetan - ere abundos çareten .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Eztut manamenduz erraiten , baina bercén diligentiáz çuen charitateco leyaltatearen - ere phorogatzeagatic .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Ecen eçagutzen duçue Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gratiá , nola çuengatic paubre eguin içan den abrats celaric : haren paubreciáz çuec abrats cindeiztençát .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Eta gauça hunetan conseillu emaiten dut : ecen haur çuen probetchutaco da , chazdanic hassi içan cinetenón , éz solament eguiten , baina nahi vkaiten - ere .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Orain bada eguite bera - ere acaba eçaçue , nolaco içan baita nahiaren gogo presta , halaco biz acabatzea - ere vkanaren arauez .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Ecen baldin aitzinetic bada gogo prest içatea , nehor duenaren arauez gogaraco da , eta ez eztuenaren arauez .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Ecen ezta haur bercéc solagemendu dutençát , eta çuec aurizqui çaiteztençát , baina egoalqui dembora hunetan çuen abundantiác suppli beça hayén peitutassuna .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Hayén abundantiác - ere çuen peitutassuna suppli deçançát , egoaltassun eguin dadinçát .

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: Scribatua den beçala , Anhitz bildu çuenac , eztu deus vkan soberaturic : eta guti çuenac , eztu vkan gutiegui .

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Eta esquer Iaincoari ceinec eman baitu artha bera çueçaz Titeren bihotzean .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Ceren ene exhortationea gogaraco içan baitzayó , eta affectionatuago içanez bere buruz çuetara ethorri içan baita .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Eta igorri vkan - dugu harequin batean anayea , ceinen laudorioa baita Euangelioan Eliça gucietan :

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: ( Eta ez solament laudatu , baina elegitu - ere içan da Elicéz gure bidageco lagun , guçaz administratzen den gratia hunequin Iaun beraren gloriatan eta çuen gogo prestaren cerbitzutan )

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Ihes eguiten draucagula huni , nehorc vitupera ezgaitzan guçaz administratzen den abundantia hunetan :

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Eta procuratzen dugula on dena , ez Iaunaren aitzinean solament , baina guiçonén aitzinean - ere .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Eta igorri dugu hequin gure anayea , cein experimentatu baitugu anhitzetan anhitz gauçatan diligent , eta orain vnguiz diligentago çuetan dudan confidança handiagatic .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Bada Titez den becembatean ene lagun da eta çuec baithan aiutaçale : eta gure anayéz den becembatean , Elicén embachadore dirade eta Christen gloria .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Bada , çuen charitatearen eta gure çueçazco gloriatzearen phorogançá eracutsaçué hetara Elicén aitzinean .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Eta sainduey eguiten çayen aiutáz den becembatean , çuey scribatzea soberancia çayt .

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: Ecen badaquit çuen gogo presta , ceinagatic çueçaz gloriatzen bainaiz Macedoniacoac baithan , ecen Achaia prest dela chazdanic : eta çuetaric heldu den zeloac anhitz persona incitatu vkan du .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Igorri vkan ditut bada anaye hauc , gure çueçazco gloriatzea alde hunez vano eztén : erran dudan beçala , prest çaretençát :

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Baldin Macedoniacoac enequin ethor baditez , eta prestatu gabeac eriden baçaitzatez , ahalque iragan ezteçagun ( ezterradançát çuéc ) çueçaz gloriatu gareneco segurança hunetan .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Bada necessario estimatu vkan dut othoitz eguitera anayey , lehenic çuetara datocen , eta lehen acaba deçaten çuen liberalitate aitzinetic declaratua : hura prest dençát liberalitate anço , eta ez cekentassun anço .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Eta haur erraiten dut , Cekenqui ereiten duenac cekenqui bilduren - ere du : eta liberalqui ereiten duenac , liberalqui bilduren - ere du .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Batbederac bere bihotzean proposatzen duen beçala , begui : ez tristitiarequin edo bortchaz : ecen alegueraqui emaiten duenari on daritza Iaincoac .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Eta botheretsu da Iaincoa gratia guciaren çuetan abunda eraciteco : gauça gucietan bethiere sufficientia gucia duçuelaric , obra on orotara abundos çaretençát :

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Scribatua den beçala , Distribuitu eta eman vkan draue paubrey : haren iustitiá dago seculacotz .

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Bada hacia ereilleari fornitzen draucanac , ogui - ere iateco diçuela , eta multiplica deçala çuen hacia , eta çuen iustitiaren fructuac augmenta ditzala :

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Gauça gucietan abrasturic abundos çaretençát simplicitate orotara , ceinec eguiten baitu guçaz esquerrac eman daquizquión Iaincoari .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Ecen oblatione hunen administrationeac eztu sainduén necessitatea supplitzen solament , baina abundatzen - ere badu anhitzec Iaincoari esquerrac drauzquioten becembatean :

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: ( Aiuta hunen phorogança hunez Iaincoa glorificatzen dutela çuen gogo batetaco suiectionearen gainean Christen Euangeliora , eta çuen hetaraco eta gucietaraco communicatione promptoaren gainean )

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Eta çuengatic othoitz eguiten duten becembatean çuen desira dutelaric , Iaincoaren gratia çuetan abundatzen denagatic .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Esquer bada Iaincoari haren dohain erran ecin daitenaz .

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Gainerocoaz , othoitz eguiten drauçuet Christen emetassunaz eta clementiáz , nic neurorrec Paulec , presentián çuen artean chipi , baina absentián çuetara hardit naicenac .

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: Othoitz eguiten drauçuet bada present niçatequeenean eznaicén hardit hardieça batez , ceinez deliberatzen baitut hardit içatera haraguiaren araura ebilten baguinade beçala estimatzen gaituzten batzutara .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Ecen haraguian ebilten garelaric , ez gara haraguiaren araura bataillatzen :

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: ( Ecen gure guerlaco harmadurác eztirade carnal , baina botheretsu Iaincoaz , fortalecén deseguiteco . )

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: Deseguiten ditugularic conseilluac , eta Iaincoaren eçagutzearen contra altchatzen den goratassun gucia : eta eramaiten dugularic captiuo beçala adimendu gucia Christen obedientiara :

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Eta prest dugu nondic mendeca gaitecen desobedientia oroz , çuen obedientiá complitu datequeenean .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Beguién aitzinean dituçuen gaucetara beha çaudete ? baldin edoceinec bere baithan confidança badu Christena dela , aldiz pensa beça bere baithan , ecen hura Christena den beçala , halaber gu - ere Christenac garela .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Ecen baldin are guehiago cerbait gloriatu nahi banaiz gure puissançáz , cein Iaunac eman baitraucu çuen edificationetan , eta ez çuen destructionetan , eznaiz ahalqueturen :

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Irudi eztudançát epistolaz icitu nahi çaituztedala .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Ecen epistolác ( dioite ) graue dirade eta borthitz , baina gorputzaren presentiá flaccu , eta hitza gaichto .

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Haur estima beça hainac , ecen nolaco baicara hitzez epistoletan absentián , halaco içanen garela presentian - ere eguinez .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Ecen ezgara venturatzen gure buruén bardin eçartera edo comparatzera bere buruäc laudatzen dituzten batzuequin : baina eztute aditzen hec bere buruäc bere buruèquin neurtzen dituztela , eta bere buruäc bere buruèquin comparatzen dituztela .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Baina gu ezgara gloriaturen gure neurrico eztiraden gaucéz : aitzitic Iaincoac partitu draucun neurri reglatuaren arauez , gloriaturen gara çuetarano - ere heldu içan garela .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Ecen çuetarano heldu içan ezpaguina beçala , ezgara hedatzen behar den baino guehiago : ecen çuetarano - ere heldu içan gara Christen Euangelioan :

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Ez gure neurrico etzén gauçaz gloriatzen guinadelaric , erran nahi dut , berceren trabailluetan : baina sperança dugularic ecen çuen fedea handi dadinean , gu - ere frangoqui handituren garela assignatu içan çaicun neurrian .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Hala non çuec baino aitzinago diraden lekuetan euangeliza deçadan eta ezgaitecen gloria berceri assignatu içan çayón neurrian , erran nahi dut , gauça ia preparatuetan .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Baina gloriatzen dena Iaunean gloria bedi .

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Ecen berac bere buruä preçatzen duena ezta approbatua , baina Iaunac preçatzen duena .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Ainençaçue supporta appurbat neure erhogoán , baina aitzitic supporta neçaçue .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Ecen ielossi naiz çueçaz Iaincoaren ielosgoaz : ecen preparatu cerauzquiotet senhar bati ( virgina castabat beçala ) Christi , presenta çaitzatedançát :

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Baina beldur naiz nolazpait , nola sugueac Eua seducitu vkan baitu bere fineciaz , hala çuen pensamenduac - ere corrumpi eztitecen Christean den simplicitatetic .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Ecen baldin norbeit ethor baledi guc predicatu eztugun berce Iesusbat predica lieçaçuenic , edo baldin berce spiritubat recebitzen bacinduté recebitu eztuçuenic , edo berce Euangeliobat recebitu eztuçuenic , hura vngui paira cineçaquete .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Ecen badaritzat eznaicela deusetan Apostolu excellentenac baino mendreago içan .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Eta baldin idiot banaiz - ere minçoan , ez ordea eçagutzean : aitzitic guciz gauça gucietan manifestatu içan gara çuetara .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Ala falta eguin dut neure buruären beheratzean , çuec altcha cindeiztençat ? eta ceren dohainic Iaincoaren Euangelioa predicatu baitrauçuet ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Berce Eliçác billuci vkan ditut , hetaric sari hartuz , çuec cerbitza cinçatedançát .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Eta çuequin nincenean , eta beharra nuenean eznaiz nagui içan eguitecoan nehoren caltetan : ecen ni falta nincena supplitu vkan dute Macedoniaric ethorri içan ciraden anayéc , eta beguiratu içan naiz eta beguiraturen deusetan - ere çuen carga içatetic .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Christen eguiá da nitan , ecen gloriatze haur eztela boçaturen enetzat Achaiaco regionétan .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Cergatic ? ala ceren çuey on eztaritzuedan ? Iaincoac badaqui .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Baina eguiten dudana eguinen - ere badut : occasione bilha dabiltzaney occasionea trenca diecedançát : gloriatzen diraden gauçán gu bay beçalaco eriden ditecençat .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Ecen halaco apostolu falsuac , obrari sotil dirade , Christen Apostolutara transformaturic .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Eta ezta miresteco , ecen Satan bera - ere transformatzen da arguico Ainguerutara .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Ezta beraz gauça handia baldin haren ministreac - ere iustitiataco ministretara transformatzen badirade : ceinén fina hayen obrén araura içanen baita .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Berriz diot , nehorc ezteçan estima erhoa naicela : ezpere erho anço - ere recebi neçaçue , ni - ere appurbat gloria nadinçát .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Erraiten dudana , eztut Iaunaren arauez erraiten , baina erhogoaz beçala , gloriatzeco segurança hunetan .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Haraguiaren arauez anhitz gloriatzen diradenaz gueroz , ni - ere gloriaturen naiz .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Ecen gogotic suffritzen dituçue erhoac , çuhur çaretelaric .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Ecen suffritzen duçue baldin nehorc suiectionetan eçarten baçaituztez , baldin nehorc iresten baçaituztez , baldin nehorc çuena edequiten badrauçue , baldin nehor gaineancen bada , baldin nehorc beguithartean ioiten baçaituztez .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Desohoreren araura diot , gu indar gabe içan baguinade beçala , aitzitic certan - ere nehor hardit baina ( erhoqui minço naiz ) hardit naiz ni - ere .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Hebraico dirade ? ni - ere : Israeltar dirade ? ni - ere : Abrahamen haci dirade ? ni - ere :

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Christen ministre dirade ? ( erho anço minço naiz ) areago ni : nequetan , guehiago : çauritan hec baino guehiago : presoindeguitan , guehiago : heriotan , anhitz aldiz .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Iuduetaric recebitu vkan dut borz aldiz berrogueirá colpe , bat guti aldian .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Hiruretan cihorrez açotatu içan naiz , behin lapidatu içan naiz : hiruretan naufragio eguin vkan dut : gau eta egun itsas hundarrean içan naiz .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Bidetan anhitz aldiz , fluuioén periletan , gaichtaguinén periletan , neure nationecoetaric periletan , Gentiletaric periletan , hirian periletan , desertuan periletan , itsassoan periletan , anaye falsuén artean periletan .

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Trabaillutan eta nequetan , veillatzetan maiz , gossetan eta egarritan , barurétan maiz , hotzean eta billuci içatean .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Campotico gauçác daudela bada egun oroz assetiatzen nauenic , cein baita , Eliça guciéz dudan arthá ,

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Nor affligitzen da , eta ni eznaicén affligitzen ? nor scandalizatzen da , eta ni eznaicen erratzen ?

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Baldin gloriatu behar bada , neure infirmitatezco gaucéz gloriaturen naiz .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Iaincoac , cein baita Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Aita seculacotz benedicatua , badaqui ecen eztiodala gueçurric .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Damaseco hirian regue Aretasen icenean cen gobernadoreac , eçarri vkan çuen goaita Damasecoen hirian , ni hatzaman nahiz .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Baina leiho batetaric sasquian erautsi içan nencen murrutic : eta halatan haren escuey itzur . nenguién .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Segur ezta mengoa gloria nadin : ecen ethorriren naiz visionetara eta Iaunaren reuelationetara .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Badaçagut guiçon - bat Christ Iaunean hamalaur vrthe baino lehen ( ala gorputzetan , eztaquit : ala gorputzetic lekora , eztaquit : Iaincoac daqui ) hirurgarren cerurano harrapatu içan denic .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Eta badaquit , halaco guiçona ( ala gorputzetan , ala gorputzetic lekora , eztaquit : Iaincoac daqui )

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Ecen harrapatu içan dela Paradisura , eta ençun vkan dituela erran ecin daitezqueen hitzac , erraiteco guiçonaren impossibleac .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Halacoaz gloriaturen naiz : baina neure buruäz eznaiz gloriaturen , neure infirmitatetan baicen .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Ecen baldin gloriatu nahi banaiz , eznaiz erhoa içanen , ecen eguia erranen dut : baina iragaiten naiz , nehorc niçaz estima ezteçan nitan ikusten , edo eneganic ençuten duen baino guehiago .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Eta reuelationearen excellentiagatic altchegui eznendinçát , eman içan çait escardabat haraguian , eta Satanen aingueruä ene buffetatzeco , altchegui eznendinçát .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Gauça hunen gainean hiruretan Iaunari othoitz eguin draucat hura eneganic parti ledinçát .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Eta erran vkan draut , Asco duc ene gratiáz ecen ene puissançá infirmitatean acabatzen duc . Beraz guciz gogotic lehen gloriaturen naiz neure infirmitatetan , Christen puissançá nitan habita dadinçát .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Halacotz dut atseguin hartzen infirmitatetan , iniurietan , necessitatetan , persecutionetan , Christengatico hersturetan : ecen noiz bainaiz impotent , orduan naiz botheretsu .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Erho içan naiz neure gloriatzean : çuec bortchatu nauçue : ecen ni behar nincén çueçaz laudatu , ikussiric ecen eznaicela deusetan Apostolu excellentac baino mendreago içan , deus ezpanaiz - ere .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Segur ene Apostolutassunaren seignaleac complitu içan dirade çuetan patientia gucirequin eta signorequin eta miraculurequin eta verthuterequin .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Ecen certan berce Eliçác baino mendreago içan çarete ? ni neuror çuen caltetan nagui içan eznaicena baicen ? bidegabe haur barka ieçadaçue .

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Huná , herenci prest naiz çuetara ethortera : eta eznaiz çuen caltetan nagui içanen : ecen eznabila çuen diraden gaucén ondoan , baina ceurón ondoan : ecen haourréc eztute aitendaco thesaurizatu behar , baina aitéc haourrendaco .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Eta niçaz den becembatean guciz gogotic despendaturen dut eta despendaturen naiz çuen arimacgatic : çuec hambat eta guehiago maite çaituztedalaric , gutiago onhetsia banaiz - ere .

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Baina biz , nic etzaituztedan cargatu vkan : ordea sotil içanez , fineciaz hartu vkan çaituztet .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: Çuetara igorri vkan ditudanetaric batez - ere pillatu vkan çaituztet ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Othoitz eguin draucat Titeri , eta harequin igorri vkan dut anayebat : ala pillatu vkan çaituztez Titec ? ezgara Spiritu batez ebili ican ? ezgara hatz ber - batez ebili içan ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Berriz vste duçue ecen gure buruäc excusatzen ditugula çuec baithara ? Iaincoaren aitzinean , Christean minço gara : baina gauça hauc gucioc , gucizco maiteác , çuen edificationeagatic .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Ecen beldur dut guertha eztadin , ethor nadinean , nahi etzintuqueiztedan beçalaco eriden etzaitzatedan , eta ni eriden eznadin çueçaz nahi eztuçuen beçalaco : nolazpait eztiraden guduac , inuidiác , asserretassunac , liscarrac , gaizquierraiteac , chuchurlác , vrguluac , seditioneac :

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Eta berriz nathorrenean abacha ezneçan neure Iaincoac çuec baithan , eta nigar eztaguidan lehen bekatu eguin duten anhitzez , eta emendatu eztiradenéz cithalqueriataric , paillardiçataric eta eguin vkan duten insolentiatic .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Haur da çuetara ethorten naicén heren aldia Biga edo hirur testimonioren ahoan fermu içanen da hitz gucia .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Aitzinetic erran vkan dut , eta berriz aitzinetic diot , present baninz beçala , eta absent naicelaric orain scribatzen drauet lehen bekatu eguin duteney , eta goitico guciey , ecen berriz banathor eztudala nehor guppida vkanen .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Christ nitan minço denaren experientiaren ondoan çabiltzatenaz gueroz , cein ezpaita infirmo çuetara , baina da botheretsu çuetan .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Ecen crucificatu içan bada - ere infirmitatez , alabaina vici da Iaincoaren verthutez : ecen gu - ere infirmo gara harequin , baina vici gara harequin Iaincoaren verthutez çuec baithara .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Çuen buruäc experimentaitzaçue eya fedean çaretenez , çuen buruäc phorogaitzaçue : ala eztituçue çuen buruäc eçagutzen , ecen Iesus Christ çuetan dela ? baldin reprobo ezpaçarete .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Baina sperança dut eçaguturen duçuela ecen gu ezgarela reprobo .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Eta othoitz eguiten draucat Iaincoari , deus gaizquiric eguin ezteçaçuen : ez gu approbatu eriden gaitecençát , baina çuec vngui daguiçuençát , eta gu reprobo beçala garençát .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Ecen deus ecin daidiquegu eguiaren contra , baina eguiaren alde .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Ecen alegueratzen gara gu flaccu garen , eta çuec erscon çareten : eta haur - ere desiratzen dugu , diot , çuen perfectionea .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Halacotz gauça hauc absent naicela scribatzen ditut , present içanen naicenean seueritatez vsat ezteçadançát , Iaunac edificationetacotz eta ez destructionetacotz eman drautan botherearen araura .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Gaineracoaz , anayeác , aleguera çaiteztez , auança çaiteztez perfect içatera , consola çaiteztez , çareten consentimendu batetaco , çareten vici baquean , eta charitatezco eta baquezco Iaincoa içanen da çuequin .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Elkar saluta eçaçue pot saindu batez . Salutatzen çaituztez saindu guciéc .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Iesus Christ Iaunaren gratiá , eta Iaincoaren charitatea , eta Spiritu sainduaren communicationea dela çuequin gucioquin . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: PAVL Apostoluac ( ez guiçonéz ezeta guiçonen partez , baina Iesus Christen eta Iainco Aita hura hiletaric resuscitatu duenaren partez . )

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: Eta enequin diraden anaye guciéc , Galatiaco Elicey :

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea Iainco Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ gure Iaunaganic .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Ceinec bere buruä eman vkan baitu gure bekatuacgatic , idoqui guençançát secula gaichto hunetaric , gure Iainco eta Aitaren vorondatearen araura .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Hari dela gloria secula seculacotz . Amen .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Miraz nago nola horrein sarri , Christen gratiara deithu vkan cenduztena vtziric transportatu içan çareten berce Euangeliotara :

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Berceric batre eztelaric : baina batzuc trublatzen çaituztéz , eta nahi duté erauci Christen Euangelioa :

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Baina baldin guc - ere , edo Aingueru batec cerutic euangelizatzen badrauçue , euangelizatu drauçuegunaz berceric , maradicatu biz .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Lehen erran dugun beçala , orain - ere berriz diot , Baldin norbeitec euangelizatzen badrauçue recebitu duçuenaz berceric , maradicatu biz .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Ecen orain guiçonéz predicatzen dut ala Iaincoaz ? ala guiçonén gogara eguin nahiz nabila ? Segur baldin oraino guiçonén gogaraco baninz , Christen cerbitzari ezninçande .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Iaquin eraciten drauçuet bada , anayeác , niçaz predicatu içan den Euangelioa , eztela guiçonaren araura .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ecen eztut hura guiçonganic recebitu ez ikassi : baina Iesus Christen reuelationez .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Ecen ençun duçue nola conuersatu vkan dudan Iudaismoan , nola terriblequi Iaincoaren Eliçá persecutatzen eta deseguiten nuen :

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Eta nola probetchatzen nincén Iudaismoan , ene quidetaric anhitz baino guehiago , neure nationean , neure aitén ordenancetara affectione guehienduna nincelaric .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Baina Iaincoaren placera içan denean ( ceinec neure amaren sabeleandanic appartatu baininduen eta deithu bainau bere gratiaz )

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: Bere Semearen reuelatzera nitan , hura euangeliza neçançát Gentilén artean , eznaiz bertan conseillatu içan haraguiarequin eta odolarequin :

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Eta eznaiz Ierusalemera itzuli içan ni baino lehen Apostolu ciradenetara : baina ioan nendin Arabiara : eta harçara itzul nendin Damascera .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Gueroztic hirur vrtheren buruän itzul nendin Ierusalemera Pierrisen visitatzera : eta egon nendin harequin amorz egun .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Eta berce Apostoluetaric ezneçan ikus Iacques Iaunaren anayea baicen .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Baina çuey scribatzen drauzquiçuedan gaucetan , huná , badiotsuet Iaunaren aitzinean , ecen eztiodala gueçurric .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Guero ethor nendin Syriaco eta Ciliciaco herrietara .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Eta nincen beguithartez eçagun gabea Iudeaco Eliça Christean ciradeney :

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Baina solament ençun vkan çuten erraiten cela , Gu berce orduz persecutatzen guentuenac , orain predicatzen du berce orduz deseguiten çuen fedea .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Eta glorificatzen çuten Iaincoa nitan .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Guero hamalaur vrtheren buruän , berriz igan nendin Ierusalemera Barnabasequin , eta Tite - ere harturic .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Eta igan nendin reuelationez , eta hæy communica niecén Gentilén artean predicatzen dudan Euangelioa , baina particularqui estimatan diradeney , neholere alfer laster aznaguian edo eguin eznuen .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Baina Tite - ere , cein baitzén enequin , Grec bacen - ere , etzedin bortcha circonciditu içatera .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Anaye falsu Eliçán bere buruz nahastecatuén causaz , cein sar baitzitecen gure libertate Iesus Christean dugunaren espia içatera , gu suiectionetara erekar guençatençát .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Eta suiectionez ezquitzaizte susmettitu momentbat - ere , Euangelioco eguiác çuetan iraun leçançát .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Eta eztut deus ikassi cerbait diradela irudi dutenetaric ( nolaco noizpait içan diraden , etzait deus hunquitzen : ecen Iaincoac eztu guiçonaren campoco apparentiá hartzen ) ecen estimatan diradenéc eztraudaté deus guehiagoric communicatu .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Baina contrariora , ikussi vkan çutenean ecen Preputioco Euangelioaren predicationea niri eman içan çaitadala , Circoncisionecoa Pierrisi beçala :

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: ( Ecen Pierris baithan obratu vkan duenac Circoncisioneco Apostolutassunera , obratu vkan du ni baithan - ere Gentiletara . )

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Eta eçagutu çutenean niri eman içan çaitadan gratiá , Iacquesec eta Cephasec eta Ioannesec ( habe diradela estimatuéc ) lagunçazco escuinac eman drauzquigute niri eta Barnabasi : gu Gentiletarát guendoacençát eta hec Circoncisionecoètarat :

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Solament auisatu gaituzte paubréz orhoit guentecen : eta haren beraren eguitera arthatsu içan naiz .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Eta ethorri , içan cenean Pierris Antiochera , bekoquiz resisti nieçon hari , ceren reprehenditzeco baitzén .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Ecén Iacquesganic batzu ethor citecen baino lehen , Gentilequin batean iaten çuen : baina ethorri içan ciradenean , retira eta separa cedin hetaric Circoncisionecoén beldurrez .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Eta simulationez vsatzen çuten harequin batean berce Iuduec - ere : hala non Barnabas - ere erekarri içan baitzén hayén simulationera .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Baina ikussi vkan nuenean ecen etzabiltzala oin chuchenez , Euangelioco eguiaren araura , erran nieçón Pierrisi gucien aitzinean , Baldin hi Iudu aicelaric Gentil anço vici bahaiz , eta ez Iudu anço , cergatic Gentilac bortchatzen dituc iudaizatzera ?

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Gu baicara naturaz Iudu , eta ez Gentiletaric bekatore .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Daquigularic ecen eztela guiçona iustificatzen Legueco obréz , baina Iesus Christen fedeaz : guc - ere Iesus Christ baithan sinhetsi vkan dugu , iustifica guentecençát Christen fedeaz , eta ez Legueco obréz : ceren haraguiric batre ezpaita iustificaturen Legueco obréz ,

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Eta baldin Christez iustificatu nahiz gabiltzalaric , erideiten bagara gueuror - ere bekatore , Christ halacotz bekatuaren ministre da ? Guertha eztadila .

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Ecen baldin deseguin ditudan gauçác harçara edificatzen baditut , transgressor neure buruä eguiten dut .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Ecen ni Legueaz Legueari hil içan nazayó , Iaincoari vici nequionçat , Christequin batean crucificatu içan naiz .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Bada vici naiz , ez guehiagoric ni , baina vici da nitan Christ eta orain haraguian vici naicen vicitzeaz Iaincoaren Semearen fedeaz vici naiz , ceinec onhetsi vkan bainau , eta eman vkan baitu bere buruä enegatic .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Eztut abolitzen Iaincoaren gratiá : ecen baldin iustitiá Legueaz bada , beraz Christ mengoa gabe hil içan da .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: O Galatiano çoroác , norc encantatu çaituztéz eguia obedi ezteçaçuen ? ceiney beguién aitzinean lehenetic representatu içan baitzaiçue Iesus Christ , çuen artean crucificatua ?

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Haur solament iaquin nahi dut çuetaric , Legueco obréz Spiritu saindua recebitu vkan duçue , ala fedearen predicationeaz ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Hain çoro çarete , Spirituaz hassiric , orain haraguiaz acaba deçaçuen ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Alfer hambat suffritu vkan duçue ? baldin alfer - ere bada .

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Bada , Spiritua çuey fornitzen drauçuenac , eta verthuteac çuetan obratzen dituenac , Legueco obréz eguiten du , ala fedearen predicationeaz ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Baina aitzitic Abrahamec nola Iaincoa sinhetsi vkan baitu , eta hari iustitiatan imputatu içan baitzayo :

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Hala badaquiçue ecen fedezcoac diradela Abrahamen haour .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Eta Scripturác aitzinetic ikussiric ecen fedeaz Iaincoac iustificatzen dituela Gentilac , aitzinetic euangelizatu vkan drauca Abrahami , cioela , Benedicatuac içanen dituc hitan Gende guciac .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Bada , fedezcoac benedicatzen dirade Abraham fidelarequin .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Ecen norere Legueco obretaric baitirade , maledictionearen azpian dirade : ecen scribatua da , Maradicatua da norere ezpaita egonen Legueco liburän scribatuac diraden gauça gucietan , hec eguin ditzançát .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Eta Legueaz nehor eztela iustificatzen Iaincoa baithan , gauça claroa da : ecen iustoa fedez vicico da .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Eta Leguea ezta fedetic : baina gauça hec eguinen dituen guiçona , vicico da hetan .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Baina Christec redemitu vkan gaitu Leguearen maledictionetic , bera guregatic maledictione eguin içanic : ( ecen scribatua da , Maradicatua da çurean vrkatua den gucia )

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Abrahamen benedictionea Gentiletara hel ledinçát Iesus Christez , eta Spirituaren promessa fedez recebi deçagunçát .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Anayeác , guiçonén ançora minço naiz , Appoinctamendubat guiçon - batena badere , authoritatez confirmatua bada , nehorc eztu hausten ez emendatzen .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Abrahami bada promessac erran içan çaizquio , eta haren haciari . Eztu erraiten , Eta haciey , anhitzez minço baliz beçala : baina batez beçala , Eta hire haciari , cein baita Christ .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Haur bada diot , lehenetic Iaincoaz Christen respectuz confirmatu içan den alliançá , laur - ehun eta hoguey eta hamar vrtheren buruän ethorri içan den Legueac eztuela hausten , promessa aboli deçançát .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Ecen baldin heretagea Leguetic bada , ez ia promessetic : baina Abrahami promessetic eman vkan drauca Iaincoac .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Certaco da beraz Leguea ? Transgressionén causaz eratchequi içan da , ethor leiteno haci hura ceini promessa eguin içan baitzayó , eta Leguea ordenatu içan da Aingueruéz , Ararteco baten escuz .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Eta Arartecoa ezta batena : baina Iaincoa bat da .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Leguea beraz Iaincoaren promessén contra eratchequi içan da ? Guertha eztadila . Ecen eman içan baliz Leguea ceinec viuifica ahal leçan , segur Leguetic liçate iustitiá .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Baina ertsi vkan du Scripturác gucia bekatuaren azpian , promessa Iesus Christen fedeaz eman lequiençát sinhesten duteney .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Bada fedea ethor cedin baino lehen , Leguearen azpian beguiratzen guinen ertsiac reuelatzeco cen federa heltzeco .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Bada , Leguea gure pedagogo içan da Christgana , fedez iustifica guentecençát .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Baina fedea ethorriz gueroztic , ezgara guehiagoric pedagogoren azpian .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ecen guciác Iaincoaren haour çarete Iesus Christ baithango fedeaz .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Ecen batheyatu içan çareten guciéc Christ iaunci vkan duçue .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ezta Iuduric ez Grecquic , ezta sclaboric ez libreric , ezta arric ez emeric : ecen çuec gucioc bat çarete Iesus Christean .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Eta baldin çuec Christenac baçarete , beraz Abrahamen haci çarete , eta promessaren arauez heredero .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Eta haur erraiten dut , Herederoa haour deno , ezta different deusetan cerbitzariaganic , gauça gucien iabe badere :

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Baina tutorén eta curatorén azpico da aitáz ordenatu içan çayón demborarano

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Hala gu - ere haourrac guinenean munduco elementén azpiratuac guinén suiectionetan :

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Baina ethorri içan denean demboraren complimendua , igorri vkan du Iaincoac bere Semea emaztetic eguina , eta Leguearen azpico eguina :

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: Leguearen azpico ciradenac redemi litzançát , haourrén adoptionea recebi gueneçançát .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Eta ceren haour baitzarete , igorri vkan du Iaincoac çuen bihotzetara bere Semearen Spiritua , oihuz dagoela , Abba , erran nahi baita , Aita .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Bada guehiagoric ezaiz sclabo , baina semé : eta baldin seme bahaiz , Iaincoaren heredero - ere Christez .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Baina Iaincoa eçagutzen etzendutenean cerbitzatzen centuzten naturaz iainco eztiradenac .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Baina orain Iaincoa eçagutzen duçuenaz gueroz , baina aitzitic Iaincoaz eçagutu çaretenaz gueroz , nola conuertitzen çarete harçara element infirmoetara eta paubretara , cein ohi beçala cerbitzatu nahi baitituçue ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Egunac beguiratzen dituçue eta hilebetheac , eta demborác eta vrtheac .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Beldurra dut çueçaz , alfer trabaillatu naicén çuec baithan .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Çareten ni beçala : ecen ni - ere çuec beçala naiz : anayeác , othoitz eguiten drauçuet : ni deusetan eznauçue iniuriatu vkan .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Eta badaquiçue nola haraguiaren infirmitaterequin euangelizatu vkan drauçuedan lehen .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Eta niçaz ene haraguian eguiten cen experientiá eztuçue menospreciatu ez arbuiatu vkan , aitzitic Iaincoaren Ainguerubat beçala recebitu vkan nauçue , bayeta Iesus Christ beçala .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Ceric cen bada çuen dohainontassuna ? ecen testificatzen drauçuet , baldin possible içan albaliz , çuen beguiac idoquiric eman cendrauzquedetela .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Etsay eguin natzaiçue eguia erraiten drauçuedanean ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Çueçaz ielossi dirade , ez onetacotz baina aitzitic idoqui nahi çaituztéz berac desira ditzaçuençát .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Baina on da anhitz onhestea gauça onean bethiere , eta ez solament çuec baithan present naicenean .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Neure haourtoác , ceinéz berriz ertzeco penatan bainaiz , Christ forma daiteno çuetan .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Nahi nuque orain çuequin içan , eta cambiatu neure voza : ecen dudatan naiz çueçaz .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Erradaçue Leguearen azpico içan nahi çaretenéc , Leguea eztuçue ençuten ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Ecen scribatua da Abrahamec bi seme vkan cituela : bat nescatoaganic , eta bat libreaganic .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Baina nescatoaganicoa haraguiaren arauez iayo içan cen , eta libreaganicoa , promessaren partez .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Gauça hauc comparationez erraiten dirade . Ecen hauc dirade bi alliançác , bata da Sinaco menditic Agar , suiectionetara engendratzen duena :

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: ( Ecen Sina mendibat da Arabian Ierusaleme oraingoari ihardesten draucanic ) eta bere haourrequin cerbitzutan dena :

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Baina Ierusaleme gorá , libre da , cein baita gure gución ama .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Ecen scribatua da , Alegueradi steril ertzen ezaicená : dendadi eta heyagora eguin ertzeco penan ezaicená : ecen guehiago ditun vtziaren haourrac ecen ez senhardunarenac .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Gu bada , anayeác , Isaac beçala promessezco haour gara .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Baina nola orduan haraguiaren arauez sorthuac persecutatzen baitzuen Spirituaren arauez sorthua , hala orain - ere .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Baina cer dio Scripturac ? Egotzquic campora nescatoa eta haren semea : ecen eztic heretaturen nescatoaren semeac librearen semearequin .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Bada , anayeác , ezgara nescatoaren haour baina librearen .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Beraz Christec libre eguin gaituen libertatean , çaudete fermu , eta berriz etzaiteztela eduqui suiectionezco vztarriaz .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Huná , nic Paulec erraiten drauçuet ecen baldin circoncidi baçaiteztez Christ etzaiçuela deus probetchaturen .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Eta testificatzen draucat berriz circonciditzen den guiçon guciari , ecen hura Legue guciaren beguiratzera çordun dela .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Christez gabetu çarete Legueaz iustificatu nahi çareten gucioc : eta gratiatic erori çarete .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Ecen gu fedetic den Spirituaz iustitiazco sperançaren beguira gaude :

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Ecen Iesus Christean ez circoncisioneac du deus balio , ezeta preputioac : baina charitatez obratzen duen fedeac .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Vngui laster eguiten cenduten , norc empatchatu çaituztéz , eguia obedi etzeneçaten ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Persuasione hori ezta çuec deitzen çaituztenaganic .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Altchagarri appurbatec orhe gucia mincen du

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Ni seguratzen naiz çueçaz gure Iaunean , ecen eztuçuela berce sendimenduric vkanen : baina çuec trublatzen çaituztenac , ekarriren du condemnationea , norere baita hura .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Bada niçaz den becembatean , anayeác , baldin are circoncisionea predicatzen badut , cergatic are persecutatzen naiz ? beraz abolitu da crutzeazco scandaloa .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Ailitez trenca çuec trublatzen çaituztenac .

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Ecen , anayeác , çuec libertatera deithu içan çaréte : solament beguirauçue , libertatea eztén haraguiari occasionetan : baina elkar charitatez cerbitza eçaçue .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ecen Legue gucia hitz batetan complitzen da , cein baita , Onhetsiren duc eure hurcoa eure buruä beçala .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Baldineta elkar aussiquiten eta iresten baduçue : beguirauçue bata berceaz consumi etzaitezten .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Eta haur erraiten drauçuet , Spirituaren araura ebil çaiteztez : eta haraguiaren guthiciac eztitzaçuela compli .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Ecen haraguiac guthiciatzen du Spirituaren contrá , eta Spirituac haraguiaren contra : eta gauça hauc elkarren contra dirade : hala non nahi dituçuen gauça guciac ezpaitituçue eguiten .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Baldineta Spirituaz guidatzen baçarete , etzarete Leguearen azpico .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Bada , çogueriac dirade haraguiaren obrác , cein baitirade , adulterioa , paillardiçá , satsutassuna , insolentiá ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: Idolatriá , poçoinqueriá , etsaigoác , bekaizteriác , asserretassunac , liscarrac , diuisioneac , heresiác ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: Inuidiác , guiça - erhaitecác , hordiqueriác , gormandiçác , eta hauc irudiac , gauça hauc aitzinetic erraiten drauzquiçuet , lehen - ere erran dudan beçala : ecen halaco gauçác eguiten dituztenéc Iaincoaren resumá heretaturen eztutela .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Bailla Spirituaren fructua da charitatea , alegrançá , baquea , spiritu patienta , benignitatea , ontassuna , fedea , emetassuna , temperantiá .

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: Hunelacoén contra legueric ezta .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Ecen Christen diradenéc haraguia crucificatu duté affectionéquin eta guthiciéquin .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Baldin vici bagara Spirituz , Spirituz ebil - ere gaitecen .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Ezgaitecela vana - gloria guthicioso eguin , elkar tharritatuz , elkargana inuidia vkanez .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Anayeác , baldineta erori içan bada guiçon - bat cembeit faltatan , çuec spiritual çaretenoc goiti eçaçue haina emetassunetaco spiriturequin : consideratzen dualaric eure buruä , hi - ere tenta ezadin .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Elkarren cargác egar itzaçue : eta halaz compli eçaçue Christen Leguea .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Ecen baldin norbeitec vste badu cerbait dela , deus eztelaric , harc bere fantasiaz bere buruä enganatzen du .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Bada bere obrá experimenta beça batbederac : eta orduan bere baithan gloria vkanen du , eta ez berceric baithan .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Ecen batbederac bere cargá ekarriren du .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Bada communica bieçó hitzean iracasten denac , bere iracasleari , on gucietaric .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Etzaiteztela engana : Iaincoa ecin escarnia daite : ecen cer - ere ereinen baitu guiçonac , hura bilduren - ere du .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Ecen bere haraguiaren ereiten duenac , haraguitic bilduren du corruptione : baina Spirituaren ereiten duenac , Spiritutic bilduren du vicitze eternala .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Bada vnguiguitez ezgaitecela enoya : ecen bere sasoinean bilduren dugu , baldin lacho bilha ezpagaitez .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Bada dembora duguno , daguiegun vngui guciey , baina principalqui fedeco domesticoey .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Badacussaçue cein letra lucez scribatu drauçuedan neure escuz .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Nor - ere nahi baitirade apparent eracutsi haraguian , hec bortchatzen çaituztez circonciditu içatera : solament Christen crutzeagatic persecutioneric suffri ezteçatençát .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Ecen circonciditzen diradenéc berec - ere eztute Leguea beguiratzen : baina nahi duté çuec circoncidi çaitezten , çuen haraguian gloria ditecencát .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Baina niri guertha eztaquidala gloria nadin Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren crutzean baicen : ceinez mundua niri crucificatu baitzait , eta ni munduari .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Ecen Iesus Christean ez circoncisioneac du deusbalio , ez preputioac , baina creatura berriac

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Eta nor - ere regla hunen araura ebilten baitirade , baquea içanen da hayén gainean eta misericordia , eta Iaincoaren Israelen gainean .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Hemendic harát nehorc enoyuric eztidala : ecen nic Iesus Iaunaren mercác dacazquet neure gorputzean .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Anayeác , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gratiá dela , çuen spirituarequin . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Paul Iaincoaren vorondatez Iesus Christen Apostoluac Iesus Christ Iaunean Ephesen diraden sainduey eta fideley :

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea Iainco gure Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Laudatu dela Iaincoa cein baita Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Aita , ceinec benedicatu baiquaitu benediçoin spiritual gucian , ceruètan Christ baithan :

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Nola elegitu vkan baiquaitu hartan mundua funda cedin baino lehen , saindu guinençat eta irreprehensible haren aitzinean charitatez :

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Ceinec predestinatu vkan baiquaitu bere baithan adopta guençançát Iesus Christez , bere vorondatearen placer onaren araura ,

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Bere gratiazco gloriaren laudoriotan , ceinez bere gogaraco eguin baiquaitu bere maitean .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Ceinetan baitugu redemptionea haren odolaz , cein baita bekatuén barkamendua haren gratiazco abrastassunaren araura :

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: Ceinetaric gaindi eraguin baitu abundosqui gure gainera sapientia eta intelligentia gucitan :

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Guri eçagut eraciric bere vorondatearen mysterioa , bere placer onaren araura , cein lehendanic ordenatu baitzuen bere baithan :

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Demborén complimenduaren dispensationean gucién elkargana biltzera Christean , hambat ceruètan diradenén nola lurrean , hura bera baithan :

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Ceinetan eguin - ere baicara haren heretage , predestinatu içanic , haren ordenançaren araura , ceinec gauça guciac eguiten baititu bere vorondateco conseilluaren araura .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Haren gloriaren laudoriotaco garençát , lehenetaric Christ baithan sperança vkan dugunoc .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Ceinetan çuec - ere sperança vkan baituçue eguiazco hitza ençun vkanic , cein baita , çuen saluamendutaco Euangelioa : ceinetan sinhetsi - ere vkanic , ciguilatu içan baitzarete promessaren Spiritu sainduaz :

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Cein baita gure heretagearen errésa , haren possessione conquestatuaren redemptionerano haren gloriaren laudoriotan .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Halacotz ni - ere ençunic Iesus Iaunean duçuen fedea , eta saindu gucietaraco charitatea ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: Eznaiz guelditzen çuengatic gratién rendatzetic , mentione çueçaz eguiten dudala neure othoitzetan .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Iaincoac , Aita gloriazcoac diçuençát sapientiataco eta reuelationetaco Spiritua , haren eçagutzearen vkaiteco :

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Çuen adimenduco beguiac illuminaturic : daquiçuençát ceric den haren vocationearen sperançá , eta ceric den haren heretageco gloriaren abrastassuna sainduetan :

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Eta ceric den haren botherearen handitassun excellenta sinhesten dugunotara , haren bothere borthitzaren operationez ,

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: Cein eracutsi vkan baitu Christ baithan , hura hiletaric resuscitaturic eta iar eraciric bere escuinean ceruètan ,

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Principaltassun , eta puissança , eta verthute , eta dominatione ororen garayan , eta ez solament secula hunetan baina ethortecoan - ere aippatzen den icen ororen garayan .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Eta gauça guciac haren oinén azpico suiet eguin vkan ditu , eta bera eçarri vkan du gauça ororen garayan Eliçaren buru içateco :

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Cein baita haren gorputz , eta gauça guciac gucietan complitzen dituenaren complimendu .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Eta çuec viuificatu çaituzte hilac cinetelaric faltetan eta bekatuetan :

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Ceinétan noizpait ebili içan baitzarete mundu hunen cursuaren araura , airearen bothereco princearen araura , cein baita desobedientiazco haourretan orain obratzen duen spiritua :

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Ceinén artean guc guciec - ere noizpait conuersatu vkan baitugu gure haraguiaren guthicietan eguiten guentuela , haraguiaren eta gure pensamenduén desirac : eta naturaz hiraren haour guinén berceac - ere beçala .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Baina Iainco misericordiaz abratsac bere charitate handi gu onhetsi gaituenagatic ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: Eta bekatuz hilac guinelaric , elkarrequin , Christez viuificatu vkan gaitu , ceinen gratiaz saluatu içan baitzarete :

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Eta resuscitatu vkan gaitu elkarrequin eta iar eraci ceruètan Iesus Christean .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Eracuts leçançát ethorteco diraden seculetan bere gratiaren abrastassun abundanta bere gureganaco benignitateaz Iesus Christean .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Ecen gratiaz saluatu içan çarete fedearen moienez : eta hori ez çuetaric : Iaincoaren dohaina da :

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Ezobréz , nehor gloria eztadinçát .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Ecen haren obrá gara Iesus Christean creatuac obra onetara , cein preparatu baititu Iaincoac hetan ebil guentecençát .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Halacotz , orhoit çaitezte nola çuec noizpait Gentilac haraguian , Preputio deitzen baitzineten , haraguian Circoncisione deitzen denaz eta escuz eguiten denaz ,

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Baitzineten dembora hartan Christ gabe , Israeleco republicarequin deus communic etzindutelaric , eta promessaren alliancetaric estranger , sperançaric etzindutelaric , eta Iainco gabe munduan cinetelaric :
