text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Baina orain Iesus Christean , çuec noizpait baitzineten vrrun , hurbildu içan çarete Christen odolaz .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Ecen hura da gure baquea , biac bat eguin dituena , eta bién arteco paretaren cerraillua hautsi duena :

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Bere haraguiaz abolituric etsaigoá , cein baita , manamenduetaco leguea , ordenancetan consistitzen dena , biéz bere baithan guiçon berribat eguin leçançát , baquea eguiten luela .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Eta biac gorputz batetan reconcilia lietzonçat , Iaincoari crutzeaz , hartan etsaigoá deseguinic .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Eta ethorriric euangelizatu vkan drauçue baquea , çuey vrrungoey , eta hæy hurbilecoey .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Ecen harçaz dugu biéc Spiritu batetan sartze Aitagana .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Etzarete beraz guehiagoric estrangér eta campoco , baina sainduén burgesquide , eta Iaincoaren domestico :

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Apostoluén eta Prophetén fundament gainean edificatuac , ceinen har cantoin principala baita Iesus Christ bera :

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Ceinetan edificio gucia elkarri eratchequiric , handitzen baita , temple saindu içateco Iaunean :

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Ceinetan çuec - ere elkarrequin edificatzen baitzarete Iaincoaren tabernacle çaretençát , Spirituaz .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Causa hunegatic ni Paul Iesus Christen presonér naiz çuengatic , baitzarete Gentil .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Baldin behinçat ençun vkan baduçue çuec baithara eman içan çaitadan Iaincoaren gratiaren dispensationea .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Nola Iaincoac reuelationez eçagut eraci drautan mysterioa ( lehen hitz gutitan scribatu drauçuedan beçala :

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Haren iracurtzetic eçagut ahal deçaqueçue ceric den ene eçagutzea Christen mysterioan . )

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Cein ezpaita eçagutu içan guiçonén seméz iragan generationetan , orain reuelatu içan çayen beçala haren Apostolu eta Propheta sainduey Spirituaz :

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Ecen Gentilac diradela herederoquide eta gorputz batetaco bereco eta haren promessean participant Christean Euangelioaz .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Ceinen ministre eguin içan bainaiz Iaincoaren gratiaren dohainaren arauez , cein eman içan baitzait haren botherearen operationearen arauez .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Niri bada saindu gucietaco chipienari eman içan çait gratia haur , Gentilén artean Christen abrastassun comprehendi ecin daitenaren euangelizatzeco ,

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Eta guciey manifestatzeco ceric den mysterio bethidanic Iaincoa baithan estalia cenaren communionea , ceinec gauça guciac creatu baithitu Iesus Christez :

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Orain maniferta daquiençat Eliçáz ceruètaco principaltassuney eta botherey Iaincoaren sapientia anhitz maneraz diuersa :

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Iesus Christ gure Iaunean eguin vkan duen ordenança eternalaren araura :

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Ceinez baitugu libertate eta sartze confidançarequin , hura baithan dugun fedeaz .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Halacotz , nago requerimenduz etzaitezten enoya ene çuengatico afflictioneacgatic , cein baita çuen gloriá .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Causa hunegatic gurtzen ditut neure belhaunac Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Aitagana ,

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Ceinaganic ahaidetassun gucia ceruètan eta lurrean deitzen baita ,

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Eman dieçaçuençát , bere gloriaren abrastassunaren arauez , indarrez fortifica çaitezten haren Spirituaz barneco guiçonean :

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: Eta habita dadin Christ fedez çuen bihotzetan :

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: Charitatean erro eguinic eta fundaturic , comprehendi ahal deçaçuen saindu guciequin ceric den çabaltassuna eta lucetassuna , barnatassuna eta goratassuna :

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: Eta eçagut deçaçuen Christen amorio eçagutze gucia iragaiten duena : compli çaiteztençát Iaincoaren complimendu gucian .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Bada gutan obratzen duen bothereaz gauça gucién eguitera , escatzen garen edo pensatzen dugun baino abundantquiago botheretsu denari ,

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: Dela gloria Eliçán Iesus Christez , generatione gucietan secula seculacotz . Amen .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Othoitz eguiten drauçuet bada nic , bainaiz presoner gure Iaunean , ebil çaitezten deithu içan çareten vocationeari dagocan beçala ,

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Humilitate eta emetassun gucirequin , spiritu patient batequin , elkar supportatzen duçuelaric charitatez :

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Arthatsu çaretelaric Spirituaren vnitatearen beguiratzera baquezco lotgarriaz .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Gorputzbat da eta Spiritubat , deithu - ere içan çareten beçala çuen vocationearen sperança batetara :

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Iaunbat , Fedebat , Baptismobat :

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Gucién Iainco eta Aitabat , cein baita gucién gainean , eta gucién artean , eta çuetan guciotan .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Baina gutaric batbederari gratia eman içan çayó Christen dohainaren neurriaren araura .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Halacotz dio , Goiti iganic captiuo eraman vkan du captiuitatea , eta eman drauzte dohainac guiçoney .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Eta igaite hura cer da , lehen lurreco parte behera hautara iautsi - ere dela baicen ?

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Iautsi içan den hura bera da igan - ere dena ceru gucién garaira , gauça guciac bethe litzançát .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Harc bada eman ditu batzu , Apostolu içateco : eta berceac , Propheta : eta berceac , Euangelista : eta berceac , Pastor eta Doctor içateco ,

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Sainduén elkarganatzeagatic , ministerioaren obracotzát , Christen gorputzaren edificationetan .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Guciac rencontra gaitezqueno fedearen , eta Iaincoaren Semearen eçagutzearen vnitatean , guiçon perfectotan , Christen adin perfecteco neurrira :

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Guehiagoric haour ezgarençát balençán ebilteco , eta doctrinataco haice oroz hara huna guiçonén enganioz , eta hayén finecia cautelosqui enganagarrizcoz erabili içateco .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Baina eguiari garreitzalaric charitaterequin , gucietan handi gaitecen hartan , cein baita buruä , Christ :

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Ceinetaric gorputz guciac vngui iunctaturic , eta forniduraren iunctura guciéz elkarrequin iossiric , membroetaric batbederaren neurrico indarraren araura hartzen baitu gorputzeco hacitze , bere buruären edificationetan charitatez .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Haur bada erraiten dut , eta Iaunaz requeritzen çaituztet , guehiagoric etzaitezten ebil berce Gentilac dabiltzan beçala berén adimenduco vanitatean ,

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Adimenduz ilhunduac diradelaric eta Iaincoaren vicitzetic appartatuac , hetan berén bihotzeco gogortassunetic den ignorantiaren causaz :

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Eta sendimendu gabeturic , bere buruac abandonnatu vkan dituzté dissolutionetara , cithalqueria ororen eguitera , appetitu desordenaturequin .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Baina çuec eztuçue hala ikassi vkan Christ :

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Baldin behinçát hura ençun vkan baduçue , eta harçaz iracatsiac baçarete , eguiá Iesus baithan den beçala :

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Ken deçaçuen leheneco conuersationeaz den becembatean guiçon çaharra , enganagarrizco guthicién araura corrumpitzen dena :

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Eta arramberri çaitezten çuen adimenduco spirituan :

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Eta iaunz deçaçuen guiçon berria , cein Iaincoaren araura creatu içan baita iustitiatan eta eguiazco saindutassunetan .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Halacotz , gueçurra kenduric , minça çaiteztez eguiaz batbedera cein çuen hurcoarequin : ecen elkarren membro gara .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Asserre çaiteztez , eta bekaturic eztaguiçuela : iguzquia eztadila etzin çuen asserretassunaren gainean :

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Eta lekuric eztemoçuela deabruari .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Ebaisten çuenac ezteçala guehiagoric ebats : baina aitzitic trabailla bedi on daten gauçaric eguiten duela , beharra duenari emaiteco duençát .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Hitz corrumpituric batre çuen ahotic ilki eztadila , baina cembeit bada , edificationearen vsançaco on datenic , ençuten duteney gratia eman diecençát .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Eta ezteçaçuela contrista Iaincoaren Spiritu saindua , ceinez ciguilatuac baitzarete redemptioneco egunecotzát .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Samindura eta colera , eta hira , eta oihu , eta gaitzerraite gucia çuetaric ken bedi , malitia gucirequin .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Baina çareten elkargana benigno , misericordioso eta elkarri barkaçale , Iaincoac Christez barkatu vkan drauçuen beçala .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Çareten bada Iaincoaren imitaçale haour maite anço :

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Eta ebil çaitezte charitatean Christec - ere onhetsi vkan gaituen beçala , eta liuratu vkan baitrauca bere buruä guregatic oblatione eta sacrificio Iaincoari , vssain onezco vrrinetan

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Bada , paillardiça eta cithalqueria gucia , edo auaritiá aippa - ere eztadila çuen artean , nola appartenitzen baitzaye sainduey :

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Edo gauça deshonestic , edo hitz erhoric , edo burlaqueriaric , baitirade gauça vngui eztaudenac , baina aitzitic gratién rendatzeric .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Ecen badaquiçue haur , ecen ecein ere paillartec , edo cithalec , edo auaritiosoc , cein baita idolatre , eztuela heretageric Christen eta Iaincoaren resumán .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Nehorc etzaitzatela hitz vanoz engana : ecen gauça haucgatic ethorten da Iaincoaren hirá desobedientiazco haourrén gainera .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Etzaretela bada hequin parçonér .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Ecen noizpait ilhumbe cineten , baina orain argui çarete gure Iaunean : arguizco haour anço ebil çaitezte :

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: ( Ecen Spirituaren fructua consistitzen da ontassun eta iustitia eta eguia gucitan )

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Experimentatzen duçuelaric Iaunari placent çayona cer den .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Eta ezteçaçuela communica ilhumbearen obra fructu gabetan , baina aitzitic reprehendi - ere itzaçue .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Ecen heçaz ichilic eguiten diraden gaucén erraitea - ere deshonestate da .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Baina gauça guciac , camporatzen diradenean arguiaz , manifestatzen dirade : ecen gucia manifestatzen duena , arguia da .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Halacotz erraiten du , Iratzar adi lo atzaná , eta iaiqui adi hiletaric , eta arguituren au Christec .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Gogoauçue bada nola çuhurqui ebil çaitezqueten , ez erho anço , baina çuhur anço :

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Recrubatzen duçuelaric demborá : ecen egunac gaitz dirade .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Halacotz , etzaretela çuhurtzia gabe , baina aditzale ceric den Iaunaren vorondatea .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Eta etzaiteztela hordi mahatsarnoz , ceinetan dissolutione baita : baina bethe çaitezte Spirituaz :

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Minçatzen çaretela çuen artean psalmuz , laudorioz eta cantu spiritualez : cantatzen eta resonatzen draucaçuela Iaunari çuen bihotzean .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Gratiac - ere rendatzen drautzaçuela bethiere gauça guciéz , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren icenean , gure Iainco eta Aitari :

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Elkarren suiet çaretelaric Iaincoaren beldurrequin .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Emazteác , çuen senharrén çareten suiet , Iaunaren beçala :

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Ecen senharra da emaztearen buru , Christ - ere Eliçaren buru den beçala , eta hura da gorputzaren saluadorea .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Bada , nola Eliçá baita Christen suiet , hala emazteac - ere diraden bere senharrén suiet gauça gucietan .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Senharrác , çuen emaztey on erizteçue , Christec - ere Eliçari on eritzi draucan beçala , eta bere buruä eman vkan baitu harengatic :

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Hura sanctifica leçançát , purificaturic vrezco ikutzez hitzaz .

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: Hura beretaco Eliça glorioso eguin leçançát , macularic ez cimurduraric gabe , ez halaco berce gauçaric : baina licén saindu eta irreprehensible .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Hala senharréc on eritzi behar drauece bere emaztey nola bere gorputzey : bere emazteari on daritzanac , bere buruäri on daritza .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Ecen nehorc egundano bere haraguiari eztrauca gaitz eritzi : baina hatzen eta entretenitzen du hura , Iaunac - ere bere Eliçá beçala :

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: Ecen haren gorputzeco membro gara , haren haraguitic eta haren heçurretaric .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Halacotz , vtziren ditu guiçonac aita eta ama eta iunctaturen çayó bere emazteari : eta biac haraguibat içanen dirade .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Mysterio haur handia da : baina ni Christez minço naiz eta Eliçáz .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Hunegatic , çuec - ere eguiçue çuen aldetic batbederac hala on daritzón bere emazteari nola bere buruäri : eta emaztea bere senharraren beldur biz .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Haourrác , obeditzáçue Iaunean çuen aita eta ama : ecen haur gauça iustoa da .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Ohoraitzac eure aita eta eure ama ( cein baita lehen manamendua promessequin )

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: Vngui hel daquiançát eta vicitze lucetaco aicençát lurraren gainean .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Eta çuec aitéc eztitzaçuela prouoca despitetara çuen haourrac , baina haz itzaçue instructionetan eta Iaunazco remonstrationetan .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Cerbitzariác , obeditzaçue haraguiaren arauez çuen nabussi diradenac , beldurrequin eta ikararequin , çuen bihotzeco simplicitaterequin , Christ beçala .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Ez beguicotzat cerbitzatzen dituçuela , guiçonén gogara eguin nahi bacendute beçala , baina Christen cerbitzari beçala , eguiten duçuelaric Iaincoaren vorondatea gogotic .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Affectione onequin cerbitzatzen duçuelaric Iauna , eta ez guiçonac :

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Daquiçuelaric haur , ecen batbederac cerere vngui eguin baituque , hura recebituren duqueela , ala den sclaboc ala librec .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Eta çuec nabussiéc , hura bera eguiçue hetara , vtziric mehatchuac : daquiçuelaric ecen hayén eta çuen Iauna ceruètan dela , eta personén acceptioneric eztela hura baithan .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Gaineracoaz , ene anayeác , fortifica çaitezte gure Iaunean , eta haren indarraren botherean .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Iaunz eçaçue Iaincoaren harmadura gucia , deabruaren celatén contra resisti ahal deçaçuençát .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Ecen eztugu borrocá odolaren eta haraguiaren contra , baina principaltassunén contra , puissancén contra , munduco iaunén , secula hunetaco ilhumbearen gobernadorén contra , leku celestialetan diraden malitia spiritualén contra .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Harren , har eçaçue Iaunaren harmadura gucia , resisti ahal deçaçuençát egun gaitzean , eta guciey garaithuric fermu çaudeten .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Çareten bada fermu , çuen guerrunceac eguiáz guerricaturic , eta iustitiazco halacreta iaunciric :

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Oinetan iaunciric baquezco Euangelioaren preparationea .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Gucién gainetic fedezco broquela harturic , ceinez Gaichtoaren gueci suz eraichequi guciac iraungui ahal ditzaçuen .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Saluamendutaco casqueta - ere har eçaçue , eta Spirituaren ezpatá , cein baita Iaincoaren hitza .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Oratione mota oroz eta supplicationez othoitz eguiten duçuela dembora gucian spirituz , eta hartara iratzarri çaudetela perseuerança gucirequin eta supplicationerequin , saindu guciagatic ,

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Eta enegatic , minçatzea eman daquidançát neure ahoaren irequiteco libertaterequin , notifica deçadançát Euangelioaren mysterioa ,

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Ceinen causaz bainaiz embachadore cadenán , harçaz frangoqui minça nadinçát , minçatu behar dudan beçala .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Eta daquizquiçuençát çuec - ere ene eguitecoac , eta ni cer ari naicén , Tychique gure anaye maiteac eta gure Iaunean ministre fidelac , gauça guciac notificaturen drauzquiçue :

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Cein harengatic beragatic igorri vkan baitut çuetara , iaquin ditzaçuençát gure eguitecoac , eta consola ditzançát çuen bihotzac .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Baquea dela anayeoquin , eta charitatea federequin Iainco Aitaganic eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Gratia dela Iesus Christ gure Iaunari puritatetan on daritzaten guciequin .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: PAVLEC eta Timotheoc Iesus Christen cerbitzariéc Iesus Christ Iaunean Philippesen diraden saindu guciey Ipizpicuequin batean eta Diacrequin ,

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea Iainco Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Esquerrac emaiten drauzquiot neure Iaincoari çueçazco orhoitzapen handirequin ,

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: ( Bethiere neure oratione gucietan çuen guciongatic bozcariorequin othoitze eguiten dudala )

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: Ceren Euangelioren communionera ethorri içan çareten , lehen egunetic oraindrano :

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Huneçaz seguratzen naicela , ecen obra ona çuetan hassi vkan duenac acabaturen duela Iesus Christen egunerano :

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Nola raçoina baita nic haur estima deçadan çueçaz gucioz , ceren bihotzean baitzadutzatet , eta ene estecaduretan , eta defensionean eta Euangelioaren confirmationean çuec gucioc enequin baitzarete participant ene gratian .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ecen Iaincoa dut testimonio cein cinez desiratzen çaituztedan çuec gucioc Iesus Christen affectione cordialez :

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Eta hunez othoiztez nago , çuen charitatea oraino guehiago eta guehiago abunda dadin eçagutzerequin eta iugemendu gucirequin :

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Gauça contrarioac discerni ditzaçuençát : pur eta trebucu gabe çaretençát Iesus Christen egunerano :

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Iesus Christez Iaincoaren gloriatan eta laudoriotan diraden fructuz betheac çaretelaric .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Eta nahi dut daquiçuen , anayeác , ecen niri heldu çaizquidan gauçác Euangelioaren auançamendutarago ethorri içan diradela :

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Hambat non ene estecadurác famatu içan baitirade Christ Iaunean Pretorio gucian eta berce leku gucietan :

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Eta anayetaric anhitz gure Iaunean ene estecaduréz asseguraturic , ausartquiago hitzaz minçatzera hauçu baitirade .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Eta batzuc behinçát inuidiaz eta contentionez , eta bercéc vorondate onez - ere Christ predicatzen duté :

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Batzuc , diot , contentionez Christ denuntiatzen duté ez purqui , ene estecadurác afflictionez emendatu vstez :

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Baina bercéc charitatez , daquitelaric ecen Euangelioaren defensionetan eçarri içan naicela .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Cer bada ? nola - ere baita , bada fictionez , bada eguiaz , Christ predicatzen da : eta hunetan alegueratzen naiz , eta alegueraturen - ere .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ceren baitaquit , ecen haur ethorriren çaitadala saluamendutara çuen orationéz , eta Iesus Cristen Spirituaren aiutáz ,

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Ene iguriquite fermuaren eta sperançaren araura , ecen deusetan eznaicela confus içanen , aitzitic libertate gucirequin bethiere beçala , orain - ere magnificaturen dela Christ ene gorputzean , vicitzez bada hiltzez bada .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Ecen niri Christ irabaizte çait vicitzera eta hiltzera .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Ala haraguian vicitzera probetchu dudanez , eta cer hauta deçaquedan , eztaquit .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Ecen hertsen naiz alde bietaric , desir dudalaric partitzera eta Christequin içatera : ecen haur vnguiz hobeago dut :

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Baina haraguian egon nadin necessarioago da çuengatic .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Eta haur seguratuqui badaquit , ecen egonen naicela eta perseueraturen dudala çuequin gucioquin çuen auançamendutan , eta çuen fedearen bozcariotan .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Abunda dadinçát çuen gloriationea Iesus Christean niçaz , ene berriz çuetaraco ethorteaz .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Solament Christen Euangelioari dagocan beçala conuersa eçaçue , bada ethor nadin eta ikus çaitzatedan , bada absent naicén , adi deçadan çuen eguitecoez , ecen perseueratzen duçuela spiritu batetan , gogo batez elkarrequin Euangelioaren fedeaz combatitzen çaretelaric , eta contrastez deusetan icitzen etzaretelaric :

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Cein baita hayén perditionetaco seignale , eta çuen saluamendutaco , eta haur Iaincoaganic .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Ecen çuey eman içan çaiçue Christgatic , ez solament hura baithan sinhestea , baina harengatic suffritzea - ere :

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Nitan ikussi duçuen , eta orain ençuten duçuen combat bera duçuela .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Bada baldin consolationeric batre bada Christean , baldin charitatezco solageamenduric batre , baldin spirituzco communioneric batre , baldin affectione cordialic eta misericordiaric batre bada ,

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: Compli eçaçue ene bozcarioa , sendimendu ber - bat duçuelaric , charitate ber - bat duçuelaric , gogo ber - batetaco eta consentimendu ber - batetaco çaretelaric .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Deus eztadila contentionez edo vana gloriaz eguin , baina bihotzetico humilitatez batac bercea bere buruä baino excellentago estima beça .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Etzaudetela batbedera cein çuen commoditatetara behá , baina bercerenetara - ere .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Bada biz çuetan Iesus Christ baithan - ere içan den affectionea .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Ceinec Iaincoaren formán celaric ezpaitu estimatu harrapatze Iaincoaren bardin içatea :

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: Badaric - ere bere buruä ezdeustu vkan du , cerbitzari forma harturic , guiçonén irudico eguin içanic , eta formaz eriden içanic guiçon beçala :

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Bere buruä beheratu vkan du obedient eguin içanic heriorano , are herio crutzecorano .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Halacotz Iaincoac - ere hura subiranoqui goratu vkan du , eta icen - bat eman vkan drauca icen gucién gaineco denic :

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Iesusen icenean ceruètacoén eta lurrecoén eta luppecoén belhaun gucia gur dadinçát :

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: Eta mihi guciac confessa deçan ecen Iaun dela Iesus Christ , Iainco Aitaren glorián .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Hunegatic , ene maiteác , bethiere obeditu vkan duçuen beçala , ez ene presentián beçala solament , baina orain vnguiz guehiago ene absentián , beldurrequin eta ikararequin emplega çaitezte çuen saluamenduan .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Ecen Iaincoa da eguiten duena çuetan eta nahi vkaitea eta eguitea , bere placer onaren araura .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Gauça guciac eguin itzaçue murmuratzeric eta questioneric gabe :

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: Çaretençát reprotchu baguetaco eta simple , Iaincoaren haour irreprehensible , natione bihurriaren eta gaichtoaren artean , ceinén artean argui eguiçue torchoéc beçala munduan , vicitzetaco hitza aitzinera ekarten dutenén ançora :

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: Gloria ahal nadinçát Christen egunean , ecen eztudala alfer laster eguin , ez alfer lan eguin :

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Eta baldin çuen fedearen sacrificio eta cerbitzu gainera sacrifica banadi - ere , aleguera naiz eta çuen gucion onaz aleguera naiz .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Çuec - ere halaber çareten aleguera , eta aleguera çaitezte ene onaz .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Eta sperança dut Iesus Iaunean , Timotheo sarri igorriren drauçuedala , nic - ere gogo on dudançát çuen eguitecoac eçaguturic .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Ecen eztut nehor hain gogo bardinetacoric , eguiaz çuen eguitecoéz arrangura duqueenic .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Ecen guciac bere gaucey iarreiquiten çaizté , ez Iesus Christeney .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Baina harçazco experientiá eçagutzen duçue , nola , semeac aitá cerbitzatzen duen beçala , enequin cerbizatzen ari içan den Euangelioan .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Hura bada sperança dut igorriren drauçuedala , neure eguitecoey dreçu eman drauqueedan sarrienaz .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Eta seguratzen naiz Iaunean , ecen neuror - ere sarri ethorriren naicela çuetara .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Baina necessario cela estimatu vkan dut çuetara igortera Epaphrodite anayea eta aiutaçalea eta guerlaco neure laguna , çuen Apostolu - ere dena , eta nic behar vkan dudanaren administraçalea .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Ecen harc çuec gucioc desiratzen centuzten , eta guciz desplacer çuen ceren eri içan cela aditu vkan baitzenduten .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Eta segur eri içan da hiltzeco statuan : baina Iaincoac misericordia eguin vkan drauca , eta ez hari solament baina niri - ere , tristitia tristitiaren gainera eznuençát .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Bada , hambat affectione handizago hura igorri vkan dut , hura ikussiric berriz aleguera çaiteztençát , eta nic hambat tristitia gutiago dudançát .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Recebi eçaçue bada hura gure Iaunean bozcario gucirequin : eta halaco diradenac estimatan eduquitzaçue .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Ecen Christen obragatic heriorano hurbildu içan da , bere vicia abandonnaturic , suppli leçançát çuen ene baitharaco cerbitzu peitua .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Gaineracoaz den becembatean , ene anayeác , aleguera çaitezte Iaunean : Gauça berén çuey scribatzera niri etzait herabe , eta çuen segurançá da .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Gogoa eyeçue orey , gogoa eyeçue obrero gaichtoey , gogoa emoçue concisioneari .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Ecen gu gara Circoncisionea , Iaincoa spirituz cerbitzatzen dugunoc , eta gloriatzen garenoc Iesus Christean eta haraguian confidançaric eztugunoc :

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Nic cerçaz haraguian - ere confidança dudan badut - ere . Baldin cembeit bercec vste badu confidançaric duela haraguian , nic guehiago .

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Bainaiz çortzi garreneco egunean circonciditua , bainaiz Israel arraçatic , Beniaminen leinutic , Hebraico Hebraicoetaric , religionez Phariseu :

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Zeloz den becembatean Eliçaren persecutaçale : Leguean den iustitiaz den becembatean , estacuru gabe .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Baina irabacitan nadutzan gauçác , caltetaco estimatu vkan ditut Christen amorecatic .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Bayeta segur gauça guciac calte diradela estimatzén dut Iesus Christ neure Iaunaren eçagutzearen excellentiagatic : ceinagatic gauça hauçaz gucioçaz neure buruä billuci vkan baitut , eta gorotz beçala eduquiten ditut , Christ irabaz deçadançát .

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: Eta eriden nadin hartan , ez neure iustitia Legueaz dena dudalaric , baina Christen fedeaz dena , cein baita , Iaincoaganic fedez den iustitiá :

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Eta eçagut deçadançát , hura , eta haren resurrectionearen verthutea , eta haren afflictionén participationea , haren herioaren conforme eguin içanic :

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Eya cerbait maneraz hel ahal naitenez hilen resurrectionera :

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Ez ia ardietsi dudalacotz , edo ia perfect naicelacotz : baina banarreió , eya are ardiets ahal deçaquedanez , eta causa hunegatic ardietsi içan naiz Iesus Christez .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Anayeác , niçaz den becembatean eztut neure buruäz estimatzen oraino ardietsi vkan dudala .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Baina gauçabat eguiten dut guibeletic diraden gauçác ahanzten ditudala , eta aitzinetic diraden gaucetara auançatzen naicela , chedeari narrayó , Iaincoaren garaitico vocationearen preçioari , Iesus Christ Iaunean .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Bada , perfect garen gucióc dugun sendimendu haour : eta baldin cerbait bercela senditzen baduçue , hura - ere Iaincoac reuelaturen drauçue .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Guciagatic - ere certara heldu içan baicara , hartan regla ber - batez ebil gaitecen , eta garen sendimendu ber - batetaco .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Anayeác , çareten gogo batez ene imitaçale , eta consideraitzaçue hala dabiltzanac , nola gu baiquaituçue exemplutan .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Ecen anhitz dirade dabiltzanac ceineçaz anhitzetan erran vkan baitrauçuet , eta orain - ere nigarrez nagoela erraiten , Christen crutzearen etsay diradela :

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Ceinén fina baita perditionea , ceinén Iaincoa , sabela , eta gloriá hayén confusionerequin , pensatzen dutelaric lurreco gaucetan .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Baina gure conuersationea ceruètan da : nondic Saluadorearen - ere beguira baicaude , cein baita Iesus Christ Iauna ,

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Ceinec transformaturen baitu gure gorputz ezdeusa , haren gorputz gloriosoaren conforme eguin dadinçát , gauça guciac - ere bere suiet eguin ahal ditzaqueen verthutearen araura .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Halacotz , ene anaye maiteác , eta desiratuác ene bozcarioa eta coroá , hunela egon çaitezte gure Iaunean , ene maiteác .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Euodiari othoiztez nagoca , eta Synticheri othoiztez nagoca diraden affectione ber - batetaco Iaunean .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Eta hiri - ere othoitz eguiten drauat , neure eguiazco laguná , aiuta ditzan emazte enequin batean bataillatu diradenac Euangelioan , eta Clementequin eta ene berce aiutaçalequin , ceinén icenac baitirade vicitzeco liburuän .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Aleguera çaitezte Iaunean bethiere : berriz diot , aleguera çaitezte .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Çuen modestiá eçagut bedi guiçon guciéz : Iauna hurbil da .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Eztuçuela deusez ansiaric : baina gauça orotan othoitzaz eta supplicationez esquer emaiterequin çuen requestác notifica bequizquió Iaincoari .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Eta Iaincoaren baque adimendu gucia iragaiten duenac beguiraturen ditu çuen bihotzac eta çuen adimenduac Iesus Christean .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Gaineracoaz , anayeác , gauça eguiazco diraden guciac gauça honest guciac , iustoac , purac , amoriotacoac , icen onetacoac , baldin edocein verthute bada eta edocein laudorio , gauça hautan pensa eçaçue :

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Cein ikassi - ere baitituçue , eta recebitu , eta ençun , eta ikussi - ere nitan . Gauça hauc bada eguin itzaçue , eta baquezco Iaincoa içanen da çuequin .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Alegueratu içan naiz Iaunean haguitz , ceren ia azquenecotz arrapherdatu çareten çuen niçazco ansián : hartan pensatzen - ere bacendutén , baina commoditateric etzindutén

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Eznaiz minço deusen peitu içanez : ecen nic ikassi dut erideiten naicenaren araura content içaten .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Eta badaquit behera içaten , badaquit abundant içaten - ere : leku gucietan eta gauça gucietan ikassi dut asse içaten eta gosse içaten , eta abundant içaten eta peitu içaten .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Gauça guciac ahal ditzaquet Christ fortificatzen nauenaz :

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Badaric - ere vngui eguin duçue ceren elkarrequin ene afflictionera communicatu vkan baituçue .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Eta çuec - ere badaquiçue , Philippianoác , ecen Euangelioaren predicatione hatsean , Macedoniaric partitu nincenean , eceinere Eliçac etzarautala deus communicatu har eta emanezco beharquian , çuec ceuroc baicen .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Ecen Thessalonican nincenean , behin eta berriz , behar nuena igorri vkan drautaçue .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Ez emaitzeren galdez nagoelacotz : baina galdeguiten dut fructua eçagut daquiçuen contura çuen abantailletan .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Bada recebitu vkan ditut gauça guciac , eta abundantia dut : complitu içan naicela , diot , Epaphroditeganic recebituric çueçaz igorriac , vrrin onetaco vssain anço , Iaincoaren gogaraco eta placentiataco sacrificio .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Ene Iaincoac - ere supplituren du behar vkanen duçuen gucia , bere abrastassunaren araura gloriarequin Iesus Christean .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Bada gure Iainco eta Aitari dela gloria secula seculacotz . Amen .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Salutaitzaçue saindu guciac Iesus Christean Salutatzen çaituztez enequin diraden anayéc .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Salutatzen çaituztéz saindu guciéc , eta principalqui Cesaren etchecoéc .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gratiá dela çuequin gucioquin . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: PAVL Iaincoaren vorondatez Iesus Christen Apostoluac eta Timotheo gure anayeac ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Colossen diraden saindu eta anaye fideley Christean : Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea gure Iainco Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Esquerrac emaiten drautzagu Iaincoari , cein baita , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Aita bethi çuengatic othoitz eguiten dugula ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: Ençunic çuen fede Iesus Christ baithangoa eta saindu gucietara duçuen charitatea :

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Ceruètan çuey beguiratzen çaiçuen sperançagatic , cein Euangelioaren eguiazco hitzaz lehen ençun vkan baituçue ,

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Cein heldu içan baita çuetara , mundu orotara - ere beçala , eta fructificatzen baitu , çuec baithan - ere beçala , Iaincoaren gratiá eguiazqui ençun eta eçagutu vkan duçuen egunaz gueroztic .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Nola ikassi - ere baituçue Epaphras gure lagun maite eta cerbitzari - quideaganic , cein baita Christen ministre fidel çuendaco :

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Ceinec declaratu - ere baitraucu çuen Spirituazco charitatea .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Halacotz gu - ere haur ençun vkan guenduen egunaz gueroztic , ezgara baratzen çuengatic othoitz eguitetic eta galdeguitetic betha çaitezten haren vorondatearen eçagutzeaz , sapientia eta adimendu spiritual gucirequin :

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Iaunari dagocan beçala ebil çaiteztençát , gauça gucietan haren gogaraco çaretençát , obra on orotan fructificatzen duçuela , eta aitzinaratzen çaretala Iaincoaren eçagutzean .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Indar orotan fortificaturic , haren gloriaren verthutearen arauez , suffrimendu eta spirituzco patientia orotara bozcariorequin :

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Esquerrac emaiten drautzaçuela Aitari , ceinec sufficient eguin baiquaitu sainduén heretagean participant içateco arguian :

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Ceinec deliuratu baiquaitu ilhumbearen botheretic eta eraman bere Seme maitearen resumara .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Ceinetan baitugu redemptionea haren odolaz , baita , bekatuén barkamendua .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Cein baita Iainco inuisiblearen imaginá , gauça creatu guciac baino lehen iayoa .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Ecen hartan creatu içan dirade ceruètan eta lurrean diraden gauça guciac , visibleac eta inuisibleac , nahiz - biz Thronoac , nahiz Dominationeac , nahiz Principaltassunac , nahiz Puissançác , gauça guciac , diot , harçaz eta harengatic , creatu içan dirade .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Eta bera gauça guciac baino lehen da , eta gauça guciac harçaz consistitzen dirade .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Eta hura da Eliça gorputzaren buruä , eta hatsea , eta hiletarico lehen iayoa : gauça gucietan lehen lekua eduqui deçançát .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Ecen Aitáren placer ona içan da complimendu gucia hartan habita ledin :

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Eta harçaz reconcilia litzan gauça guciac beregana , pacificaturic haren crutzeco odolaz hambat ceruän nola lurrean diraden gauçác .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Eta çuec noizpait harenganic vrrunduac eta etsay cinetelaric , pensamenduz obra gaichtotan :

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Badaric - ere orain reconciliatu çaituzte bere haraguiaren gorputzean , herioaz : çuec eguin cintzatençát saindu , eta atchaquio gabe eta irreprehensible bere aitzinean :

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Bay baldin egoiten baçarete fedean fundatuac eta fermu , eta erautzen ezpaçarete ençun vkan duçuen Euangelioco sperançatic , cein Euangelio ceruären azpico creatura ororen artean predicatu içan baita , ceinetaco ministre ni Paul eguin içan bainaiz :

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Orain alegueratzen naiz çuengatic suffritzen ditudan gaucéz , eta Christen afflictionén gaineracoac complitzen ditut neure haraguian , haren gorputzagatic , cein baita Eliçá .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Ceinetaco ministre eguin içan bainaiz , Iaincoaren dispensationez , cein eman içan baitzait çuec baithara , Iaincoaren hitzaren complitzeco :

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Cein baita , secula eta adin guciéz gueroztic estaliric egon içan den mysterioa , baina orain manifestatu içan çaye haren sainduey .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Ceiney Iaincoac eçagut eraci nahi vkan baitraue , ceric den mysterio hunetaco gloriaren abrastassuna Gentilén artean , cein baita Christ çuetan , gloriazco sperançá :

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Cein guc predicatzen baitugu , admonestatzen dugularic guiçon gucia , eta iracasten dugularic guiçon gucia sapientia orotan : guiçon gucia perfect eguin deçagunçát Iesus Christ Iaunean .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Hartacotzat trabaillatzen - ere naiz , combatitzen naicela haren operatione nitan botheretsuqui obratzen duenaren araura .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Ecen nahi dut daquiçuen cein batailla handia dudan çuengatic eta Laodiceacoacgatic , eta haraguian ene presentiá ikussi eztuten guciacgatic :

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Consola ditecençát hayén bihotzac , elkarrequin charitatez iunctaturic , eta adimendu guerthuqui seguratuaren abrastassun gucian , gure Iainco eta Aitaren eta Christen mysterioaren eçagutzetan .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Ceinetan sapientiazco eta scientiazco thesaur guciac gordeac baitirade .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Eta haur erraiten dut nehorc goga eraciteco hitzez engana etzaitzatençát .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Ecen gorputzez absent banaiz - ere , spirituz ordea çuequin naiz , alegueratzen naicelaric eta ikusten dudalaric çuen reguelá , eta Christ baithan duçuen fedearen fermutassuna .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Beraz Iesus Christ Iauna recebitu vkan duçuen beçala , hartan ebil çaitezte :

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Erro eguinac eta edificatuac çaretelaric hartan , eta fedean confirmatuac , iracatsi içan çareten beçala , abundos çaretelaric hartan remerciamendurequin

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Beguirauçue nehorc pilla etzaitzaten philosophiaz eta enganio vanoz , guiçonén ordenancén araura , munduco rudimenten araura , eta ez Christen araura :

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Ecen hartan habitatzen da diuinitatezco bethetassun gucia corporalqui .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Eta çarete hartan complituac , cein baita Principaltassun eta Bothere guciaren buruä .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Ceinetan circonciditu - ere içan baitzarete , escuric gabe eguiten den circoncisionez , haraguico bekatuén gorputzaz billuciric , Christen circoncisioneaz :

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Harequin ohortze içanic Baptismoaz , ceinez harequin batean resuscitatu - ere baitzarete , Iaincoaren fede botheretsuqui operatzen duenaz , ceinec hura hiletaric resuscitatu vkan baitu .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Eta çuec hilac cinetelaric bekatuetan eta çuen haraguiaren preputioan , harequin batean viuificatu vkan çaituzté , çuey bekatu guciac barkaturic ,

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Eta iraunguiric ordenancetan gure contra cen obligançá , cein baitzén gure contrario , baina harc kendu vkan du hura artetic , crutzeari eratchequiric :

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Eta billuciric Principaltassunac , eta Bothereac monstrançatan eraman vkan ditu publicoqui heçaz hartan triumphaturic .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Nehorc bada etzaitzatela condemna ianean , edo edanean , edo besta egunaren , edo ilhargui berriaren , edo Sabbathoén respectuz :

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Cein baitirade ethorteco ciraden gaucén itzal , baina gorputza Christena da .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Nehorc ezteçala çuen gainean seignoria bere placerera humilitatez , eta Aingueruèn cerbitzuz , ikussi eztituen gaucetara bere buruä auançatuz , bere haraguiaren adimenduz erhoqui hanturic :

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Eta eztatchecalaric buruäri , ceinetaric gorputz gucia iuncturaz eta lothuraz fornituric eta elkarrequin iunctaturic Iaincoaren hacitzez hatzen baita .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Bada baldin hil baçarete Christequin munduco rudimentez den becembatean , cergatic nehorc ordenançaz cargatzen çaituzte , munduan vici bacinete beçala ?

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: Hala nola , Ezteçála ian , Ezteçála dasta , Ezteçála hunqui .

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Guiçonen manamenduén eta doctrinén arauezco gauça hauc gucioc vsança berez galdu doaça .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Badaric - ere gauça hauc badute cerbait sapientia irudi bere vorondatezco deuotionean , eta spirituzco humilitatean , eta gorputza guppida eztuten becembatean : eztirade ordea eceinere preciotaco , ceren haraguia ressasiatzen duten gaucetara beha baitaude .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Bada baldin resuscitatu içan baçarete Christequin , garayan diraden gauçác bilhaitzaçue , non baita Christ Iaincoaren escuinean iarria .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Garaico gaucetan pensa eçaçue , ez lurraren gainecoetan .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Ecen hil içan çarete , eta çuen vicitzea gordea da Christequin Iaincoa baithan .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Baina Christ aguer dadinean cein baita gure vicia , orduan çuec - ere aguerturen çarete gloriatan .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Mortificaitzaçue bada çuen membro lurraren gainecoac , paillardiçá , cithalqueriá , appetitu desordenatua , guthicia gaichtoa , eta auaritiá , cein baita idolatria .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Gauça haucgatic ethorten da Iaincoaren hirá desobedientiazco haourrén gainera .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Ceinetan çuec - ere ebili içan baitzarete noizpait , hetan vici cinetenean .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Baina orain ken itzaçue çuec - ere hec guciac , hira , colera , malitia , gaitzerraitea , minçatze deshonesta çuen ahotic appart .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Gueçurric ezterraçuela batac bercearen contra , eraunciric guiçon çaharra bere eguitatequin ,

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Eta iaunciric berria , cein arramberritzen baita eçagutzez , hura creatu duenaren imaginaren araura .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Non ezpaita Grecquic ez Iuduric , Circoncisioneric ez Preputioric , Barbaroric ez Scytheric , sclaboric ez libreric : baina gucia eta gucietan Christ .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Vezti çaitezte bada Iaincoaren elegitu , saindu eta maite anço , misericordiazco halsarrez , benignitatez , humilitatez , emetassunez , spiritu patientez :

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Supportatzen duçuelaric batac bercea , eta barkatzen draucaçuelaric elkarri , baldin cembeitec berceren contra kereillaric badu : nola Christec - ere barkatu vkan baitrauçue , hala çuec - ere .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Eta hauen gución gainera vezti çaitezte charitatez , cein baita perfectionezco lotgarria .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Eta Iaincoaren baqueac regna beça çuen bihotzetan , ceinetara deithuac - ere baitzarete gorputz batetan , eta çareten gratioso .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Christen hitza habita bedi çuetan largoqui sapientia gucirequin : iracasten eta admonestatzen duçuela elkar psalmuz , laudorioz , eta cantu spiritualez remerciamendurequin , cantatzen draucaçuela çuen bihotzean Iaunari .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Eta cerere eguin baiteçaçue hitzez edo obraz , Iesus Iaunaren icenean eguiçue , esquerrac emaiten drautzaçuela gure Iainco eta Aitari harçaz .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Emazteác , çareten suiet çuen senharretara , bide den beçala gure Iaunean .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Senharrác , on erizteçue çuen emaztey , eta etzaiteztela samint hayén contra .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Haourrác , obeditzaçue aitác eta amác gauça gucietan : ecen haur Iaunari placent çayó .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Aitác , eztitzaçuela tharrita çuen haourrac : gogoa gal ezteçatençát .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Cerbitzariác , obeditzaçue gauça gucietan çuen nabussi carnalac , ez beguiaren araura cerbitzatzen dituçuela , guiçonén gogara eguin nahi bacindute beçala , baina bihotzeco simplicitaterequin , Iaunaren beldur çaretelaric .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Eta cerere baitaguiçue , gogotic eguiçue Iaunari anço eta ez guiçoney anço .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Daquiçuelaric ecen Iaunaganic recebituren duçuela heretageco alocairuä , ecen Christ Iauna cerbitzatzen duçue .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Baina iniustoqui eguiten duenac , recebituren du iniustoqui eguin duqueena : eta ezta personén acceptioneric .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Nabussiác eguieçue çucena eta eguimbidea cerbitzariey , daquiçuelaric ecen çuec - ere baduçuela Iaun - bat ceruètan .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Orationetan perseuera eçaçue , hartan veillatzen duçuelaric remerciamendurequin .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Othoitz eguiten duçuelaric elkarrequin guregatic - ere hitzaren borthá Iaincoac irequi dieçagunçát , Christen mysterioaren denuntiatzeco , ceinagatic presoner - ere bainaiz .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Hura manifesta deçadançát , minçatu behar dudan beçala .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Çuhurqui ebil çaitezte campocoetara , demborá recrubatzen duçuelaric .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Çuen hitza bethiere biz gatzez confitua gratiarequin , batbederari nola ihardetsi behar draucaçuen daquiçuençát .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Ene equiteco guciac notificaturen drauzquiçue Tychique gure anaye maiteac , eta ministre fidelac , eta gure Iaunean ene cerbitzari quideac :

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Cein igorri vkan baitut çuetara berariaz , eçagut ditzançát çuen eguitecoac , eta consola ditzançát çuen bihotzac ,

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Onesimo gure anaye fidelarequin eta maitearequin cein baita çuenetaric , hec alde hunetaco eguiteco guciéz auertituren çaituztéz .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Salutatzen çaituztéz Aristarque ene presoner quideac , eta Marc Barnabasen lehen gussuac ( ceinez manamendu recebitu baituçue , baldin çuetara ethor badadi , recebi deçaçuen )

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Eta Iesus Iusto deitzen denac , cein baitirade circoncisionetic , hauc solament ditut aiutaçale Iaincoaren resumán , eta ene solageamendutaco içan dirade .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Salutatzen çaituzte Epaphras çuenac , Christen cerbitzariac , bethiere bataillatzen delaric çuengatic othoitzetan , çaudetençát perfecto eta complitu Iaincoaren vorondate gucian :

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Ecen haur harçaz testificatzen dut , ecen zelo handia duela çuengatic eta Laodicean , eta Hyerapolen diradenacgatic .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Salutatzen çaituztez Luc medicu maiteac , eta Demasec .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Salutaitzaçue Laodicean diraden anayeac , eta Nympha , eta haren etchean den Eliçá .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Eta epistola haur çuec baithan iracurri datenean , eguiçue Laodiceacoén Eliçan - ere iracur dadin : eta Laodiceatic scribatua , çuec - ere iracur deçaçuen .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Eta erroçue Archipperi , Gogoa eçac gure Iaunean recebitu vkan duàn administrationea compli deçánçat .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Salutationea , ene Paulen escuz . Çareten orhoit ene estecaduréz . Gratia dela çuequin . Amen .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: PAVLEC eta Siluanoc eta Timotheoc Thessaloniceanoén Eliça , Iainco Aitán eta Iesus Christ gure Iaunean denari , Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea gure Iainco Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Esquerrac emaiten drautzagu Iaincoari bethiere çueçaz gucióz , memorio çueçaz eguiten dugula gure othoitzetan :

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Paussu gabe orhoitzen garelaric çuen fedearen verthuteaz , eta çuen charitatearen trabailluaz , eta çuen sperançaren patientiáz Iesus Christ gure Iaunean , gure Iainco eta Aitaren aitzinean :

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Daquigularic , anaye maiteác , çuec Iaincoaz elegituac çaretela :

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Ecen gure Euangelioa consistitu içan da çuec baithan ez hitzean solament , baina verthutean - ere , eta Spiritu sainduan , eta segurança handitan , daquiçuen beçala nolaco içan garen çuen artean çuengatic .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
