text2: Çuec - ere gure imitaçale eguin içan çarete eta Iaunaren , recebituric hitza anhitz tribulationerequin , Spiritu sainduaren bozcariorequin :

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Hala non Macedonian eta Achaian sinhesten duten gucién exemplu içan baitzarete .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Ecen çuetaric soinu eguin vkan du Iaincoaren hitzac , ez solament Macedonian eta Achaian , baina leku orotan - ere çuen fede Iaincoa baithangoa diuulgatu içan da , hala non ezpaitugu mengoa deus erran deçagun :

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Ecen beréc guçaz contatzen duté cer sartzea vkan dugun çuetara , eta nola conuertitu içan çareten Iaincoagana idoletaric , cerbitza cineçatençát Iainco vicia eta eguiazcoa :

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: Eta haren Seme Iesusen beguira cinaudetençát ceruètaric , cein resuscitatu vkan baitu hiletaric , cein baita , gu ethorteco den hiratic deliuratzen gaituena .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Ecen ceuroc badaquiçue , anayeác , gure çuec baitharaco sartzea nola eztén vano içan :

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Baina are , daquiçuen beçala , lehenetic affligitu eta iniuriatu içan baguinen - ere Philippesen , hardieça hartu vkan dugu gure Iaincoan , çuey Iaincoaren Euangelioaren predicatzera combat handirequin .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Ecen gure exhortationea ezta abusionez , ez vileniaz , ez enganiorequin içan :

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Baina nola Iaincoaz approbatu içan baicara Euangelioaren predicationea eman lequigun , hala minçatzen gara , ez guiçonén gogara eguin nahi baguendu beçala , baina Iaincoaren , ceinec gure bihotzac approbatzen baititu .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Ecen behinere lausenguzco hitzez eztugu vsatu vkan , daquiçuen beçala : ezeta auaritiataco occasionez : Iaincoa da testimonio .

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Eta guiçonetaric eztugu gloriaric bilhatu vkan , ezeta çuetaric , ez bercetaric , grauitate eduqui ahal guenduqueelaric , Christen Apostolu beçala .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Baina içan gara eme çuen artean , vnhide batec bere haourrac delicatuqui hatzen balitu beçala .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Hunela çuetara affectionatuac guinelaric , desir guenduen çuey partitzera ez solament Iaincoaren Euangelioa , baina gure arima propriac - ere , ceren guçaz onhetsiac baitzineten .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Ecen orhoit çarete , anayeác , gure trabailluaz eta nequeaz : ecen gau eta egun languiten ari guinela , çuetaric nehoren phorogu ezguinençát , predicatu vkan dugu çuec baithan Iaincoaren Euangelioa .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Çuec testimonio çarete eta Iaincoa , nola sainduqui eta iustoqui , eta reprotchu gabe çuen , sinhetsi duçuenón artean conuersatu vkan dugun .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Daquiçuen beçala , nola çuetaric batbedera , aitác bere haourrac beçala , auertitzen guenduen .

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: Eta consolatzen eta requeritzen , ebil cindeizten bere resumara eta gloriara deitzen çaituzten Iaincoari dagocan beçala .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Halacotz guc - ere esquerrac emaiten drauzquiogu Iaincoari paussuric gabe , ceren Iaincoaren hitzaren predicationea gureganic recebitu vkan duçuenean , recebitu vkan baituçue , ez guiçonén hitz beçala , baina ( nola eguiazqui baita ) Iaincoaren hitz beçala , ceinec obratzen - ere baitu çuetan sinhesten duçuenotan .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Ecen çuec , anayeác , imitaçale eguin içan çarete Iaincoaren Eliça Iudean diradenén Iesus Christean , nola gauça berac suffritu vkan baitituçue çuec - ere çuen natione berecoetaric , hec - ere Iuduetaric beçala :

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: Ceinéc Iesus Iauna - ere hil vkan baituté , eta berén Propheta propriac , gu - ere persecutatu vkan gaituzté , eta eztirade Iaincoaren gogaraco , eta guiçon gucién contrario dirade :

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Gu empatchatzen gaituztelaric Gentiley minçatzetic salua ditecençat , bethi compli ditzatençát bere bekatuac : ecen hetara heldu içan da hirá finerano .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Eta gu , anayeác , çuetaric separaturic dembora appurbatetacotz ikustez , ez bihotzez , hambat cineçago emplegatu içan gara çuen beguithartearen ikustera , desir handirequin .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Halacotz ethorri nahi içan gara çuetara ( ni Paul behinçát ) behin eta berriz , baina empatchatu vkan gaitu Satanec .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Ecen ceric da gure sperançá , edo bozcarioa , edo gloriagarrico coroa ? ala ez cuec - ere Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren aitzinean haren aduenimenduan ?

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Segur çuec çarete gure gloriá eta bozcarioa .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Halacotz guehiagoric ecin pairatuz , on irudi içan çaicu gueuroc Athenesen gueldi guentecen .

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: Eta igorri vkan dugu Timotheo gure anaye eta Iaincoaren ministrea eta Christen Euangelioan gure aiutaçalea , çuen confirmatzera eta exhortatzera çuen fedearen gainean :

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: Nehor trubla eztadinçát afflictione hautan : ecen ceuroc badaquiçue hartaco ordenatuac garela .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Ecen çuec baithan guinenean aitzinetic erraiten guendrauçuen ecen afflictione iragan behar vkanen guenduela , heldu - ere içan den beçala , eta badaquiçue .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Halacotz nic - ere guehiagoric ecin pairatuz , hura igorri vkan dut çuen fedea eçagut neçançát , tentaçaleac nolazpeit tentatu centuquezten beldurrez , eta ezdeustu ezlicén gure trabaillua .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Eta heuraguiric eztuela ethorri cenean Timotheo çuetaric guregana , eta declaratu cerauzquigunean çuen fedea eta charitatea , eta nola duçuen guçaz memorio ona bethiere , desiratzen gaituçuelaric ikustera , guc - ere çuec beçala :

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Halacotz içan gara consolatu , anayeác , çuetan , gure afflictione eta tribulatione orotan , çuen fedeaz .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Ecen orain gara vici , baldin çuec fermu baçaudete Iaunean .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Ecen cer remerciamendu Iaincoari renda ahal deçaqueogu çueçaz , gure Iaincoaren aitzinean çuen causaz alegueratzen garen alegrança guciagatic ?

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Gau eta egun abundantquiago othoitz eguiten dugula ikus deçagunçát çuen beguithartea , eta compli deçagunçát çuen fedean peitu dena .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Bada , gure Iainco eta Aitac , eta Iesus Christ gure Iaunac chuchent deçala gure çuetaratco bidea .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Eta çuec Iaunac multiplica eta abunda eraci çaitzatela elkarganaco eta gucietaraco charitatean , gu - ere çuetara beçala :

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Confirma ditzançát çuen bihotzac reprotchu gabe saindutassunean gure Iainco eta Aitaren aitzinean , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren bere saindu guciequilaco aduenimenduco .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Gaineracoaz bada anayeác , othoizten çaituztegu , eta requeritzen Iesus Iaunaz , gureganic recebitu vkan duçuen beçala , nola ebili behar çareten eta Iaincoaren gogaraco içan , guerotic guerora auançago çaitezten .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ecen badaquiçue cer manamenduac eman drauzquiçuegun Iesus Iaunaren partez .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Ecen haur da Iaincoaren vorondatea , çuen sanctificationea , paillardiçataric beguira çaitezten :

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Eta iaquin deçan çuetaric batbederac bere vnciaren posseditzen sanctificationerequin eta ohorerequin :

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: Ez guthiciataco affectionerequin , Gentil Iaincoa eçagutzen eztutenen ançora .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Nehorc ezteçala aurizqui edo engana bere anayea eceinere eguitecotan : ecen Iauna gauça hauen gucién mendecaçale da , nola lehen - ere erran eta testificatu baitrauçuegu .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Ecen ezgaitu deithu vkan Iaincoac cithalqueriatara , baina sanctificationetara .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Bada gauça hauc arbuyatzen dituenac , eztu guiçon - bat arbuyatzen , baina Iaincoa , ceinec bere Spiritu saindua gutan eçarri - ere vkan baitu .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Anayetassunezco charitateaz den becembatean , eztuçue mengoaric scriba dieçaçuedan ecen ceuroc Iaincoaz iracatsiac çarete , elkar onhets deçaçuen .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Ecen eguiten - ere baduçue haur Maeedonia gucian diraden anaye orotará : baina othoizten çaituztegu , anayeác , guerotic guerora auançago çaitezten ,

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Eta pena eçar deçaçuen baquez içatera , eta çuen eguiteco proprién eguitera , eta çuen escu propriéz languitera , manatu çaituztegun beçala :

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: Campotic diradenetara honestqui perporta çaiteztençát , eta deusen beharric eztuçuençát .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Eta eztut nahi çuec ignorant çareten , anayeác , lo daunçanéz den becembatean , contrista etzaiteztençát , berce goitico sperançaric eztutenac - ere beçala .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Ecen baldin sinhesten badugu Iesus hil eta resuscitatu dela , halaber Iesus Iaunean lo daunçanac - ere Iaincoac erekarriren ditu harequin .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Ecen haur erraiten drauçuegu Iaunaren hitzez ecen gu viciric goitico garatenoc Iaunaren aduenimenduan ezgaitzaiztela aitzinduren lo daunçateney .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Ecen Iauna bera exhortationezco oihurequin , eta Archangelu vozequin , eta Iaincoaren trompettarequin iautsiren da cerutic : eta Christean hilac resuscitaturen dirade lehenic :

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Guero gu viciric goitico garatenoc , harrapaturen garate hequin batean hodeyetan Iaunaren aitzinera airetan : eta halaz bethi Iaunarequin içanen gara .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Bada , consola eçaçue elkar hitz hauçaz .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Demboréz eta momentéz den becembatean , anayeác , ezta mengoaric scriba dieçaçuedan .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Ecen ceuroc badaquiçue vngui ecen Iaunaren eguna ethorriren dela , ohoina gauaz beçala .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Ecen erran deçatenean , Baque eta segurança : orduan gainera ethorriren çaye vstegaberico destructionea , içorra denari mina beçala , eta eztirade itzuriren .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Baina çuec , anayeác , etzarete ilhumbean , non egun harc , ohoinac eguiten duen beçala , ardiets çaitzaten .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Çuec gucioc arguiaren haour çarete , eta egunaren haour : ezgara gauaren edo ilhumbearen haour .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Ezgaunçala bada lo berceac beçala , baina gauden iratzarri eta garén sobre .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Ecen lo daunçanac , gauaz lo daunça : eta horditzen diradenac , gauaz dirade hordi .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Baina gu egunaren garenoc , garén sobre , fedezco eta charitatezco halacretaz veztituac , eta casquet orde , saluamendutaco sperançáz .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ecen ezgaitu ordenatu Iaincoac hiracotzát , baina saluamenduaren vkaitecotzát Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz ,

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Cein guregatic hil içan baita : bagaude iratzarriric , ala bagaunça lo , harequin batean vici garén .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Harren , exhorta eçaçue elkar , eta edifica eçaçue batac bercea , eguiten - ere duçuen beçala .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Halaber othoizten çaituztegu , anayeác , eçagut ditzaçuen çuen artean trabaillatzen diradenac , eta çuen gaineco diradenac gure Iaunean , eta çuen admonestaçaleac :

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Eta amorio handitan eduqui ditzaçuen , eguiten dutén obragatic . Auçue baque elkarren artean .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Halaber othoitz eguiten drauçuegu , anayeác , admonesta ditzaçuen vicitze desordenatutacoac , consola ditzaçuen gogo chipitacoac , sustenga ditzaçuen flaccuac , çareten spirituz patient gucietara .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Beguirauçue nehorc eztieçón gaitza gaitzagatic nehori renda : baina vnguiari bethi çarreitzate , bata berceagana eta gucietara .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Bethiere çareten aleguera .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Paussu gabe othoitz eguiçue .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Gauça gucietan esquerrac emainzquiçue : ecen haur da Iaincoaren çuetaraco vorondatea Iesus Christez .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Spiritua ezteçaçuela iraungui :

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Prophetiác eztiçaçuela menosprecia .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Gauça guciac experimentaitzaçue : on denari çatchetzate :

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Gaizquiaren irudi orotaric beguira çaitezte .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Bada Iainco baquezcoac ossoqui sanctifica çaitzatela : eta çuen spiritu gucia eta arima eta gorputza hoguen gabe , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren aduenimenduco beguira ditecela .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Fidel da çuec deithu çaituztena , eguinen - ere badu .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Anayeác , othoitz eguiçue guregatic .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Salutaitzaçue anaye guciac pot saindurequin .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Requeritzen çaituztet Iaunaren partez iracur daquién epistola haur anaye saindu guciey .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gratia dela çuequin . Amen .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: PAVLEC eta Siluanoc eta Timotheoc gure Iainco Aitan eta Iesus Christ gure Iaunean Thessaloniceanoen den Eliçari :

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea gure Iainco Aitaganic eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Esquerrac eman behar drauzquiogu Iaincoari bethiere çuengatic , anayeác , raçoina den beçala , ceren haguitz handitzen den çuen fedea eta ceren abundatzen den çuen guciotaric batbederaren elkarganaco charitatea :

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Hala non gueuror çuengatic gloriatzen baicara Iaincoaren Elicetan , çuen persecutione eta iragaiten dituçuen afflictione gucietaco patientiáz eta fedeaz :

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Cein baitirade Iaincoaren iugemendu iustoaren seignale , Iaincoaren resumaren digne eguin çaiteztençát , ceinagatic suffritzen - ere baituçue :

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Ecen gauça iustoa da Iaincoa baithan , çuec affligitzen çaituzteney , afflictione renda diecén

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: Eta çuey affligitzen çaretenoy solageamendu gurequin , aguer dadinean Iesus Iauna cerutic bere puissanciaco Aingueruèquin ,

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Suzco garrequin , mendecatzen delaric Iaincoa eçagutzen eztutenéz , eta Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren Euangelioari behatzen etzaizquionéz :

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Cein punituren baitirade punitione eternalez , condemnaturic Iaunaren presentiáz eta haren botherearen gloriáz :

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: Dathorrenean glorificatu dençát bere sainduetan , eta miragarri eguin dadinçat sinhesten duten gucietan ( ceren gure çuec baitharaco testimoniagea sinhetsi içan baita ) egun hartan :

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Causa hunegatic - ere othoitz eguiten dugu bethiere çuengatic , çuec vocationearen digne gure Iaincoac eguin çaitzatençat , eta compli deçan bere ontassunaren placer on gucia , eta fedearen obrá botheretsuqui :

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Glorifica dadinçát Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren icena çuetan , eta çuec hartan , gure Iaincoaren eta Iesus Christ Iaunaren gratiaren araura .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Othoitz eguiten drauçuegu bada , anayeác , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren aduenimenduaz eta gure harenganaco biltzarreaz .

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: Etzaitezten bertan adimenduz erauz , eta etzaitezten trubla ez spirituz , ez hitzez , ez epistolaz , guçaz scribatua baliz beçala , Christen eguna bertan baliz beçala .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Nehorc etzaitzatela seduci eceinere maneraz : ecen egun hura ezta ethorriren non reuoltamendua lehen ethor eztadin , eta manifesta eztadin bekatutaco guiçona , perditionezco semea ,

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Cein opposatzen eta alchatzen baita Iainco erraiten eta adoratzen den guciren contra : hala non hura iainco beçala , Iaincoaren templean iarten baita , bere buruä eracusten duela ecen iainco dela .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Ala etzarete orhoit ecen oraino çuequin nincela , gauça hauc erraiten nerauzquiçuela ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Eta orain cerc daducan badaquiçue , hura manifesta dadinçat bere demborán .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Ecen ia eguiten da iniquitatezco mysterioa : solament orain daducanac , eduquiren du ken daiteno artetic .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Eta orduan manifestaturen da gaichtoa , cein Iaunac deseguinen baitu bere ahoco Spirituaz , eta bere aduenimenduco claretateaz abolituren .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Hura diot ceinen ethortea baita Satanen operationearen araura , puissança gucirequin eta signorequin eta gueçurrezco miraculurequin :

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: Eta iniquitatezco abusione gucirequin galtzen diradenetan , ceren eguiaren amorioa ezpaitute recebitu vkán saluatu içateco .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Eta halacotz igorriren draue Iaincoac abusionezco operationea , gueçurra sinhets deçatençát :

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: Condemna ditecençat eguia sinhetsi vkan eztuten guciac , baina iniquitatean placer hartu vkan dutenac .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Baina guc , Iaunaz onhetsi anayeac , behar drauzquiogu bethi esquerrac eman Iaincoari çueçaz , ceren hatseandanic elegitu baitzaituzte Iaincoac saluamendutara Spirituaren sanctificationez , eta eguiazco fedeaz :

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ceinetara deithu vkan baitzaituzte gure Euangelioaz Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gloriaren acquisitionetacotz .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Halacotz , anayeác , çaudete fermu eta educaçue ikassi duçuen doctriná , bada gure hitzez bada epistolaz .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Bada Iesus Christ gure Iaun berac , eta gure Iainco eta Aita onhetsi gaituenac , eta eman consolatione eternala eta sperança ona gratiaz ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: Consola ditzala çuen bihotzac , eta confirma çaitzatela hitz eta obra on orotan .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Gaineracoaz , anayeác , othoitz eguiçue guregatic , Iaunaren hitzac laster daguiançat , eta glorifica dadin çuec baithan - ere beçala :

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Eta gu deliura gaitecen gende desordenatu eta gaichto hautaric : ecen fedea ezta gucién .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Baina fidel da Iauna , ceinec confirmaturen baitzaituzte eta beguiraturen gaichtoaganic .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Asseguratzen - ere bagara Iaunean çueçaz , ecen denuntiatzen drauzquiçuegun gauçác eguiten - ere badituçuela eta eguinen .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Bada Iaunac chuchent ditzala çuen bihotzac Iaincoaren amoriora , eta Christen beguira egoitera .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Anayeác , denuntiatzen drauçuegu halaber Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren icenean , separa çaitezten anaye desordenatuqui eta ez gureganic recebitu duen doctrinaren araura ebilten den orotaric .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Ecen ceuroc badaquiçue nola imitatu behar gaituçuen : ecen ezgara desordenatuqui maneyatu içan çuen artean .

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: Eta eztugu nehoren oguia dohainic ian : baina trabaillurequin eta nequerequin gau eta egun languiten ari guinadela , çuetaric nehoren phorogu ez guinadençát .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Ez bothere eztugunez , baina gure buruén çuey exemplutan emaiteagatic , imita gaitzaçuençat .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Ecen çuequin guinadenean - ere haour denuntiatzen guendrauçuen , ecen baldin cembeit trabaillatu nahi ezpada , ian - ere ezteçan .

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Ecen ençuten dugu çuen artean badiradela batzu desordenatuqui dabiltzanic , deus ari eztiradelaric , baina curiosqui vici diradelaric .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Bada halaco diradeney denuntiatzen drauegu , eta othoitz eguiten Iesus Christ gure Iaunaz sossegurequin trabaillatzen ari diradela bere oguia ian deçaten .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Eta çuec , anayeác , etzaiteztela enoya vngui eguitez .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Eta baldin cembeitec gure hitza obeditzen ezpadu , epistolaz hura nota eçaçue : eta ezteçaçuela conuersa harequin , ahalque duençát :

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Guciagatic - ere etsay beçala ezteçaçuela eduqui , baina admonesta eçaçue anaye anço .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Bada Iaun baquezcoac bethiere diçuela baquea manera gucian . Iauna dela çuequin gucioquin .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Salutationea , ene Paulen escuz , baita seignale ene epistola gucietan : hunela scribatzen dut .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gratia dela çuequin .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: PAVLEC , Iainco gure Saluadorearen eta gure sperança Iesus Christ Iaunaren manamenduz Iesus Christen Apostolu denac ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Timotheo neure eguiazco semeari fedean , Gratia dela hirequin , misericordia eta baquea Iainco gure Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ gure Iaunaganic .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Othoitz eguin drauadan beçala Ephesen egon andin , Macedoniarát ioaiten nincenean , eguin eçac , denuntia dieceançat batzuey ezteçaten bercelaco doctrinaric iracats .

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: Eta eztitecen behá elhe çarretara eta genealogia fin gabetara , ceinéc lehen , questioneac engendratzen baitituzte ecen ez Iaincoaren edificatione fedeaz dena .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Bada manamenduaren fina duc charitate bihotz chahutic eta conscientia onetic dena eta fictione gaberico fedetic .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Gauça hautaric batzu erauciric conuertitu içan dituc elhe vanotara :

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Legueco doctor içan nahi diradelaric eta aditzen eztituztelaric erraiten eta asseguratzen dituzten gauçác .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Eta baceaquiagu ecen ona dela Leguea , baldin nehorc harçaz bidezqui vsatzen badu .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Daquigularic ecen Leguea eztela iustoagatic iarri , baina gaichtoacgatic eta desobedientacgatic : Iaincoaren menospreciaçaleacgatic eta vicitze gaichtotacoacgatic , religioneric eztaducatenacgatic eta profanoacgatic , aita - amén hiltzaleacgatic eta guicerhaileacgatic :

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: Paillartacgatic , bugreacgatic , guiça ebatsleacgatic , gueçurtiacgatic , desperiuruacgatic , eta baldin deus berceric doctrina sanoaren contratacoric bada .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Cein doctrina baita Iainco benedicatuaren Euangelio gloriazco niri cargutan eman içan çaitadanaren araura .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Eta esquer emaiten diarocat ni fortificatu nauenari , cein baita , Iesus Christ gure Iauna : ceinec fidel estimatu vkan bainau , bere cerbitzuan eçarriric :

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Ni , lehen bainincén blasphemaçale eta persecutaçale eta iniuriaçale : baina misericordia eguin içan ciaitadac : ecen ignorantiaz eguin vkan diat , fedea eznuelaric .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Baina garaithu içan duc gure Iaunaren gratia federequin eta dilectionerequin cein baita Iesus Christean .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Haur duc hitz segura , eta recebi deçagun guciz dignea , ecen Iesus Christ ethorri içan dela mundura bekatorén saluatzera , ceinetarico lehena bainaiz ni .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Baina hunegatic misericordia eguin içan ciaitadac , nitan lehenic eracuts leçançát Iesus Christec clementia gucia , exemplu nincençát hura baithan vicitze eternaleracotzat sinhetsiren çutenén .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Bada Regue eternalari , immortalari , inuisibleari , Iainco çuhur berari dela ohore eta gloria secula seculacotz . Amen .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Manamendu haur gommendatzen drauat , Timotheo ene semé , aitzinetic hiçaz içan diraden prophetién araura , heçaz bataillatze onez batailla adinçát :

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: Dualaric fede eta conscientia ona : hura batzuc iraitziric , fedeaz galtze eguin vkan dié .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Ceinetaric baitirade Hymeneo eta Alexander : hec Satani eman dirautzat , ikas deçatencát guehiagoric ez blasphematzen .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Exhortatzen aut bada gauça gucién aitzinetic eguin ditecen requestác , othoitzeac , supplicationeac , eta remerciamenduac guiçon guciacgatic :

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: Regueacgatic , eta dignitatetan diraden guciacgatic , vicitze baquezcoa eta emea eraman deçagunçát pietate eta honestate gucirequin .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Ecen haur gauça ona eta atseguinetacoa duc Iainco gure Saluadorearen aitzinean ,

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Ceinec nahi baitu gende guciac salua ditecen , eta eguiaren eçagutzera ethor ditecen .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Ecen Iaincobat duc eta arartecobat Iaincoaren eta guiçonén artean , Iesus Christ guiçon eguinic :

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: Ceinec bere burua eman vkan baitu rançoinetan guciacgatic : testimoniage içateco bere demborán :

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Ceinen publicaçale eta Apostolu ni ordenatu içan bainaiz ( eguia cioat Christean etzioat gueçurric ) Gentilén Doctor federequin eta eguiarequin .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Nahi diat bada guiçonéc othoitz daguiten leku orotan escuac chahuric altchatzen dituztelaric hira eta questione gaberic .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Halaber emazteac - ere abillamendu honestez ahalquerequin eta modestiarequin acotra ditecen , ez bilo içurtzez , edo vrrhez edo perlaz , edo abillamendu soberanciatacoz :

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: Baina ( emazte Iaincoaren cerbitzatzez professione eguiten duteney dagoten beçala ) obra onez .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Emazteac silentiorequin ikas beça suiectione gucirequin .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Ecen emazteari iracastea , eztiarocat permetitzen , ezeta guiçonaren gainean authoritatez vsatzea , baina den silentiotan .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Ecen Adam lehenic formatu içan duc , guero Eua .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Eta Adam eztuc seducitu içan , baina emaztea reducitu içanic , transgressionearen causa içan duc .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Baina saluatua içanen duc haour engendratzez , baldin egon badadi fedean , eta dilectionean , eta sanctificationean modestiarequin .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Hitz segura duc haur , Baldin nehorc , Ipizpicu içatera desiratzen badu , obra excellentbat desiratzen dic :

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Baina behar dic Ipizpicuac içan irreprehensible , emazte bakoitz baten senhar , vigilant , sobre , modest , estrangerén ostatuz gogotic recebiçale , iracasteco carazco :

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: Ez mahatsarnoari emana , ez vkaldicari , ez irabaizte deshonestaren guthicioso , baina benigno , ez reuoltari , ez auaritioso :

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: Bere familia honestqui gobernatzen duelaric , bere haourrac suiectionetan eduquiten dituelaric honestate gucirequin :

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: ( Ecen baldin edoceinec bere etchearen gobernatzen ezpadaqui , nolatan Iaincoaren Eliçari gogoa emanen drauca ? )

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Ez apprendiz berri , vrguluz hanturic deabruaren condemnationera eror eztadinçát .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Behar dic are harc duen testimoniage ona campocoetaric - ere : reprotchutara eta deabruen laçora eror eztadinçát .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Diacréc halaber behar die içan honest , ez bi hitzetaco , ez mahatsarno anhitzari emanac , ez irabaizte deshonestaren guthicioso :

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Eduquiten dutelaric fedearen mysterioa conscientia chahurequin .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Eta hec - ere phoroga ditecen lehen , guero cerbitza deçaten , baldin reprotchu gabetaco badirade .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Halaber hayén emazteac diraden honest , ez gaitzerraile , baina sobre , leyal gauça gucietan .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Diacreac diraden emazte bederaren senhar , gobernatzen dituztelaric honestqui bere haourrac eta bere etcheac .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ecen vngui cerbitzatu duqueitenéc grado ona acquisitzen dié beretzat , eta libertate handia Iesus Christ baithango fedean .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Gauça hauc scribatzen drauzquiat , sperança dudalaric ecen sarri hiregana ethorriren naicela :

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: Eta baldin berancen badut , daquiançát nola behar den Iaincoaren etchean conuersatu , cein baita Iainco viciaren Eliçá , eguiaren habea eta sustenguä .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Eta duda gabe , handi duc pietatearen mysterioa : ecen Iaincoa manifestatu içan dela haraguian , iustificatu dela Spirituan , ikussi içan dela Aingueruèz , predicatu içan çayela Gentiley , sinhetsi içan dela munduan , goiti recebitu içan dela gloriara .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Bada Spirituac claroqui erraiten dic ecen azqueneco demboretan reuoltaturen diradela batzu fedetic spiritu abusariey behatzen çaiztela , eta deabruén doctriney ,

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Hypocrisiaz gueçurrac iracasten dituztenén doctriney , ceinén conscientiá cauterizatua baita ,

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Defendatzen dutelaric ezconcea eta viandetaric iatea , cein Iaincoac creatu baitrauzte vsatzeco remerciamendurequin fideley , eta eguiá eçagutu vkan duteney .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren creatura gucia duc on , eta deus ez iraizteco , baldin remerciamendurequin recebitzen bada .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Ecen creaturá sanctificatu dihoac Iaincoaren hitzaz eta orationez .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Gauça hauc baldin proposa badietzéc anayey Iesus Christen ministre on aiçate , haci içanic fedearen , eta diligentqui iarreiqui atzayón doctrina onaren hitzetan .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Baina iraizquic fable profanoac eta atsoenac irudiac : eta exerci eçac eure buruä pietatean .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Ecen exercitatione corporala probetchu gutitaco duc : baina pietatea gauça gucietara probetchutaco duc , presenteco vicitzearen eta ethortecoaren promessa duelaric .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Hitz segura duc haur , eta guciz recebi dadin dignea .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Ecen halacotz trabaillatzen - ere gaituc , eta escarniatzen , ceren sperança baitugu Iainco vician , cein baita guiçon gucién Saluadore , eta principalqui fidelén .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Gauça hauc denuntiaitzac eta iracats .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Nehorc hire gaztetassuna ezteçala menosprecia : baina aicen fidelén exemplu hitzean , conuersationean , charitatean , spirituan , fedean , puritatean .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Ethor nadin artean , aquió iracurtzeari , exhortatzeari , doctrinari .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Ezteçála menosprecia hitan den dohaina , cein eman içan baitzaic prophetiaz , Ancianoén compainiaren escuén impositionearequin .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Gauça hauc praticaitzac , eta aicén gauça hautan attento : hire auançamendua agueri dençat gucién artean .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Gogoa emoc eure buruäri eta doctrinari : perseuera eçac gauça hautan : ecen baldin haur badaguic , eure buruä duc saluaturen eta hiri behatzen çaizquianac .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Guiçon ancianoa ezteçala dorpequi reprehendi , baina ezhorta eçac aita beçala : gazteac , anayeac beçala :

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: Emazte çaharrac , amác beçala : gazteac , arrebác beçala castitate gucirequin .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Emazte alhargunac ohoraitzac , eguiazqui alhargun diradenac .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Baina baldin cembeit emazte alhargunec haourric , edo ilobassoric badu , ikas beçate lehenic berén etche proprira pietateren eracusten , eta burhassoetara ordainaren rendatzen : ecen haour duc on eta placent Iaincoaren aitzinean .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Bada eguiazqui alhargun denac eta bera azquendu içan denac sperança dic Iaincoa baithan , eta perseueratzen dic othoitzetan eta orationetan gau eta egun .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Baina deliciosqui vici dena , viciric hila duc .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Gauça hauc bada denuntiaitzac , irreprehensible diradençát .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Eta baldin edoceinec beréz eta principalqui etchecoéz artharic ezpadu , fedeaz vkatu dic , eta duc infidela baino gaichtoago .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Emazte alharguna hauta bedi ez hiruroguey vrthe baino gutiagotacoa , senhar baten emazte içana :

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Obra onetan testimoniage duena : eya haourrac haci dituenez , eya estrangerac alogeatu dituenez , eya sainduén oinac ikuci dituenez , eya affligituac aiutatu dituenez , eya obra on orori ardura iarreiqui içan çayonez .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Baina alhargun gazteagoac refusaitzac : ecen bridá largatu dutenean Christen contra , ezcondu nahi dituc :

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: Bere condemnationea dutelaric , ceren bere lehen fedea iraitzi vkan baituté .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Eta guehiago , alfer egoile - ere diradelaric ikasten dié etchez etche ebilten : eta eztituc solament alfer egoile , baina edasle - ere , eta curioso , behar eztiraden gaucéz dadassatelaric .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Nahi diat bada gazteac ezcon ditecen , haour daguiten , etchea goberna deçaten , occasioneric batre etsayari eztemoten gaizqui erraiteco .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Ecen ia baztu itzuli içan dituc Satanen ondoan .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Baldin edocein fidelec edo cembeit fidelsac baditu emazte alhargunac , aiuta bitza hec , eta eztadin carga Eliçá , eguiazqui alhargun diradenén asco dençát .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Vngui presiditzen duten Ancianoac ohore doblaren digne estima bitez : principalqui hitzean eta doctrinán trabaillatzen diradenac .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Ecen Scripturác erraiten dic , Idi bihitzen ari denari eztraucac ahoa lothuren . Eta , Languilea bere sariaren digne da .

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Ancianoaren contra accusationeric ezteçála recebi biga edo hirur testimonioren azpian baicen .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Bekatu eguiten dutenac , gucién aitzinean reprehenditzac , berceac - ere baldur diradençát .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Requeritzen aut Iaincoaren eta Iesus Christ Iaunaren eta Aingueru elegituén aitzinean , gauça hauc beguira ditzán , bata berceari preferitu gabe : deus eguiten eztuala alde batera makurtuz .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Escuac eztietzoala nehori bertan eçar , eta ezteçála communica berceren bekatuetan , eure buruä pur beguireçac .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Hemendic harát ezteçála vric edan , baina mahatsarno gutibatez vsat eçac , eure estomacagatic , eta eure eritassun vssuacgatic .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Guiçon batzuén bekatuac aitzinean agueri dituc , eta aitzinean dihoaçac condemnationetan : eta batzuey ondoan - ere iarreiquiten ciaiztec .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Halaber obra onac - ere aitzinean agueri dituc : eta bercelaco diraden obrác , ecin estal daitezquec .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Vztarriren azpian diraden cerbitzari guciéc , bere nabussiac ohore ororen digne estima bitzate : Iaincoaren icena eta doctriná blasphema eztitecençát .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Eta nabussi fidelac dituztenéc , eztitzatela menosprecia ceren anaye diraden : baina aitzitic cerbitza bitzate , ceren fidelac eta onhetsiac diraden , ontassunean participant diradelaric . Gauça hauc iracats itzac eta exhorta .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Baldin nehorc berce doctrinaric iracasten badu , eta consentitzen ezpadu Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren hitz sanoetan , eta pietatearen arauèzco doctrinán ,

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: Hura hantua duc , deus eztaquialaric , baina erhotzen delaric questionén eta hitzezco contentionén ondoan , hetaric sortzen dituc inuidiá , gudua , iniuriác , suspicione gaichtoac ,

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: Guiçon adimenduz corrumpituén eta eguiatic priuatu diradenén disputatione vanoac , estimatzen dutelaric pietatea irabazte dela : retiradi halacoetaric .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Segur , irabazte handia duc pietatea contentamendurequin .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Ecen deus eztiagu ekarri mundura : segura duc eraman - ere deus ecin deçaquegula .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Baina vitançá dugularic eta cerçaz estal ahal gaitecen , heçaz content içanen gaituc .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Ecen abrastu nahi diradenac , erorten dituc tentationetara eta laçora , eta anhitz desir erhotara eta caltetacotara , ceinéc hundatzen baitituzte guiçonac destructionetara eta perditionetara .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Ecen gaitz gucién erroa auaritiá duc , cein desiratzen dutelaric batzu erauci içan baitirade fedetic , eta bere buruäc anhitz doloretan nahaspilatu vkan baitituzté .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Baina hic , Iaincoaren guiçoná , gauça hæy ihes eguiéc , eta iarreiqui aquié iustitiari , pietateari , fedeari , charitateari , patientiari , emetassunari .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Fedearen combat ona combati eçac , lot aquio vicitze eternalari , ceinetera deithu - ere baitaiz , eta confessione ona anhitz testimonioren aitzinean eguin vkan duc .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Denuntiatzen drauat gauça guciac viuificatzen dituen Iaincoaren , eta Iesus Christen aitzinean , ceinec testificatu vkan baitu Pontio Pilateren azpian confessione ona :

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Manamendu haur beguira deçán macula eta reprotchu gabe , Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren aduenimendurano :

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Cein eracutsiren baitu bere demborán Prince benedicatuac eta bakoitzac , reguén Regueac eta iaunén Iaunac :

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Ceinec berac baitu immortalitate , nehor hurbil ecin daiten arguian habitatzen delaric , cein ezpaitu guiçonec batec - ere ikussi , ez ecin ikus baiteçaque : ceini ohore eta indar seculacotz . Amen .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Mundu hunetan abrats diradeney denuntia iecéc , eztiraden arrogant , eta ezteçaten bere sperançá eçar fermutate gabeco abrastassunetan , baina Iainco vician , ceinec emaiten baitrauzquigu abundosqui gauça guciac , vsatzeco :

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Vngui eguin deçaten , obra onez abrats diraden , emaile on eta compuntquide onetaco diraden .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Thesaurizatzen dutelaric beretaco fundament on - bat ethorquiçunera , ardiets deçatençat vicitze eternala .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: O Timotheo , deposita beguireçac , ihes eguiten drauealaric oihu vanoéy eta profanoey , eta falsuqui hala deitzen den scientiaco contradictioney :

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Cein scientiaz professione eguiten çutelaric batzu fedetic erauci içan baitirade . Gratia dela hirequin . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: PAVLEC Iesus Christen Apostolu Iaincoaren vorondatez denac , Iesus Christ baithan den vicitzearen promessaren araura ,

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Timotheo neure seme maiteari : gratia , misericordia eta baquea Iainco Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ gure Iaunaganic .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Esquer diarocat Iaincoari , cein cerbitzatzen baitut neure aitzinecoacdanic conscientia purequin , nola paussu gabe baitut memorio hiçaz neure orationetan gau eta egun :

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Hire ikusteco desir dudalaric , hire nigar chortez orhoitic , bozcarioz bethe nadinçát :

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Orhoitzen naicela hitan den fictione gabeco fedeaz , cein lehenic habitatu içan baita hire amasso Loida baithan , eta hire ama Eunica baithan : eta segur nauc ecen hi baithan - ere habitatzen dela .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Causa hunegatic auisatzen aut vitz deçán ene escuén impositionez hitan den Iaincoaren dohaina .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Ecen eztiraucuc eman Iaincoac iciapenetaco spiritubat , baina verthutetaco , eta dilectionetaco , eta adimendu sanotaco spiritubat .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Ezaicela bada ahalque gure Iaunaren testimoniageaz , ezeta niçaz , bainaiz haren presonér : baina aicén participant Euangelioco afflictionetan , Iaincoaren puissançaren araura :

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Ceinec saluatu vkan baiquaitu , eta bere vocatione sainduaz deithu : ez gure obrén causaz , baina bere ordenançaren eta dembora eternalac baino lehen Iesus Christ baithan eman içan çaicun gratiaren causaz .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: Eta manifestatu içan duc orain Iesus Christ gure Saluadorearen ethorteaz , ceinec herioa - ere deseguin vkan baitu , eta arguira eman vicitzea eta immortalitatea Euangelioaz :

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Ceinen publicaçale ni ordenatu içan bainaiz , eta Apostolu eta Gentilén doctor .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Halacotz gauça hauc - ere suffritzen citiat : guciagatic - ere eznauc ahalque : ecen baceaquiat nor sinhetsi dudan : eta segur nauc ecen hura botheretsu dela ene depositaren beguiratzeco egun hartarano .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Educac eneganic ençun vkan dituan hitz sanoén eguiazco formá , federequin eta Iesus Christ baithan den charitaterequin .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Deposit ona beguireçac Spiritu sainduaz , cein habitatzen baita gutan .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Badaquic haur , ecen aldaratu içan diradela eneganic Asian diraden guciac : ceinetaric baitirade Phygello eta Hermogenes .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Iaunac misericordia daguiola Onesiphoren etcheari : ecen anhitzetan recreatu vkan nic , eta ene cadenáz eztuc ahalquetu içan :

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: Aitzitic Roman içan denean guciz affectionatuqui bilhatu vkan niauc eta eriden :

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Demola hari othoi Iaunac eriden deçan misericordia Iauna baithan egun hartan : eta cembat anhitz cerbitzu Ephesen - ere eguin drautan , hic guciz vngui daquic .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Hi bada , ene semé , fortificadi Iesus Christ baithan den gratián :

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Eta anhitz testimonioren artean eneganic ençun dituan gauçác , iracats ietzec gende fideley , cein bercen - ere iracasteco sufficient içanen baitirade .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Hic bada trabaillu suffri eçac Iesus Christen gendarmés on anço .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: Eztuc nehor guerlán empatchatzen vicitzeco eguitecoéz , guerla eguiteco hautatu duenaren gogaraco dençát .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Halaber baldin nehorc combatic eguiten badu , eztuc coroatzen baldin bidezqui combatitu ezpada .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Laborariac trabaillatu behar dic fructuric recebi deçan baino lehen .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Consideraitzac erraiten ditudan gauçác : Iaunac bada eman dieçála adimendu gauça gucietan .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Aicén orhoit Iesus Christ resuscitatu içan dela hiletaric , Dauid - en hacitic celaric , ene Euangelioaren araura :

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Ceinetan , gaizquiguile anço , affligitzen bainaiz estecailluetarano : baina Iaunaren hitza eztuc estecatua .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Halacotz gauça guciac suffritzen citiát elegituacgatic , hec - ere obteni deçatençát Iesus Christ Iaunean den saluamendua , gloria eternalarequin .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Hitz segura duc haur : Ecen baldin harequin hil içan bagara , harequin vicico - ere garela .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Baldin suffritzen badugu , regnaturen - ere harequin diagu : baldin vkatzen badugu , harc - ere gu vkaturen guiaitic :

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Baldin desleyal bagara , hura ordea fidel diagoc , vka bere buruä ecin ceçaquec .

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Arramberritzac gauça hauc , protestatzen dualaric Iaunaren aitzinean ezteçan nehorc hitzez iharduqui , baita probetchuric batre ekarten eztuen gauça , aitzitic ençuleac erautzen dituena .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Diligentadi eure buruären Iaincoari approbatu presentatzera , confusione gabeco obrero , artezqui eguiaren hitza ebaquiten duála .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Oihu vanoac eta profanoac reprimitzac : ceren impietate handiagotara auançaturen baitirade .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Eta hayén hitza gangrená beçala alhaco duc , ceinetaric baitirade Hymeneo eta Phileto :

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Cein eguiatic erauci içan baitirade , erraiten dutela ia resurrectionea eguin içan dela , eta erautzen dié edocein batzuén fedea .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Alabaina Iaincoaren fundamenta fermu diagoc , cigulu haur duelaric , Eçagutzen ditu Iaunac cein diraden harenac : eta , Retira bedi iniustitiataric Christen icena inuocatzen duen gucia .

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Eta etche handi batetan eztuc solament vrrhezco eta cilharrezco vnciric , baina çurezcoric eta lurrezcoric - ere : eta batzu ohoretacotz , eta berceac desohoretacotz .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Bada nehorc baldin bere buruä hautaric chahu badeça , içanen duc vnci ohoretacotz sanctificatua , eta Iaunaren vsegetacotz carazcoa , eta Iaunaren obra on orotara appaindua .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Gaztetassunaren guthiciey - ere ihes eguiéc , eta iarreiqui aquió iustitiari , fedeari , charitateari , baqueari bihotz purez Iauna inuocatzen dutenequin .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Eta questione erhoac , eta instructione gabetacoac iraizquic , daquialaric ecen hec gudu engendratzen dutela .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Bada Iaunaren cerbitzariac eztic reuoltari içan behar , baina eme gucietara , iracasteco carazco , patientqui gaichtoac supportatzen dituelaric :

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: Emetassunequin iracasten dituelaric opinione contrariotaco diradenac : eya noizpait Iaincoac vrriquimendu eman dieçaqueenez eguiaren eçagutzeco ,

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: Eta emenda ditecen , haren vorondatearen eguiteco , itzuriric deabruaren laçotic , ceinez hatzamanac baitaude .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Haur bada iaquic , ecen azquen egunetan içanen dela dembora perilosic .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Ecen içanen dituc guiçonac bere buruentár , auaritioso , vantari , vrgulutsu , disfamaçale , aita - ametara desobedient , ingrat , Iaincoaren menospreciaçale ,

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: Affectione natural gabe , leyaltate gabe , calumniaçale , moderamendu gabe , crudel , on diradenén gaitzetsle ,

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: Traidore , temerario , hantuac , Iaincoari baino voluptatey hobe erizle .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Pietatearen irudia dutelaric , baina haren verthutea vkatzen dutelaric : apparta adi bada hetaric .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Ecen hautaric dituc etchetara forratzen diradenac , eta gathibu dadutzatenac emazteto bekatuz cargatuac , guthicia diuersez erabiliac ,

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Bethiere ikasten dutelaric , eta behinere eguiaren eçagutzera hel ecin daitezquelaric .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Eta hala nola Iannesec eta Iambresec resistitu baitraucate Moysesi : halaber hauc - ere eguiari resistitzen diraucoé : guiçon adimenduz corrumpituac , fedeaz den becembatean reproboac .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Baina eztié guehiagoric auançaturen : ecen hauén erhogoá claro içanen duc gucietara , hayena - ere içan den beçala .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Baina hic complituqui eçagutu vkan duc ene doctriná , gobernua , intentionea , fedea , emetassuna , charitatea , patientiá :

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: Persecutioneac , afflictioneac , cein niri heldu içan baitzaizquit Antiochian , Iconian , Lystrian : nolaco persecutioneac suffritu vkan ditudan cioat , eta gucietaric idoqui vkan niauc Iaunac .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Eta Iaincoaren beldurrean Iesus Christean vici nahi diraden guciec - ere persecutione suffrituren dié .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Baina guiçon gaichtoac eta abusariac auançaturen ditut gaizquiagora seducitzen dutelaric eta seducituac diradelaric .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Bada hi egon adi ikassi dituán eta eman içan çaizquián gaucetan , daquialaric norenganic ikassi vkan dituán :

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Eta nola haourra - danic letra sainduac eçagutu vkan dituán , ceinéc çuhur ahal baiheçaquete saluamendutacotz Iesus Christ baithan den fedeaz .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Scriptura gucia duc diuinoqui inspiratua , eta probetchable doctrinatzeco , redarguitzeco , corregitzeco eta instruitzeco iustitiatan :

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: Compli dadinçát Iaincoaren guiçona , obra on orotara complituqui instruituric .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Requeritzen aut bada nic Iaincoaren eta Iesus Christ Iaunaren aitzinean , ceinec bere aduenimenduan eta resumán viciac eta hilac iugeaturen baititu :

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: Predica eçac hitza , perseuera eçac orduz eta orduz lekora : ari adi redarguitzen , mehatchatzen , exhortatzen , emetassun eta doctrina gucirequin :

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Ecen içanen duc demborabat ezpaitute doctrina sanoa suffrituren : baina beharri quillicorrac dituztelaric , beréc bere desirén arauezco iracastunac bilduren baitituzté :

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Eta eguiatic beharriac itzuliren baitituzté , eta fabletara emanac içanen baitirade .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Baina hic veilla eçac gauça gucietan , suffritzac afflictioneac , eguin eçac euangelistaren obra , eguic hire administrationea approbatua den .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Ecen ni ia sacrificatu içatera nihoac , eta ene partitzeco demborá hulbil duc .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Combat ona combatitu diát , neure cursua acabatu diát , fedea beguiratu diát .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Gaineracoaz , beguiratua diagotac iustitiazco coroá , cein rendaturen baitraut Iaunac egun hartan , iuge iusto harc : eta ez niri solament , baina haren aduenimendua desiratu vkan duqueiten guciey - ere bay .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Diligentadi enegana ethortera sarri .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
