text2: Ecen Demasec abandonnatu niauc , presenteco secula haur onhetsiric , eta Thessalonicerat ioan içan duc : Crescens Galatiarát , Tite Dalmatiarát .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Luc bera duc enequin . Marc harturic erekarrac eurequin : ecen probetchable diat cerbitzucotz .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Tychique - ere igorri diat Ephesera .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Troasen Carpo baithan vtzi vkan dudan manteliná , ethor adinean ekarrac eurequin , eta liburuäc , baina principalqui pergamioac .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Alexandre cobre - arotzac anhitz gaitz eguin dirautac : Iaunac bere eguinén arauez renda dieçola .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Harenganic hi - ere beguiradi : ecen haguitz gure hitzey resistitu vkan dirauec .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Nehor etziaitadac assistitu , neure lehen defensán , aitzitic guciéc abandonnatu vkan niaué : imputa eztaquiela .

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Baina Iauna assistitu içan ciaitadac , eta fortificatu vkan niauc , niçaz predicationea compli dadinçát , eta hura ençun deçatençát Gentil guciéc : eta deliuratu içan nauc lehoinaren ahotic .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Eta deliuraturen niauc Iaunac obra gaichto gucitaric eta emparaturen bere resuma celestialeco : hari dela gloria secula seculacotz . Amen .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Salutaitzac Prisca eta Aquila , eta Onesiphororen familiá .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Erasto guelditu içan duc Corinthen : eta Trophimo Mileten vtzi diat eria .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Diligentadi negu aitzinean ethortera . Salutatzen auté Eubuloc eta Pudensec eta Linoc eta Claudiac eta anaye guciéc .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Iesus Christ Iauna dela hire spirituarequin . Haren gratia dela çuequin . Amen .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: PAVLEC Iaincoaren cerbitzari eta Iesus Christen Apostolu denac , Iaincoaren elegituén fedearen eta pietatearen tenorez den eguiaren araura ,

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: Vicitze eternalaren sperançacotzát , cein promettatu vkan baitu Iainco gueçurti eztenac dembora eternalén altzinetic , eta manifestatu bere demboretan :

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Diot bere hitza , Iainco gure Saluadorearen ordenançaren tenorez niri cargutan eman içan çaitadan predicationeaz : Tite neure seme eguiazcoari gure artean commun den fedearen arauez .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Gratia dela hirequin misericordia eta baquea Iainco Aitaganic , eta Iesus Christ Iaun gure Saluadoreaganic .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Causa hunegatic vtzi vkan aut Cretan goitico diraden gaucén corrigitzen continua deçançát , eta ordena ditzán hiriz hiri Ancianoac , nic ordenatu drauadan beçala :

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Baldin cembeit bada irreprehensibleric emazte bakoitz baten senhar , haour fidelac dituelaric , ez dissolutionez accusatuac , edo rangea ecin daitezquenac .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Ecen Ipizpicuac behar dic içan irreprehensible , Iaincoaren etchearen gobernari anço , eztén porfidioso , ez coleric , ez mahatsarnoari emana , ez vkaldicari , ez irabazte deshonestaren guthicioso :

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Baina estrangerén ostatuz gogotic recebiçale , onén onhetsle , çuhur , iusto , saindu , moderatu :

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Instructionearen araura den hitz fidelaren eduquile , doctrina sanoz exhorta - ere ahal deçançát , eta contrastatzen diradenac vençut .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Ecen baduc anhitz rangea ecin daitenic eta vanoqui minçaçaleric , eta adimenduén seduciçaleric , principalqui Circoncisionetic diradenac : hæy ahoa boçatu behar ciayec :

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Hec etcheac ossoqui erautzen citié , behar eztiraden gauçác iracasten dituztela irabazte deshonestaren causaz .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Erran dic hayén arteco cembeitec , hayén propheta propriac , Cretatarrac bethi gueçurti , bestia gaitzac , sabel naguiac .

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Testimoniage haur eguiazcoa duc : causa hunegatic reprehenditzac hec viciqui , fedean sano diradençát :

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: Behatzen eztutelaric Iuduén fabletara , eta eguiatic aldaratzen diraden guiçonén manuetara .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Gauça guciac chahuendaco chahu dituc baina satsuendaco eta infidelendaco eztuc deus , chahuric , aitzitic dituc satsu hayén adimendua eta conscientiá .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Professione eguiten dié Iaincoa eçagutzen dutela , baina obraz vkatzen dié , abominable diradelaric eta desobedient eta obra on orotara reprobatuac .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Baina hic denuntiaitzac doctrina sainduari dagozcan gauçác .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Guiçon çaharrac sobre diraden , graue , moderatu , sano fedean , charitatean eta patientián .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Emazte çaharrac halaber diraden saindutassunari dagocan continentiataco , ez gaitzerraile , ez mahatsarno anhitzari emanac , gauça honestén iracatsle :

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: Emazte gazteac instrui ditzatençát moderatu içaten , bere senharrén onhetsten , bere haourrén maite vkaiten :

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: Çuhur içaten , chahu , etchean egoile , on , bere senharrén suiet : Iaincoaren hitza blasphema eztadinçát .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Guiçon gazteac halaber exhortaitzac moderatu diraden .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Gauça gucietan eracusten dualaric eure buruä obra onen exemplu , doctrinán eracusten dualaric integritate , grauitate ,

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Hitza sano , eta condemna ecin daiten beçalaco : contrastatzen dena confundi dadinçát , çueçaz gaizquiric cer erran ez vkanez .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Cerbitzariac bere nabussién suiet diraden , gauça gucietan hayén gogara eguiten dutelaric , contradiçale eztiradelaric :

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: Deus appartatzen eztutelaric , baina leyaltate on gucia eracusten dutelaric , gauça gucietan Iainco gure Saluadorearen doctriná orna deçatençát .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Ecen aguertu içan ciayec guiçon guciey Iaincoaren gratia saluagarria .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Iracasten gaituela , infidelitateaz eta munduco desiréz renuntiaturic , sobrequi , iustoqui , eta religiosqui vici garén presenteco secula hunetan :

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: Dohain onetaco sperançaren eta gure Iainco handi eta Saluadore Iesus Christen gloriataco aduenimendu excellentaren beguira gaudelaric :

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Ceinec eman baitu bere buruä guregatic , gu redemi guençançat iniquitate gucitaric , eta purifica guençançát bere populu particular , obra onetara affectionatu içateco .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Gauça hauc denuntiaitzac , eta ari adi exhortatzen eta reprehenditzen authoritate gucirequin : nehorc ezeçala hi menosprecia .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Admonestaitzac Principaltassunén eta Potestatén suiet diraden , Gobernadoreac obedi ditzaten , obra on orotara prest diraden :

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Nehorçaz gaizquiric ezterraten , diraden gudu gabe , moderatu , emetassun gucia eracusten dutelaric guiçon gucietara .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Ecen gu - ere noizpait adimendu gabe guentuán , desobediént , abusatuac , anhitz moldetaco desirac eta voluptateac cerbitzatzen guentuela , malitiatan eta inuidiatan vici guinela , gaitzetsiac guinela : eta elkarri gaitz erizle .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Baina Iainco gure Saluadorearen benignitatea eta guiçonetaraco amorioa aguertu içan denean ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: Ez eguin vkan ditugun obra iustoéz , baina bere misericordiaz saluatu vkan guiaitic regenerationezco garbitzez , eta Spiritu sainduazco arramberritzez :

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Cein eraitsi vkan baitu gutara abundosqui Iesus Christ gure Saluadoreaz :

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: Haren gratiaz iustificaturic heredero eguin guentecençát vicitze eternaleraco sperançaren araura .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Hitz segura duc haur , eta gauça hauc nahi diat affirma ditzán , artha dutençát obra onén entretenitzera Iaincoa sinhetsi dutenéc : huná , guiçonen on eta probetchutaco diraden gauçác .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Baina questione erhoac eta genealogiac eta contentioneac eta Legueazco iharduquiteac empatchaitzac : ecen probetchu gabetaco dituc eta vano .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Guiçon hereticoa behingo eta berrizco aduertimenduaren ondoan iraitzac :

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: Daquialaric ecen eraucia dela halacoa eta huts eguiten duela , bere buru beraz condemnatua delaric .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Igor deçadanean Artemas hiregana edo Tychique , diligenta albeitendi enegana ethortera Nicapolisera : ecen han neguären iragaitera deliberatu diát .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Zeno Legueco doctora eta Apollo diligentqui guidaitzac , deusen faltaric eztutén .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Bada ikas beçate gurec - ere obre onetan emplegatzen necessario diraden gaucetaco , fructu gabe eztiradençát .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Salutatzen auté enequin diraden guciéc . Salutaitzac fedez on darizcutenac . Iaincoaren gratia dela çuequin gucioquin , Amen .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: PAVLEC Iesus Christen presonerac , eta anaye Timotheoc , Philemon gure maiteari eta lagunari ,

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: Eta Aphia maiteari , eta Archippe gure soldado - quideari , eta hire etheco Eliçari :

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Gratia dela çuequin eta baquea gure Iainco Aitaganic eta Iesus Christ Iaunaganic .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Esquerrac emaiten dirautzat neure Iaincoari , bethiere hiçaz memorio eguiten dudalaric neure orationetan ,

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: Ceren baitançut hire charitatea , eta fedea cein baituc Iesus Iauna baithara , eta saindu guciac baithara :

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Hire fedearen communicationea botheretsu dençát , eçagut dadinçát çuetan den on gucia Iesus Christez .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Ecen bozcario handi diagu eta consolatione hire charitateaz , ceren sainduén halsarrac hiçaz recreatu icen baitirade , anayé .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Halacotz , Iesus Christean libertate handi badut - ere hiri eguimbide duanaren manatzeco :

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: Badere charitateagatic lehen othoitzez niagoc , hunelaco banaiz - ere , bainaiz Paul ancianoa , eta orain presoner - ere Iesus Christgatic .

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Othoitzen aut bada neure seme Onesimo estecailluetan engendratu vkan dudanagatic :

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Berce orduz ez hire probetchutaco içan denagatic , baina orain hire eta ene probetchutaco denagatic : cein igorten baitrauát .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Hic bada hori , erran nahi baita , ene halsarrac , recebi eçac .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Cein nic nahi bainuen neurequin eduqui , hire orde cerbitza nençançát Euangelioaren estecailluetan :

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Baina hire vorondatea gabe eztiát deus eguin nahi vkan bortchaz beçala ezlicençát hire vnguia , baina gogo onezco .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Ecen aguian halacotz hireganic partitu içan duc appurbatetacotz , bethierecotz recebi eçançát :

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: Ez engoitic sclabotan , baina sclabo baino conditione hobeagotan , anaye maitetan , principalqui ene : cembatez bada guehiago eure , eta haraguiaren arauez eta Iaunaren arauez ?

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Bada baldin lagunetan banaducac , recebi eçac ni beçala .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Eta baldin cerbait bidegabe eguin badrauc , edo çor bahau , hura niri imputa ieçadac .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Nic Paulec scribatu diát haur neure escuz , nic pagaturen diát : eztarradan ecen are eure burua - ere niri çor drautadala .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Bay , anayé , placer haur nic hireganic recebi deçadan Iaunean , recreaitzac ene halsarrac Iaunean .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Hire obedientiáz segur içanez scribatu drauat , daquidalaric ecen erraiten dudan baino guehiago - ere eguinen duála .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Baina are bertaric ostatu appain ieçadac : ecen sperança diát çuen orationéz emanen natzaiçuela :

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Epaphras ene presoner quideac Iesus Christean ,

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Marc - ec , Aristarchec , Demasec eta Luc - ec , ene aiutariec , salutatzen auté .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Iesus Christ gure Iaunaren gratiá dela çuen spirituarequin . Amen .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: ANHITZETAN eta anhitz maneraz lehenago Iaincoa minçaturic gure Aitey Prophetéz , azqueneco egun hautan minçatu içan çaicu guri bere Semeaz ,

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Cein eçarri vkan baitu gauça gucién heredero , ceinez mundua - ere eguin vkan baitu :

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Cein , gloriaren claretate eta haren personaren imagina propria delaric eta sustengatzen dituelaric gauça guciac bere hitz botheretsuaz , gure bekatuén purgationea bere buruaz eguinic , iarri içan baita haren maiestatearen escuinean leku goretan .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Cembatenaz Aingueruäc baino excellentago eguin içan baita , hambatenaz hec baino icen excellentagobat acquisitu vkan du hetaric abantail .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Ecen egundano Aigueruètaric ceini erran vkan drauca , Ene Semea aiz hi , nic egun engendratu aut hi ? Eta berriz , Ni içanen natzayo hari Aita , eta hura içanen çait niri Seme ?

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Eta berriz bere Seme lehen iayoa mundura aitzinaratzen duenean , dio Eta adora beçate hura Iaincoaren Aingueru guciéc .

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Eta Aingueruéz den becembatean dio , ceinec bere Aingueruäc eguiten baititu haice , eta bere ministreac , su flamma :

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Baina Semeaz den becembatean dio O Iaincoa , hire thronoa secula seculacotz duc : eta hire Resumaco sceptrea duc , çucenezco sceptrea .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: On eritzi draucac iustitiari , eta gaitz eritzi draucac iniquitateari : halacotz vnctatu vkan au Iaincoac , eure Iaincoac bozcariotaco olioz , eure lagunetaric abantail .

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Eta , Hic hatseandanic , Iauna , lurra fundatu vkan duc , eta ceruäc hire escuen obrác dituc :

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Hec deseguinen dituc , bailla hi permanent aiz : eta guciac veztidura beçala çaharturen dituc :

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: Eta estalqui baten ançora hic dituc hec biribilgaturén , eta muthatzeco diaudec : baina hi hura bera aiz , eta hire vrtheac eztituc faltaturen .

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Eta Aingueruètaric ceini erran vkan drauca egundano , Iar adi ene escuinean , eçar ditzaquedano hire etsayac hire oinén scabella ?

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Eztirade guciac spiritu cerbitzu eguiten dutenac , cerbitzuco igorten diradelaric saluamenduco heredero içanen diradenacgatic .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Halacotz behar dugu hobequi gogoa eman ençun vkan ditugun gaucetara , iragaitera vtzi eztitzagunçát .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Ecen baldin Aingueruéz erran içan cen hitza fermu içan bada , eta transgressione eta desobedientia guciac recompensa bidezcoa recebitu vkan badu ,

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Nolatan gu itzuriren guiaizquio baldin hain saluamendu handiaz conturic ezpadaguigu ? cein lehenic Iaunaz beraz declaratzen hassiric , hura ençun vkan çutenéz confirmatu ican baitzaicu :

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Testimoniage rendatzen cerauelaric Iaincoac signoz eta miraculuz , eta verthute diuersez , eta Spiritu sainduaren distributionez bere vorondatearen araura ,

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Ecen eztu Aingueruén suiet eguin ethorteco den mundua , ceinez minço baicara :

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Eta testificatu vkan du nombeit cembeitec , dioela , Cer da guiçoná , harçaz orhoit aicen ? edo cer da guiçonaren semea , hura visita deçán ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Eguin vkan duc hura chipichiago Aingueruäc baino : gloriaz eta ohorez coroatu vkan duc hura , eta ordenatu vkan duc hura eure escuezco obrén gaineco .

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: Gauça guciac suiet eguin vkan dituc haren oinén azpico . Eta gauça guciac haren suiet eguin dituenaz gueroz , eztu deus vtzi haren suiet eztén : baina eztacussagu oraino gauça guciác haren suiet diradela .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Baina Aingueruäc baino chipichiago eguin içan cena , ikusten dugu cein baita Iesus , bere herioco passioneagatic , gloriaz eta ohorez coroatu içan dela : Iaincoaren gratiaz guciacgatic herioa dasta leçançát .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Ecen conuenable cen harc , ceinegatic baitirade gauça hauc gucioc , eta ceinez baitirade gauça hauc gucioc , anhitz haour gloriara eramaiten çuenaz gueroz , hayén saluamenduaren Princea afflictionez consecra leçan .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Ecen bay sanctificaçalea , bay sanctificatzen diradenac , batganic dirade guciac , causa hunegatic ezta ahalque hayén anaye deitzera ,

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Dioela , Denuntiaturen diraueat hire icena neure anayey , eta Eliçaren erdian laudaturen aut hi .

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Eta berriz , Ni fida içanen naiz hartan . Eta berriz , Huná ni eta Iaincoac niri eman drauzquidan haourrac .

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Ceren bada haourrac participant baitirade haraguian eta odolean , hura - ere halaber participant eguin içan da hetan beretan , herioaz deseguin leçançát herioaren iaurgoá çuena , cein baita deabrua :

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: Eta deliura litzançát herioaren beldurrez , bere vici gucian sclabo içatera suiet ciraden guciac .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Ecen segur eztitu Aingueruäc hartu vkan , baina Abrahamen hacia hartu vkan du .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Halacotz behar cen gauça gucietan anayeac irudi licén , misericordioso licençát eta Sacrificadore subirano fidel Iaincoa baitharatco gaucetan , populuaren bekatuén pagamenduaren eguiteco .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Ecen suffritu vkan duenaren gainean tentatu içanic tentatzen diradenén - ere aiutatzeco botheretsu da .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Bada , anaye sainduác , vocatione celestialen participant çaretenác , considera eçaçue gure confessioneco Apostolua eta Sacrificadore subiranoa , cein baita , Iesus Christ ,

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Ordenatu vkan duenarençat fidel dena : Moyses - ere haren etche gucian beçala .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Ecen hambatez haur Moyses baino gloria handiagoren digne estimatu içan da , cembatez ohore handiagotan baita etchea edifiçatu duena , ecen ez etchea bera .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Ecen etche oro norbeitez edificatzen da : eta gauça hauc guciac edificatu dituena , Iaincoa da .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Eta segur Moyses fidel içan da haren etche gucian cerbitzari beçala , guero erraiteco ciraden gaucén testificatzeco :

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Baina Christ seme beçala da bere etchean : ceinen etchea baicara gu , baldin confidançá eta gloriatzen garen sperançá finerano fermu eduqui baditzagu .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Halacotz Spiritu sainduac erraiten duen beçala , Egun baldin haren voza ençun badeçaçue

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: Eztitzaçuela gogor çuen bihotzac , tharritamenduan beçala , tentationeco egunean desertuan :

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Non tentatu vkan bainaute çuen aitéc , experimentatu vkan bainaute - eta ikussi baitituzte ene obrác berroguey vrthez .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Halacotz enoyatu içan naiz generatione hunez , eta erran vkan dut , Bethiere huts eguiten duté bihotzez , eta eztituzté eçagutu vkan ene bideac .

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Bada cin eguin vkan dut neure hirán , Baldin seculan sarthuren badirade ene reposean

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Gogoauçue , anayeác , çuetaric cembeitetan eztén bihotz sinheste gabetaco gaichtoa , Iainco viciaganic reuoltagarri :

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Baina exhorta eçaçue elkar egun oroz , egungo egun deitzen deno , çuetaric nehor gogor eztadinçát bekatuaren enganioz .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Ecen Christen participant eguin içan gara , bay baldin hatse hura , ceinez sustengatzen baicara , fermu eduqui badeçagu finerano .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Erraiten deno , Egun baldin haren voza ençun badeçaçue , eztitzaçuela gogor çuen bihotzac tharritamenduan beçala .

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Ecen batzuc ençun vkan çutenean , tharrita ceçaten Iauna : baina ez Egyptetic Moysesez ilki içan ciraden guciéc .

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Baina ceinéz enoyatu içan da berroguey vrthez ? ala ez bekatu eguin vkan çutenéz , ceinén gorputzac erori içan baitirade desertuan ?

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Eta ceini cin eguin cerauen , haren reposean etziradela sarthuren , obeditu vkan etzuteney baicen ?

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Eta badacussagu incredulitatearen causaz ecin sarthu içan diradela .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Garen bada beldur guertha eztadin çuetaric cembeit haren reposean sartzeco promessa vtziric , priuatua eriden eztadin .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Ecen guri - ere euangelizatu içan çaicu hæy - ere beçala : baina etzaye deus probetchatu predicationeco hitza , ceren ezpaitzén fedearequin nahassia ençun vkan çutenetan .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ecen sarthuren gara reposean gu , sinhetsi vkan dugunoc , erran duen beçala , Bada cin eguin vkan dut neure hirán , Baldin seculan sarthuren badirade ene reposean : munduaren hatsean danic haren obrác acabatu içan baciraden - ere .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Ecen nombeit hunela erran vkan du çazpigarren egunaz den becembatean , Eta reposa cedin Iaincoa çazpigarren egunean bere obra gucietaric .

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Eta hunetan berriz , Baldin seculan sarthuren badirade ene reposean .

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Ikussiric bada oraino batzu sartzen diradela hartan , eta lehenic denuntiatu içan çauenac eztiradela sarthu içan bere incredulitatearen causaz :

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Berriz determinatzen du egun iaquin - bat , Egun , Dauid baithan erraiten duela hambat demboraren buruän ( nola erran içan baita ) Egun baldin haren voza ençun badeçaçue , eztitzaçuela gogor çuen bihotzac .

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Ecen baldin Iosuec hæy eman balaraue reposic , etzatequeen guehiagoric berce egunez minçatu .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Halacotz , guelditzen çayó sabbathgoabat Iaincoaren populuari .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren reposean sarthu içan dena , reposatu içan da hura - ere bere obretaric , Iaincoa beretaric beçala .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Daguigun bada diligentia repos hartan sartzera : nehor eztadin eror desobedientiazco exemplu berera .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Ecen Iaincoaren hitza vici da eta efficaciotaco , eta den ezpata bi ahotacoric baino penetrantago : eta ardiesten du arimaren eta spirituaren , bayeta iuncturén eta hunén diuisionerano : eta da pensamenduén eta bihotzeco intentionén iuge

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Eta ezta creaturaric batre haren aitzinean agueri eztenic : aitzitic gauça guciac dirade billuciac eta irequiac haren beguietan ceinequin baitugu gure eguitecoa .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Bada sacrificadore subiranoa eta handia Iesus , Iaincoaren Semea , ceruäc penetratu dituena dugunaz gueroz , daducagun confessione haur .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Ecen eztugu Sacrificadore subirano gure infirmitatéz compassioneric ecin duqueen - bat , baina dugu manera berean gauça gucietan tentatu içan dena , salbu bekatuan .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Goacen bada segurançarequin gratiazco thronora , misericordia ardiets eta gratia eriden deçagunçát aiuta behar demboraco .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Ecen Sacrificadore subirano gucia guiçonetaric hartzen da , eta guiçonengatic ordenatzen da Iaincoa baitharaco gaucetan : offrenda ditzançát donoac eta sacrificioac bekatuacgatic :

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: Ceinec behar den becembat ignorantéz eta falta eguiten dutenéz pietate ahal baituque : ceren bera - ere infirmitatez inguratua baita :

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Eta infirmitate haren causaz behar baitu nola populuagatic , hala bere buruägatic - erc offrendatu sacrificio bekatuacgatic .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Eta nehorc eztrauca emaiten bere buruäri ohore haur , baina Iaincoaz deitzen denac , Aaron beçala .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Hala Christec - ere eztrauca bere buruäri ohore haur eman vkan Sacrificadore subirano eguin ledin , baina hari erran vkan draucanac , Ene Semea aiz hi , nic egun engendratu aut hi .

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Bercetan - ere erraiten duen beçala , Hi aiz Sacrificadore eternalqui Melchisedech - en façoinera .

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Ceinec bere haraguiaren egunetan heriotaric empara ahal ceçaquenari othoitzac eta supplicationeac oihu handirequin eta nigar vrirequin offrendatu cerautzanean , eta beldur cenetic ençun içan cenean ,

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Seme bacen - ere ikassi vkan baitu obedientiá suffritu vkan dituen gaucetaric :

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Eta sanctificatu içanic , eguin içan çaye hura obeditzen duten guciéy saluamendu eternalaren authór :

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Iaincoaz icendatu içanic Sacrificadore subirano Melchisedech - en façoinera .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Ceinez propos lucea baitugu erraiteco , eta declaratzeco difficila : ceren ençutera naguitu içan baitzarete :

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Cereneta demboraren arauez iracatsle içan behar cinetelaric , berriz iracatsi behar baitzarete cer diraden Iaincoaren hitzetaco lehen hatseco elementac : eta halaco eguin çarete non ezne behar baituçue , eta ez vianda cerraturic .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Ecen norc - ere eznéz vsatzen baitu , harc iustitiazco hitzaren experientiaric eztu : ecen haour da :

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Baina handituentzat da vianda cerratua , hala nola costumatu içanez sensuac exercitatuac dituztenén onaren eta gaitzaren beretzeco .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Bada , vtziric Christez hatse emaiten duen hitza , auança gaitecen perfectionera : berriz eçarten eztugularic obra hiletarico penitentiaren , eta Iaincoa baitharaco fedearen fundamenta ,

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: Baptismoén doctrinazco eta escuén impositionezco , eta hilén resurrectionezco , eta iudicio eternalezco fundamenta .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Eta haur eguinen dugu baldin behinçát permetti badeça Iaincoac .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Ecen ezta possible behin illuminatu içan diradenac , eta dohain celestiala dastatu vkan dutenac , eta Spiritu sainduan participant eguin içan diradenac ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: Eta dastatu vkan dutenac Iaincoaren hitz ona , eta ethorteco den secularen verthuteac :

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: Baldin eror baditez , berriz arramberri ditecen penitentiatara , ikussiric ecen Iaincoaren Semea berriz crucificatzen dutela hetan den becembatean , eta escarniotara emaiten dutela .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Ecen gainera ethorten çayón vria maiz edaten duen lurrac eta lancen duteney belhar sasoinezcoric ekarten drauenac , recebitzen du benedictione Iaincoaganic :

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: Baina elhorri eta kardu ekarten duena , reprobatua da eta maledictionearen hurbil , ceinen fina erre içatera beha baitago .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Baina seguratzen gara çueçaz den becembatean , maiteác , gauça hobez , eta saluamenduarequin eguitenago denez : hunela minço bagara - ere .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Ecen Iaincoa ezta iniusto , ahanz daquión çuen obrá eta haren icenera eracutsi vkan duçuen trabailluzco charitatea , sainduey aiuta eguin eta eguiten draueçuen becembatean .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Baina desir dugu çuetaric batbederac artha bera eracuts deçan , sperançaren segurança bethecotzat finerano :

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: Notchalent eguin etzaiteztençát , baina fedez eta patientiaz promessac heretatzen dituztenén imitaçale .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Ecen Abrahami promes eguin ceraucanean Iaincoac , ceren berce handiagoz ecin iura baitzeçaqueen , iura ceçan berarçaz ,

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: Cioela , Segur benedicatuz benedicaturen aut , eta multiplicatuz multiplicaturen aut .

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Eta hala patientqui iguriquiric recebitu vkan du promessa .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Ecen guiçonéc berac baino handiagoz iuratzen duté . eta confirmationetaco iuramendua , differentia guciaren finetan eduquiten duté .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Gauça hunetan Iaincoac abundosquiago promesseco herederoey bere conseilluaren fermetate mutha ecin daitequena eracutsi nahiz , iuramenduz seguratu vkan du :

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: Bi gauça mutha ecin daitezquenez ( ceinétan impossible baita Iaincoac gueçurric erran duen ) consolatione segura dugunçát , recursa dugunóc proposatu içan çaicun sperançaren vkaitera :

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Cein baitaducagu arimaren angura segurbat eta fermubat beçala , eta vela barnean diradenetarano sartzen den - bat beçala .

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Non Iesus aitzindari guregatic sarthu içan baita Melchisedec - en façoinera Sacrificadore subirano eternalqui eguin içanic .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Ecen Melchisedech haur cen Salemgo regue , Iainco subiranoaren Sacrificadore , cein bidera ilki içan baitzayón Abrahami haur reguén deseguitetic itzultzen cela , eta harc ceçan benedica :

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: Hari hamarrena - ere gauça gucietaric parti cieçón Abrahamec : eta lehenic hura da interpretatzen iustitiazco regue , eta guero Salemgo regue - ere : cein erran nahi baita baquezco regue :

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Aita gabe , ama gabe , leinu gabe : eztuelaric egunén hatseric , ez vicitzearen finic : baina Iaincoaren Semearen irudico eguin içanic , dago Sacrificadore eternalqui .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Considera eçaçue bada cein handi eguin içan den haur , ceini Abraham patriarchac despuilletaco hamarrena - ere eman baitzieçón .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Eta Leuiren semetaric diradenéc Sacrificadoregoa dutelaric , manua baduté populuaganic hamarrenaren hartzeco Leguearen arauez , erran nahi baita , bere anayetaric , Abrahamen guerruncetic ilki içan badirade - ere .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Baina hec diraden leinu bereco contatzen eztenac , hamarrena hartu vkan du Abrahamganic , eta promessac cituena benedicatu vkan du .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Eta contradictioneric batre gabe chipién dena guehién denaz benedicatzen da .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Eta hemen hiltzen diraden guiçonec hamarrenac hartzen dituzté : baina han vici dela testimoniage duenac hartzen ditu .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Eta ( hunela minça nadin ) Abrahamtan detchematu içan da Leui bera - ere , ceinec hamarrenac hartzen ohi baititu .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: Ecen hura oraino bere aitaren guerruncean cen , Melchisedec Abrahami bidera ilki içan çayonean .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Beraz baldin perfectionea Sacrificadoregoa Leuiticoan içan baliz ( ecen populuac Leguea haren azpian recebitu vkan du ) cer behar cen goitiric berce Sacrificadorebat Melchisedech - en façoinera altcha ledin , eta ezladin Aaronen façoinera erran ?

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Ecen Sacrificadoregoaren officioa cambiatu içanic , necessario da Leguearen cambioa - ere eguin dadin .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Ecen gauça hauc norçaz erraiten baitirade hura berce leinuri appartenitzen çayó , cein leinutaric nehorc ezpaitu aldarea cerbitzatu vkan .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Ecen claro da Iudaren leinutic ilki içan dela gure Iauna , cein leinutan ezpaitu Moysesec Sacrificadoregoaz deus erran .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Eta are haur da claroago , ceren Melchisedech - en façoinera ilkiten baita berce Sacrificadorebat :

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: Cein ezpaita Sacrificadore eguin içan manamendu carnaleco Leguearen arauez , baina vicitze immortaleco puissançaren arauez .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Ecen testificatzen du hunela , Hi aiz Sacrificadore eternalqui Melchisedech - en façoinera .

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Ecen aitzineco manamendua abolitzen da bere debilitateagatic eta probetchu gabeagatic .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Ecen eztu deus perfectionetara eraman vkan Legueac : baina içan da sperança hobeagoren preparationebat ceinez hurbiltzen baicara Iaincoagana .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Eta iuramendu gabe içan eztén becembatean ( ecen berceac iuramendu gabe Sacrificadore eguin içan dirade .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: Baina haur iuramendurequin , hari erran vkan draucanaz , Iuratu vkan dic Iaunac , eta etziayóc doluturen , Hi aiz Sacrificadore eternalqui Melchisedech - en façoinera )

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Hambatenaz alliança hobeagoren fiadore eguin içan da Iesus .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Eta Sacrificadoréz den becembatean , anhitz eguin içan dirade , ceren herioaz empatchatzen baitziraden egoitera .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: Baina hunec , ceren eternalqui egoiten baita , Sacrificadoregoa perpetualbat du .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Eta halacotz salua - ere perfectoqui ahal ditzaque , harçaz Iaincoagana hurbiltzen diradenac , bethi vici delaric hecgatic ararteco içateco .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Ecen beharra guenduen halaco Sacrificadore subiranobat guenduen , saindua , innocenta , macularic gabea , bekatoretaric separatua , ceruäc baino gorago altchatua :

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Ceinec ezluen beharric egun oroz , berce Sacrificadore subiranoéc beçala , lehenic bere bekatuacgatic sacrificioric offrendatu , guero populuarenacgatic : ecen haur behingoaz eguin vkan du bere buruä offrendaturic .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Ecen Legueac Sacrificadore subirano ordenatzen ditu guiçon infirmoac : baina iuramenduco hitz Leguearen ondocoac , ordenatzen du Seme eternalqui sanctificatua .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Bada erraiten ditugun gaucén sommarioa haur da , Halaco sacrificadore subiranobat dugula , cein iarria baita Iaincoaren maiestateco thronoaren escuinean , ceruètan :

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: Sanctuarioco ministre eta eguiazco Tabernacleco , cein fincatu baitu Iaunac , eta ez guiçonac .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Ecen Sacrificadore subirano gucia donoén eta sacrificioén offrendatzeco ordenatzen da : bada , necessario da hunec - ere duen cerbait cer offrenda .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Ecen baldin lurrean baliz , Sacrificadore - ere ezliçateque , Leguearen arauez donoac offrendatzen dituzten Sacrificadoreac irauten luqueiteno .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Ceinéc gauça celestialén patroina eta itzala cerbitzatzen baitute , Moysesi diuinoqui ihardetsi içan çayón beçala Tabernaclea acabatu behar çuenean , Bada ikussac ( dio ) eguin ditzán gauça guciac mendian eracutsi içan çayán patroinaren araura .

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Baina orain gure Sacrificadore subiranoac ministerio excellentagoa obtenitu vkan du , cembatenaz Alliança hobeago baten ararteco baita , cein promes hobeagoén gainean ordenatu içan baita .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Ecen baldin lehen hura deusen falta içan ezpaliz , bigarrenari etzaiqueon bilhatu lekuric .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Ecen hec reprehenditzen dituelaric , dioste , Huná , ethorri dirade egunac , dio Iaunac , complituren baitut Alliança berribat Israeleco etchearen gainean eta Iudaco etchearen gainean .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: Ez hayén aitequin eguin vkan nuen Alliançaren araura , hayén escua hartu nuen egunean Egypteco lurretic idoqui nitzançát , ceren ezpaitirade hec ene Alliançán egon , eta nic menospreciatu vkan ditut hec , dio Iaunac .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Ecen haur da egun hayén ondoan Israeleco etchearequin eguinen dudan Alliançá , dio Iaunac , Eçarriren ditut neure Legueac hayén adimenduan , eta hayén bihotzean ditut scribaturen : eta içanen naiz hayén Iainco , eta hec içanen dirade ene populu .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Eta eztu iracatsiren batbederac bere hurcoa , ez batbederac bere anayea , dioela , Eçagut eçac Iauna : ecen eçaguturen nauté chipienetic hayén arteco handieneranoco guciéc .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Ecen amatigatua içanen naiz hayén iniquitatetara eta hayén bekatuetara , eta eznaiz guehiagoric orhoit içanen hayén iniquitatéz .

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Berribat erraiten duenean , çahartzen du lehena : eta çahartzen eta ancianotzen dena abolitu içateari hurbil dagoca .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Beraz bacituen lehen Alliançac - ere cerbitzu diuinoaren ordenançác , eta sanctuario mundanoa .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Ecen Tabernaclea edificatu içan da , diot , lehena ceinetan baitziraden candelera , eta mahaina , eta propositioneco oguiac , cein deitzen baita Leku sainduac .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Eta bigarren velaren ondoan cen Tabernaclea , Sainduén sainduac deitzen dena :

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Vrrhezco encenserbat çuelaric , eta Alliançaco Arká ossoqui vrrhez inguru estalia : ceinetan baitzén vrrhezco pegarbat , non baitzén Manna , eta Aaronen cihor lilitu içan cena : eta Alliançaco Taulác .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Eta haren gainean gloriazco Cherubinac ciraden Propitiatorioari itzal eguiten ceraucatela , ezta gauça hauçaz orain particularqui minçatzeco mengoaric .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Eta gauça hauc hunela ordenatuac içanic , lehen Tabernaclean bethiere sartzen ciraden Sacrificadoreac cerbitzuaren colllplitzeagatic .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Baina bigarrenean , vrthean behin Sacrificadore subiranoa bera sartzen cen , ez odol gaberic , cein offrendatzen baitzuen bere buruägatic eta populuaren faltacgatic :

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Harçaz declaratzen çuela Spiritu sainduac , oraino etzela irequi sanctuarioco bidea , lehen tabernaclea oraino çutic egoiten ceno , cein baitzén dembora present hartaco figurá :

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Ceinetan donoac eta sacrificioac offrendatzen baitziraden , cerbitzua eguiten çuenaren conscientiá , ecin sanctifica ceçaquetelaric .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: Solament ianharitan , eta edaritan , eta ikutze diuersetan , eta ceremonia carnaletan , haur corregi çaitequeen demborarano ordenatuac :

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Baina Christ içateco ciraden onén Sacrificadore subirano ethorriric , Tabernacle handiago eta perfectoago batez , ez escuz eguinaz , erran nahi baita , ez creatione hunetacoz :

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: Eta ez aker edo aretze odolez , baina bere odol propriaz behin sarthu içan da leku sainduetan redemptione eternala obtenituric .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Ecen baldin cecenén eta akerrén odolac , eta bigáren hauts barreyatuac , satsuac sanctificatzen baditu haraguiaren puritateaz den becembatean :

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: Cembatez areago Christen odolac , ceinec Spiritu eternalaz bere buruä macularic gabe Iaincoari offrendatu baitrauca , chahuturen du obra hiletaric çuen conscientiá Iainco viciaren cerbitzatzeco ?

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Eta halacotz da Testamentu berriaren ararteco , herioa artean iarriric , leheneco Testamentuaren azpian ciraden transgressionén redemptionetan , deithuéc heretage eternaleco promessa recebi deçatençát .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Ecen testamenturic den lekuan , necessario da testamentu eguilearen herioa den .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: Ecen testamentua hilétan confirmatu da , ikussiric ecen oraino eztuela balio testamentu eguilea vici deno .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Bada , lehena - ere ezta odolic gabe dedicatu içan .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Ecen iracurri cerautzanean manamendu guciac Leguearen arauez Moysesec populu guciari , harturic aretzén eta akerrén odola vrarequin , eta escarlatan tintatu ilerequin eta hyssoparequin bay liburuä bay populu gucia ihizta citzan :

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: Cioela , Haur da Iaincoac çuey ordenatu drauçuen Testamentuco odola .

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Guero Tabernaclea - ere halaber , eta cerbitzuco vnci guciac , odolez ihizta citzan .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Eta quasi gauça guciac Leguearen arauez odolez purificatzen dirade , eta odol issurtze gabe barkamenduric ezta eguiten .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Behar içan da beraz ceruètan diraden gaucén figurác , hunelaco gauça hauçaz purifica litecen , baina celestial berac purifica ditecen hauc diraden baino sacrificio hobez .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Ecen Iesus ezta leku saindu escuz eguinetan sarthu , cein baitziraden eguiazcoey ihardesten cerauecen figurác : baina ceruän berean , orain Iaincoaren beguitharte aitzinean guregatic comparitzeco .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: Baina ez anhitzetan bere buruä offrenda deçançát , Sacrificadore subiranoa leku sainduetan vrthe guciaz berceren odolequin sartzen cen beçala .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: ( Bercela suffritu behar vkan çuqueen anhitzetan munduaren fundationeaz gueroztic ) baina orain behin seculén consummationean , bekatuaren destructionetan , bere buruäzco sacrificioaz comparitu içan da .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Eta hala nola ordenatu baitzaye guiçoney behin hiltzera , eta guero iugemendua :

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: Halaber Christ - ere behin offrendatu içanic anhitzen bekatuac aboli litzançát , berrizco aldian bekatu gabe aguerturen çaye haren beguira daudeney saluamendutacotz .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Ecen Legueac ethorteco ciraden onén itzala çuelaric , ez gaucén imagina vicia , vrthe oroz ardura offrendatzen cituzten sacrificio heçaz beréz , ethorten ciradenac iagoitic ecin sanctifica citzaqueen .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Bercela ala etziratequeen guelditu offrendatu içatetic , ikussiric ecen sacrificatzen çutenéc behin purificatu içanic , bekatutaco conscientiaric batre guehiagoric etzuqueitela vkan ?

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Bada sacrificio hetan bacén vrthe oroz bekatuen commemoratione arramberritubat .

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: Ecen impossible cen cecenén eta akerrén odolaz bekatuén kentzea .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Halacotz , munduan sartzean , dio , Sacrificioric ez offrendaric eztuc nahi vkan , baina gorputzbat appropiatu vkan drautac niri .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Halaber holocaustac ez oblationea bekatuagatic etzaizquic placent içan :

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Orduan erran vkan dut , Huná , ethorten nauc ( liburuären hatsean scribatua da niçaz ) eguin deçadan , o Iaincoá hire vorondatea :

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Lehen erran çuenaren gainean . Sacrificioric ez offrendaric , ez holocaustic ez oblationeric bekatuagatic eztuc nahi vkan ez eztituc approbatu : ( cein Leguearen arauez offrendatzen baitirade ) orduan erran vkan du , Huná , ethorten nauc eguin deçadan , o Iaincoa , hire vorondatea .

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: Kentzen du beraz lehena , guerocoa eçar deçançát .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Cein vorondatez sanctificatu içan baicara , Iesus Christen gorputzaren behingo oblationeaz .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Sacrificadore oroc bada assistitzen çuen egun oroz administratzen eta maiz sacrificio berac offrendatzen cituela , ceinéc iagoitic bekatuac ecin ken baitzitzaqueizten :

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: Baina haur sacrificio bakoitzbat bekatuacgatic offrendaturic , eternalqui iarria da Iaincoaren escuinean .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Goitico denaren beguira dagoelaric , haren etsayac haren oinén scabella eçar diteno .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Ecen oblatione bakoitz batez consecratu vkan ditu seculacotz sanctificatzen diradenac .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Eta testificatzen draucu Spiritu sainduac berac - ere : ecen aitzinetic erran duenaz gueroz ,

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: Haur da egun hayén ondoan hequin eguinen dudan alliançá , dio Iaunac , Emanen ditut neure Legueac hayén bihotzetan , eta hayén adimenduetan hec ditut scribaturen :

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Eta hayen bekatuéz eta iniquitatéz ez naiz guehiagoric orhoit içanen .

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Bada gauça hauen barkamendua den lekuan , ezta guehiago oblationeric bekatuagatic .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Ikussiric bada , anayeác , badugula libertate leku sainduetan sartzeco Iesusen odolaz ,

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: Dedicatu draucun bide frescoan eta vician gaindi , veláz , erran nahi baita , bere haraguiaz :

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: Eta badugula Sacrificadore handibat Iaincoaren etchearen carguä duenic :

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: Goacen eguiazco bihotzequin eta fedezco segurançarequin , conscientia gaichtotaric bihotzac chahuturic :

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Eta ikuciric gorputza vr chahuz , daducagun gure sperançaren confessionea variatu gabe ( ecen fidel da promettatu duena )

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Eta gogoa demogun elkarri charitatera eta obra onetara incitatzeco :

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: Vtziten eztugularic gure congregationea , batzuc costuma duten beçala , baina exhortatzen dugularic elkar : eta haur hambatenaz guehiago cembatenaz baitacussaçue hurbiltzen dela egun hura .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Ecen baldin iaquiara bekatu badaguigu eguiaren eçagutzea recebituz gueroztic , ezta guehiago sacrificioric bekatuacgatic guelditzen :

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: Baina iudicioaren beguira egoite terriblebat , eta suaren furia aduersarioac iretsiren dituen - bat .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Baldin cembeitec menospreciatu balu Moysesen Leguea , misericordiaric batre gabe , biguen edo hiruren testimoniagetic hiltzen cen .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: Cembatez vste duçue tormenta borthitzagoa merecitu duqueela , Iaincoaren Semea oinén azpian eçarri vkan duqueenac , eta alliançaco odola , ceinez sanctificatu baitzén , profanotan estimatu duqueenac : eta gratiazco Spirituari iniuria eguin drauqueonac ?

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Ecen badaçagugu erran duena , Ene da mendecatzea , nic rendaturen dut , dio Iaunac . Eta berriz , Iaunac iugeaturen du bere populua .

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: Gauça horriblea da Iainco viciaren escuetara erortea .

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Orhoit çaitezte aitzineco egunéz , ceinetan illuminatu içan cinetenaz gueroztic , affictionezco combat handi suffritu vkan baituçue :

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: Alde batetic gucién monstrançatan escarnioz eta tribulationez eçarri içan çarete : eta berce aldetic statu hartan erabilten ciradenenén lagun eguin içan çaretenean .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Ecen ene estecaduretaco afflictionean - ere participant eguin içan çarete , eta çuen onén galtzea bozcariorequin recebitu vkan duçue : cinaquitelaric ceuroc baithan onhassun hobebat duçuela ceruètan , eta permanent denic .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Ezteçaçuela bada iraitz çuen confidançá , ceinec baitu recompensa handia .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Ecen patientia behar duçue , Iaincoaren vorondatea eguin duqueçuenean promessa recebi deçaçuençát .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Ecen oraino dembora appurto appurtobat , eta ethorteco dena ethorriren da , eta eztu beranthuren .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: Eta iustoa fedez vicico da : baina baldin cembeit apparta badadi , eztu ene arimác hartan placeric hartzen .

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Baina gu ezgara perditionetara appartatzen garenac , baina fedeari iarreiquiten guiaizquionac arimaren saluamendutan .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Bada , fedea da nehor sperançatan den gaucén fundamenta , eta ikusten eztiraden gauçác eracusten dituena .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Ecen harçaz aitzinecoec testimoniage vkan duté .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Fedez aditzen dugu Iaincoaren hitzaz mundua eguin içan dela : gauça inuisiblén demonstratione eguin ledinçát .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Abelec fedez Cainec baino sacrificio excellentagoa Iaincoari offrendatu vkan drauca : cein fedez testimoniage obtenitu vkan baitu iusto cela , ceren Iaincoac haren donoéz testificatzen baitzuen : eta oraino fede harçaz hil delaric minço da .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Fedez Henoch eraman içan da , herioa ikus ezleçançát : eta ezta eriden içan , ceren eraman baitzuen Iaincoac : ecen eraman cedin baino lehen , testimoniage vkan ceçan Iaincoaren gogaraco içan cela :

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: Bada impossible da fede gabe haren gogaraco içatea : ecen Iaincoagana ethorten denac , behar da sinhets deçan ecen Iaincoa badela , eta hura bilhatzen dutenén recompensaçale dela .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Fedez Noéc , diuinoqui auertitu içanic oraino ikusten etziraden gaucéz , beldurturic , appresta ceçan arká bere familiaren saluatzeco : cein arkaz condemna baitzeçan mundua : eta eguin cedin fedearen arauez den iustitiaren heredero .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Fedez Abrahamec deithu cenean obedi ceçan Iaincoa , heretagetan hartu behar çuen lekura ioan ledinçát , eta parti cedin norat ioaiten cen etzaquialaric .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
